Speaker: Leviathan
Steam (ST): "Hey!! That's miiine! Giiive iiit baaack!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Heyyyy!! That's miiine! Give—it—back!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ちょっとー！！　それ、私のー！　かーえーしーてぇー！！」
Russian (RU): "Эй! Он мо‐ой! Отда‐ай!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eiiii!! Isso é meeeu! De—vol—ve!!"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ehi!! Quello è miiiiooo! Ri-dam-me-looo!!"

Speaker: Beelzebub
Steam (ST): "No, no, I'll eat iiit! Asmo, Asmo, pass!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Nonono, I'm gonna eat i~t! Asmo, Asmo, pass!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「やだやだ、私が食べるの〜！　アスモ、アスモ、パース！」
Russian (RU): "Нет, не‐е‐ет, я съем его‐о‐о! Асмо, Асмо, отстань!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sem chance, eu vou come~r! Asmo, Asmo, pega!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不給不給，我要吃～！阿絲磨，阿絲磨，傳球！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不给不给，我要吃～！阿丝磨，阿丝磨，传球！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "No, no, lo mangio iooo-! Asmo, Asmo, passa!"

Speaker: Asmodeus
Steam (ST): "Kya-hahahaha! Over here, Levia onee-samaaa!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Kyaahahahaha! Levia onee‐sama, over here, over here~!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「きゃーはははは！　レヴィアお姉様、こっちこっちぃ〜！」
Russian (RU): "Кья‐ха‐ха‐ха! Левия онее‐сама, здесь~!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Kyaahahahaha! Levia onee‐sama, aqui, aqui~!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呀——哈哈哈哈！雷維阿姐姐，這邊這邊～！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呀——哈哈哈哈！雷维阿姐姐，这边这边～！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Kya-hahahaha! Quaggiù, Levia Onee-sama~!"

Steam (ST): I wonder where they swiped it from. They were fighting over a donut or something, playing around really loudly.
Umineko Project (UP): I wonder where they swiped it from.{n}They were fighting over a donut or something, playing around really loudly.
PC Japanese (JP): どこからくすねて来たのだろう。ドーナツか何かを争って、実に賑やかに戯れている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): どこからくすねて来たのだろう。{n}ドーナツか何かを争って、実に賑やかに戯れている。
Russian (RU): Где они его стащили, хотела бы я знать.{n}И теперь они с шумом и гамом дрались из‐за какого‐то пончика.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Me pergunto de onde ela pegou isso.{n}Elas estavam brigando por causa de um donut ou algo assim, se divertindo e fazendo muito barulho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是從哪兒順手牽羊拿來的吧。{n}姐妹們爭搶著甜甜圈之類的玩意兒，鬧得實在很大聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是从哪儿顺手牵羊拿来的吧。{n}姐妹们争抢着甜甜圈之类的玩意儿，闹得实在很大声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mi chiedo dove l'abbiano rubato. Si stavano contendendo una ciambella o qualcosa del genere, facendo un gran baccano.

Speaker: Satan
Steam (ST): "HEY!!!!! Ange‐sama is reading, can't you be the slightest bit quiet?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "HEY!!!!! Ange‐sama is reading, can't you be the slightest bit quiet?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「こらあああ！！　縁寿さまは読書をなさってるのよ、少しは静かに出来ないのッ？！」
Russian (RU): "Э‐э‐э‐э‐эй! Энджи‐сама читает, так что не могли бы вы хоть немного угомониться?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "EI!!!!! A Ange‐sama está lendo, não podem fazer um pouco de silêncio?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂——！！緣壽小姐正在看書，你們就不能稍微安靜點嘛？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂——！！缘寿小姐正在看书，你们就不能稍微安静点嘛？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Eeeehi!! Ange-sama sta leggendo, non riuscite a fare un po' più di silenzio?!"

Speaker: Lucifer
Steam (ST): "Yelling stuff like that makes you the loudest one, Satan! Be silent!! You foolish little sister!"
Umineko Project (UP): "And yet you're the loudest one, Satan, silence yourself!! You cretinous sister!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「そう言ってるサタンが一番うるさいのよ、沈黙なさい！！　この愚妹が！」
Russian (RU): "А сама‐то как громко кричишь, Сатана! Тише! Вот глупые сестры!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mesmo você sendo a mais barulhenta, Satan, faça silêncio você!! Suas irmãs cretinas!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「在這麼說的撒旦是最吵的喲，給我保持沉默！！你這愚妹！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「在这么说的撒旦是最吵的哟，给我保持沉默！！你这愚妹！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sei tu a fare più rumore di tutte gridando, Satan! Fai silenzio!! Stupida sorella!"

Speaker: Satan
Steam (ST): "Y-You're the loud one, Lucifer onee-sama!! I-Is there something you'd like to say to me?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Y‐you're louder than me, Lucifer onee‐sama!! I‐is there something you want to say to me?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ル、ルシファーお姉様の方がうるさいです！！　も、文句がおあり？！」
Russian (RU): "Чего орёшь, Люцифер онее‐сама?! Т‐тебе что‐то не нравится?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "V‐Você está fazendo mais barulho que eu, Lucifer onee‐sama!! T‐Tem alguma coisa que você queira me dizer?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「路、路西法姐姐比我更吵！！有、有意見？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「路、路西法姐姐比我更吵！！有、有意见？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "S-Sei tu a fare rumore, Lucifer Onee-sama!! D-Di che ti lamenti?!"

Steam (ST): I was already used to the oldest and the third oldest sister arguing with each other. Even though they're both so quick to anger, it's a bit funny how they're both having to hold back a little.
Umineko Project (UP): By now, I was used to the fights between the eldest and the third‐eldest sister. It's a bit funny how they're both a little hesitant even though they're so quick to anger.
PC Japanese (JP): 長女と三女の口喧嘩ももうお馴染みだ。二人とも怒りんぼのくせに、少し腰が引けているっぽいところが何だか面白い。
Russian (RU): Самая старшая и третья по старшинству сестры вовсю спорили друг с другом. Даже при присущей им раздражающей быстроте перемещения, было немного смешно наблюдать, когда они пытались сдерживаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Já estou acostumada com brigas entre a mais velha e a terceira irmã mais velha.{n}É um pouco engraçado em como ambas sempre hesitam um pouco mesmo que elas rapidamente fiquem furiosas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我已經習慣長女與三女的吵嘴了。她倆那儘管都很易怒，卻又都有點腰板不硬之處，令人不由得感到好玩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我已经习惯长女与三女的吵嘴了。她俩那尽管都很易怒，却又都有点腰板不硬之处，令人不由得感到好玩。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sorella maggiore e la terza sorella più grande erano abituate a litigare tra loro. Anche se entrambe si arrabbiano rapidamente, è piuttosto divertente vedere come cerchino di trattenersi un po'.

Steam (ST): They might be surprisingly like each other.
Umineko Project (UP): They might be surprisingly similar.
PC Japanese (JP): 案外、似た者同士なのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Они были наделены удивительной схожестью друг с другом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas são surpreendentemente parecidas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 搞不好，她們說不定是一對頗為相似的人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 搞不好，她们说不定是一对颇为相似的人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si somigliano moltissimo, incredibilmente.

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "*cackle*cackle* You were told to be noisy, but this is a bit too much. Should I make them lower the volume a little?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Heh heh. You ordered us to be noisy, but this is surely too much. Should I make them lower the volume a little?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「くっくくく。賑やかにしていろとの仰せでしたが、これではさすがに。少しボリュームを下げさせますか？」
Russian (RU): "*смешок*смешок*. Вам позволено шуметь, но вы немного переборщили. Может быть, всё же можно потише?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Heh heh. Você nos ordenou para sermos barulhentas, mas isso certamente é demais. Eu deveria fazer elas baixarem um pouco o volume?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呵、呵呵呵。雖然您有說過“去搞熱鬧點”，但這樣實在是有點過了。請問，需不需要叫大家小聲點？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呵、呵呵呵。虽然您有说过“去搞热闹点”，但这样实在是有点过了。请问，需不需要叫大家小声点？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "*cackle*cackle*. Ti è stato detto di essere rumorosa, ma questo è un po' troppo. Non puoi abbassare un po' il tono?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......They can mess around all they want. It's a hundred times more pleasant than that shrill laughter in the classroom."
Umineko Project (UP): "............You can all mess around all you want. It's a hundred times more pleasant than the shrill laughter in the classroom."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………気にしないで騒いでてくれていいわ。教室の黄色い笑い声より百倍心地良いもの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………気にしないで騒いでてくれていいわ。教室の黄色い笑い声より百倍心地良いもの」
Russian (RU): "............Они могут делать всё, что душа пожелает. Это ведь куда приятнее, чем смешки в классе."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Você pode bagunçar o quanto quiser. É cem vezes mais agradável do que as estridentes risadas na sala de aula."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………不用在意，隨大家鬧好了。這可比教室裡的煩人笑聲舒心百倍。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………不用在意，随大家闹好了。这可比教室里的烦人笑声舒心百倍。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Possono fare tutto il rumore che vogliono. È cento volte più piacevole delle risate stridule nella mia classe."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Ange-samaa, go to the next page quickly! You read really sloow!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Ange‐samaa, hurry up, next paaage! You read really slooww!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「縁寿さまぁ、早く次のページぃ！　縁寿さまは読むのが遅いぃ！」
Russian (RU): "Энджи‐сама‐а‐а‐а, быстро перелистните страницу! Вы читаете слишком ме‐е‐едленно!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ange‐samaa, rápido, próxima páginaaaa! Você lê muito devagaaar!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「緣壽小姐——，快翻到下一頁——！緣壽小姐看得好慢——！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「缘寿小姐——，快翻到下一页——！缘寿小姐看得好慢——！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ange-sama, passate in fretta alla prossima pagina! Leggete davvero molto lentamente!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "You like to read, Mammon? You looked like you'd be the worst at doing boring things."
Umineko Project (UP): "You like to read, Mammon? You look like you'd be the most averse to such ordinary things."
PC Japanese (JP): 「マモンは読書が好きなの？　地味なことが一番苦手そうに見えるのにね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「マモンは読書が好きなの？　地味なことが一番苦手そうに見えるのにね」
Russian (RU): "Мамона, ты любишь читать? А ты заметила, что делаешь некоторые вещи хуже, чем я?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Gosta de ler, Mammon? Você parece ser a que possui maior aversão a coisas tão ordinárias."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「馬蒙喜歡看書？我還覺得，你看起來最討厭這種樸實無華的事了呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「马蒙喜欢看书？我还觉得，你看起来最讨厌这种朴实无华的事了呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ti piace leggere, Mammon? E pensare che sembravi la peggiore a fare cose semplici."

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "Mammon controls greed. ...That also includes a thirst for knowledge. Still, she wants to keep that knowledge all for herself, so be warned that she refuses to let people read any book you give her, and sometimes burns them after reading them."
Umineko Project (UP): "Mammon's domain is greed. ......That also includes a thirst for knowledge. But she tends to want to keep that knowledge all for herself, so when someone gives her a book, she'll sometimes burn it after reading it so that no one else can—please watch out for that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「マモンが司るのは強欲。……知識欲にもそれは通じます。ただし、独占したがるので、本を与えると人に読ませまいと、読書後に焼いてしまうこともあるのでご注意を。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「マモンが司るのは強欲。……知識欲にもそれは通じます。ただし、独占したがるので、本を与えると人に読ませまいと、読書後に焼いてしまうこともあるのでご注意を」
Russian (RU): "Мамона отвечает за алчность. ......Туда же входит и жажда к знаниям. Но она хочет, чтобы эти знания принадлежали лишь ей, так что имейте в виду, она не даёт людям свои книги, а то и вовсе сжигает их после прочтения."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O domínio da Mammon é a ganância. ......Isso também inclui sede por conhecimento. Mas ela tende a querer manter esse conhecimento todo para si, por isso, quando alguém dá um livro a ela, algumas vezes ela o queima após ler para que ninguém mais possa ler — tome cuidado com isso."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「馬蒙掌管的是貪婪。……求知欲也與此相通。只不過，由於她好獨佔，所以一給她書，她就會為了不讓別人看，而在看完後把書燒掉，還請多加注意。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「马蒙掌管的是贪婪。……求知欲也与此相通。只不过，由于她好独占，所以一给她书，她就会为了不让别人看，而在看完后把书烧掉，还请多加注意。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mammon controlla l'avarizia. ... Ciò include anche la sete di conoscenza. Tuttavia, vuole tenere quella conoscenza tutta per sé, quindi fate attenzione, perché si rifiuta di far leggere alle altre persone ogni libro che le viene dato, e a volte li brucia dopo averli letti."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "I like knowing things that no one else knows. I like being able to do things that no one else can do. So I like studying and practicing. Because I want to keep wisdom that no one else knows about all to myself."
Umineko Project (UP): "I like knowing things that no one else knows. I like being able to do things that no one else can do. So I like studying and practicing. Because I want to keep wisdom that no one else knows about all to myself."
PC Japanese (JP): 「私は、誰も知らないことを、私だけが知っているのが好き。誰も出来ないことを、私だけが出来るのが好き。だから勉強は好き、練習は好き。私だけが、誰も知らない英知を、独り占めしたいから。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私は、誰も知らないことを、私だけが知っているのが好き。誰も出来ないことを、私だけが出来るのが好き。だから勉強は好き、練習は好き。私だけが、誰も知らない英知を、独り占めしたいから」
Russian (RU): "Мне нравится изучать вещи, о которых помимо меня никто и духу не ведает. Я люблю делать то, что другому сделать не под силу. Я люблю и теорию, и практику. Потому что хочу знать то, что больше никто не знает."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu gosto de saber coisas que ninguém mais sabe. Gosto de ser capaz de fazer coisas que ninguém mais consegue. Por isso eu gosto de estudar e praticar. Porque quero agregar mais sabedoria que ninguém mais sabe, só para mim."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我喜歡只有我知道，別人都不知道。我喜歡只有我做得到，別人都做不到。所以喜歡學習，喜歡練習。因為我想一人獨佔誰都不知道的知識。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我喜欢只有我知道，别人都不知道。我喜欢只有我做得到，别人都做不到。所以喜欢学习，喜欢练习。因为我想一人独占谁都不知道的知识。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mi piace apprendere cose che nessun altro conosce. Mi piace poter fare cose che nessun altro può fare. Per cui mi piace studiare ed esercitarmi. Poiché voglio avere un'intelligenza sconosciuta a tutti, tutta per me."

Steam (ST): As Mammon said that, her eyes sparkling, she peered down at the page that was open and read through it again.
Umineko Project (UP): As Mammon said that, her eyes sparkling, she stared transfixed at the open page, reading through it again.
PC Japanese (JP): マモンはそう言い、目を輝かせながら、今開かれているページをもう一度読み直すように凝視する。
Russian (RU): Когда она говорила, её глаза сверкали, она посмотрела на раскрытую страницу и прочитала её ещё раз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os olhos de Mammon brilharam quando ela disse isso, e ela começou a olhar transfixada para a página aberta, lendo‐a novamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 馬蒙邊如此說著，邊雙目閃閃發光地，如要重讀一遍般地凝視起了正翻開著的那一頁。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 马蒙边如此说着，边双目闪闪发光地，如要重读一遍般地凝视起了正翻开着的那一页。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre Mammon lo diceva, i suoi occhi luccicavano, guardò la pagina su cui era aperto il libro e la lesse di nuovo.

Steam (ST): You could see the greed that made her covet that page even more thoroughly than I did.
Umineko Project (UP): You could see the greed that made her even more intent than me on devouring that page.
PC Japanese (JP): 同じページを、私以上に貪り尽くしてやろうという強欲さが現れていた。
Russian (RU): Можно было понять, что грех сделал её жаждущей прочитать ту страницу, и её жажда была в разы больше моей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Você podia ver a ganância que a fazia cobiçar mais do que eu, devorando aquela página.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這正是表現出了，要在同一頁上榨取到比我更多的收獲的，貪婪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这正是表现出了，要在同一页上榨取到比我更多的收获的，贪婪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si poteva vedere l'avidità, che le faceva leggere la stessa pagina con più sforzo di me.

Steam (ST): As you can see, my magical power has grown much stronger than it was on the first day I summoned them.
Umineko Project (UP): As you can see, my magical power was now much stronger compared to the first day I summoned them.
PC Japanese (JP): 見ての通り、私の魔力は初めて彼女らを呼び出した日に比べ、ずっと強くなっていた。
Russian (RU): Как можно было заметить, моя магическая сила выросла по сравнению с той, которой я владела в первый день их призыва.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como você pode ver, meu poder mágico agora está muito mais forte do que comparado ao primeiro dia em que eu a invoquei.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如你所見，與當初第一次召喚出她們的那一天相比，我的魔力要強了很多。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如你所见，与当初第一次召唤出她们的那一天相比，我的魔力要强了很多。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come si può vedere, il mio potere magico è aumentato di molto rispetto al primo giorno che le ho evocate.

Steam (ST): By now, I've gotten so that I can summon all of the Seven Sisters of Purgatory at once and still calmly read a book like this.
Umineko Project (UP): I was now at the point where I could summon all of the Seven Sisters of Purgatory at once and still calmly read a book like this.
PC Japanese (JP): 今では、煉獄の七姉妹を同時に呼び出しながら、こうしてのんびり読書が出来るまでになっている。
Russian (RU): Сейчас мне было под силу призвать всех семерых сестёр чистилища и спокойно читать книгу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu agora estou no nível onde eu posso invocar todas as Sete Irmãs do Purgatório e continuar a ler calmamente um livro como este.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如今，我已能邊同時召喚出煉獄七姐妹，邊像這樣悠閑看書。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如今，我已能边同时召唤出炼狱七姐妹，边像这样悠闲看书。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ora, sono in grado di evocare tutte e sette le Sorelle del Purgatorio nello stesso momento e posso anche leggere un libro in tutta tranquillità come sto facendo ora.

Steam (ST): This place, although I can't recall exactly where it is, is a quiet and calm street-side bench.
Umineko Project (UP): This place, although I couldn't recall {i:where} it was, was a quiet and calm street‐side bench.
PC Japanese (JP): ここは、どこだか思い出せないけれど、のんびりとした静かな街並のベンチ。
Russian (RU): То место, хоть я и не помню, {i:где} оно находилось, было тихим и спокойным, а рядом стояла скамья.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Este lugar, embora eu não posso lembrar {i:onde} ficava, era um quieto e calmo banco na calçada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然記不起這是哪兒，但我坐在悠然恬靜的街邊長椅上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然记不起这是哪儿，但我坐在悠然恬静的街边长椅上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo posto, anche se non posso ricordare dove si trovi, è una tranquilla panchina al lato della strada.

Steam (ST): I'd been young back then, so I don't remember the details of its location.
Umineko Project (UP): The reason that I couldn't remember the location of this place was that at the time I visited it, I was very young.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は幼かったから、ここがどこなのか、覚えていないのだ。
Russian (RU): Тогда я была совсем мала, потому и не помню.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O motivo pela qual eu não consigo lembrar a localização deste lugar é porque na época em que eu o visitei, eu era muito jovem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我在小時候就沒記住這是哪兒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我在小时候就没记住这是哪儿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): All'epoca ero giovane, quindi non ricordo dove sia.

Steam (ST): ...Still, I remember that my days walking here were a lot of fun.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Still, I remembered the day we'd walked here, and how much fun it was.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、ここを歩いた日が、とても楽しかったことは覚えてる。
Russian (RU): ......Но мне запомнилось, что те деньки, которые я там проводила, были очень беззаботны.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas, eu lembro do dia em que eu caminhei aqui, e como esse dia foi divertido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不過我記得，來這散步的那天非常地開心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不过我记得，来这散步的那天非常地开心。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia, ricordo che i miei giorni passati camminando nei dintorni erano molto divertenti.

Steam (ST): Together with Dad, Mom, ...and even Onii-chan, it was a memory of a very rare and very happy day when everyone had been together...
Umineko Project (UP): Mom, Dad, ...and even Onii‐chan had been there—it was a memory of a very rare and very happy day when all the family had actually been together...
PC Japanese (JP): お父さんとお母さんと、…そしてお兄ちゃんも揃った、本当に全員が揃ったとても珍しくてとても幸せな日の記憶…。
Russian (RU): Тогда с мамой, папой... и даже братиком, мы провели редкий счастливый денёк, пока были вместе... это прочно вписалось в мою память...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha mãe, meu pai, ...e até o onii‐chan estavam lá — é uma memória muito rara e muito feliz do dia em que toda a família estava junta...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那是爸爸、媽媽、…還有哥哥都在一起，真真正正全家團聚，非常難得非常幸福的一天的記憶…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那是爸爸、妈妈、…还有哥哥都在一起，真真正正全家团聚，非常难得非常幸福的一天的记忆…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Insieme a Mamma, Papà... e anche Onii-chan, era il ricordo di un giorno davvero raro e davvero felice in cui siamo stati tutti insieme...

Steam (ST): The people who walked by every once in a while didn't notice me. They just pleasantly ignored me and passed by as though everything was normal.
Umineko Project (UP): The people walking by every once in a while weren't noticing me.{n}They were just pleasantly ignoring me and passing by as normal.
PC Japanese (JP): 時折、道往く人々は私たちの姿には気付かない。ただ、心地良く無視して、普通に通り過ぎてくれるだけだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 時折、道往く人々は私たちの姿には気付かない。{n}ただ、心地良く無視して、普通に通り過ぎてくれるだけだ。
Russian (RU): Прохожие, сновавшие туда‐сюда, совсем не замечали меня.{n}Они попросту игнорировали меня и шли мимо, будто всё было в порядке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As pessoas que passavam de tempos em tempos não me notavam.{n}Elas apenas me ignoravam agradavelmente e passavam como se fosse normal.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 時而路過的行人並沒有在意我們。{n}只是令人舒心地給予了我無視，若無其事地走過我們的身邊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 时而路过的行人并没有在意我们。{n}只是令人舒心地给予了我无视，若无其事地走过我们的身边。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le persone che passavano di tanto in tanto non si accorgevano di me. Semplicemente mi ignoravano passando oltre, come se fosse tutto normale.

Steam (ST): Even the Seven Sisters' incredible outfits weren't embarrassing or anything, because it wasn't like anyone was actually watching.
Umineko Project (UP): I wasn't even the slightest bit embarrassed by the Seven Sisters' shameless outfits, because it wasn't like they were actually being seen by anyone.
PC Japanese (JP): 七姉妹たちのすごい格好も、別に誰かに見られているわけでもないのだから、恥ずかしくも何ともない。
Russian (RU): Даже откровенное одеяние семи сестёр не смущало их, ведь они их не видели.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não estava nem um pouco envergonhada pelas roupas indecentes das Sete Irmãs, porque não é como se alguém realmente estivesse vendo elas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 七姐妹們那大膽的裝束也是，又沒有被人看到，所以沒什麼好為之害羞的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 七姐妹们那大胆的装束也是，又没有被人看到，所以没什么好为之害羞的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Persino gli assurdi vestiti delle Sette Sorelle non erano imbarazzanti o altro, perché era come se nessuno guardasse.

Steam (ST): Come to think of it, I'm getting pretty used to it. As long as they don't make me wear those.
Umineko Project (UP): In fact, I'd gotten pretty used to them. Just so long as they didn't make {i:me} wear one.
PC Japanese (JP): というか、割と慣れた。私が着させられるわけでない限り。
Russian (RU): Если подумать, то я уже привыкла к нему. При условии, что меня {i:саму} не заставляют его носить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ou melhor, eu me acostumei muito bem a elas. Desde que elas não façam {i:eu} vestir uma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不如說，都有點習慣了。只要別讓我穿就無所謂。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不如说，都有点习惯了。只要别让我穿就无所谓。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ora che ci penso, mi ci sono piuttosto abituata. Almeno finché non li faranno indossare anche a me.

Steam (ST): I was sitting on a stylish bench, memorizing a timeline for world history.
Umineko Project (UP): I was sitting on a stylish bench, memorizing a timeline for world history.
PC Japanese (JP): 私はお洒落なベンチに腰掛け、世界史の年表を暗記中だ。
Russian (RU): Я сидела на стильной скамье, запоминая хронологию мировой истории.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estava sentada em um banco refinado, memorizando uma linha do tempo da história do mundial.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我把腰靠在了簡潔灑脫的長椅上，默背著世界史年表。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我把腰靠在了简洁洒脱的长椅上，默背着世界史年表。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sedevo su una panchina elegante, memorizzando una linea del tempo sulla storia del mondo.

Steam (ST): ...In an academy system where everything is based on collective responsibility, there's no tolerance for dunces.
Umineko Project (UP): ......In an academy system where everything is based on collective responsibility, there's no tolerance for dunces.
PC Japanese (JP): ……何でも連帯責任になる学園の校風は、落ち零れをやさしく許容なんてしてくれない。
Russian (RU): ......В академической системе, основанной на коллективной ответственности, отсутствует терпимость к лентяям.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Em uma academia onde tudo é baseado na responsabilidade coletiva, não há tolerância com os ignorantes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不論什麼都要搞連帶責任的學園的校風，可不會寬容後進生。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不论什么都要搞连带责任的学园的校风，可不会宽容后进生。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In un sistema accademico dove tutto è basato sulla responsabilità collettiva, non c'è tolleranza per i somari.

Steam (ST): It seemed that I was considerably below the average grade for the class.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that I was lowering the average grade for the class considerably.
PC Japanese (JP): 何でも、私がクラスの平均点を著しく下げているらしい。
Russian (RU): Казалось, что для школы я была чересчур среднего класса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parece que eu estava consideravelmente abaixo da média da classe.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我好像是顯著地拉下了班上的平均分。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我好像是显著地拉下了班上的平均分。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che fossi parecchio al di sotto della media dei voti per la classe.

Steam (ST): According to those extremely intellectual girls, if I alone improved my grade, the average would rise drastically.
Umineko Project (UP): According to those extremely intellectual girls, if I alone improved my grade, the average would rise drastically.
PC Japanese (JP): 極めて理知的な彼女らの話によると、私ひとりが改善されるだけで、大幅に平均点が上がるらしい。
Russian (RU): Согласно разговору тех заумных девиц у всего класса бы резко повысился средний балл, улучшь я свой собственный.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De acordo com essas garotas extremamente inteligentes, se eu sozinha não melhorar minhas notas, a média vai cair drasticamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 根據極其理智的她們的話，似乎只需我一人有進步，就能大幅拉上平均分。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 根据极其理智的她们的话，似乎只需我一人有进步，就能大幅拉上平均分。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Secondo quelle ragazze estremamente acculturate, se io sola avessi migliorato i miei voti, la media sarebbe salita drasticamente.

Steam (ST): ...They had been kind enough to show me with a graph drawn by colorful pens on a B4 sheet of drawing paper.
Umineko Project (UP): ......They had been kind enough to show me with a graph drawn with colorful pens on a B4 sheet of drawing paper.
PC Japanese (JP): ……ご丁寧にも、Ｂ４の画用紙にカラフルなペンでそれをグラフにしてまで示してくれた。
Russian (RU): ......Они любезно показали мне график, сделанный цветными ручками на листе ватмана B4.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Elas já foram gentis o bastante mostrando‐me um gráfico desenhado com canetas coloridas em uma folha de papel B4.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……蒙她們細心準備，我還得以觀看了用彩筆在 B4 圖畫紙上畫下的關於此的示意圖。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……蒙她们细心准备，我还得以观看了用彩笔在 B4 图画纸上画下的关于此的示意图。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Erano state abbastanza gentili da dimostrarmelo con un grafico fatto con matite colorate su un foglio A4.

Steam (ST): ...Just thinking of the effort it had taken to draw that was repulsive.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Just thinking of the effort it must have taken to draw that was nauseating.
PC Japanese (JP): …その書く手間を考えるだけでも、おぞましい。
Russian (RU): ...Я думаю, решение рассказать им всё было неправильным.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Só de pensar no esforço de ter que desenhar isso me dá náuseas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …只是去想一下畫這個所費的工夫，就不由得心生厭煩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …只是去想一下画这个所费的工夫，就不由得心生厌烦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il solo pensare allo sforzo fatto per disegnarlo mi ripugnava.

Steam (ST): But I've already spat out all those complaints. ...I've already voiced my constant and furious anger and sadness to these girls here.
Umineko Project (UP): But I'd already spat out all of those complaints. ......I'd already used those girls to vent all my furious anger and sadness.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、そういう愚痴はもう全て吐き出した。……腸が煮えくり返るような怒りや悲しみは全て彼女らに吐き出した。
Russian (RU): Но слово — не воробей, я уже выложила им всё, что думала. ......А, да я уже забыла об этом из‐за моей постоянной меланхолии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas eu já coloquei para fora todas essas reclamações. ......Já usei dessas garotas constantemente para desabafar toda a minha fúria e tristeza.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，這些牢騷已經全部吐盡。……我向她們傾吐出了所有令人肝腸寸斷的憤怒與悲傷。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，这些牢骚已经全部吐尽。……我向她们倾吐出了所有令人肝肠寸断的愤怒与悲伤。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma mi sono già liberata di tutte quelle lamentele. ... Mi sono già liberata di loro con la mia ira e la mia tristezza costanti.

Steam (ST): The Sisters were sometimes indignant, sometimes sympathetic, and sometimes mourned along with me.
Umineko Project (UP): The Seven Sisters...were sometimes outraged, sometimes compassionate, and sometimes shared in my sorrows.
PC Japanese (JP): 七姉妹たちは、ある時は憤り、ある時は同情し、ある時は私と一緒に悲しんでくれた。
Russian (RU): Семь сестёр иногда возмущались, иногда сострадали, а иногда и плакали вместе со мной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As Sete Irmãs...algumas vezes indignas, algumas vezes compassivas, às vezes compartilhando das minhas mágoas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 七姐妹們時而憤怒，時而同情，時而與我一起陷入悲傷。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 七姐妹们时而愤怒，时而同情，时而与我一起陷入悲伤。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le Sette Sorelle a volte erano sdegnanti, a volte compassionevoli, e a volte si rattristavano con me.

Steam (ST): ...I was truly happy to be able to share emotions like that with friends.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I was truly happy to have friends with whom I could share those emotions.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そういう感情を共有してくれる友人がいてくれることが、本当に嬉しかった。
Russian (RU): ......Я действительно рада тому, что могу разделить с ними ношу моих переживаний как с друзьями.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu estava realmente feliz de ter amigas nas quais pudesse compartilhar tais emoções.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……能有朋友與我分享這些感情，真的很高興。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……能有朋友与我分享这些感情，真的很高兴。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ero davvero felice di condividere delle emozioni con le mie amiche.

Steam (ST): It's said that they were originally furniture that existed to carry out {f:5:Beatrice}'s cruel sacrifice ceremony.
Umineko Project (UP): It's said that they were originally furniture that existed to carry out {f:5:Beatrice}'s cruel sacrificial ritual.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らは本来は、ベアトリーチェの残酷な生贄の儀式を行なうための家具だったという。
Russian (RU): Согласно им, поначалу они были мебелью, созданной для проведения кровавого ритуала {f:5:Беатриче}.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi dito que originalmente elas eram mobílias que existiam para conduzir o ritual de sacrifícios da {f:5:Beatrice}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她們原本是執行貝阿朵莉切殘酷的獻祭儀式的家具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她们原本是执行贝阿朵莉切残酷的献祭仪式的家具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si dice che in origine fossero mobili che esistevano per portare a compimento la crudele cerimonia sacrificale di Beatrice.

Steam (ST): ...According to the occult message bottle I hated, ...it seems that several of them even attacked my family.
Umineko Project (UP): ......If that sickening occult message bottle was to be believed, ...it seemed that several among them even attacked my family.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私を不快にさせる、オカルトメッセージボトルによるならば、…彼女らの何人かは、私の家族を手に掛けてさえいるらしい。
Russian (RU): ......А судя по записке из бутылки, которая мне совсем не нравится, некоторые из них даже нападали на мою семью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......De acordo com aquela desagradável mensagem oculta na garrafa, ...parece que várias delas atacaram minha família.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……根據令我不快的，有著神秘學氣息的瓶中信的內容，…貌似她們中的某幾個甚至對我的家人下過手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……根据令我不快的，有着神秘学气息的瓶中信的内容，…貌似她们中的某几个甚至对我的家人下过手。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Secondo quell'occulto messaggio in bottiglia, che non gradivo... sembra che alcune di loro avessero addirittura attaccato la mia famiglia.

Steam (ST): But I don't believe that, and it's pointless to question them about it.
Umineko Project (UP): But I didn't believe that, and it would be pointless to question them about it.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、私はそれを信じないし、彼女らにそれを詰問しても無駄なことだ。
Russian (RU): Но я считаю, что бессмысленно подвергать их сомнению.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas eu não acredito nela, e não faria sentido questioná‐las sobre isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，我不信這些話，去拿這事質問她們也是毫無意義的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，我不信这些话，去拿这事质问她们也是毫无意义的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma non ci credo, ed è inutile domandarlo a loro.

Steam (ST): They are furniture, so they only respond to their master's requests.
Umineko Project (UP): They're furniture, so all they do is respond to their master's requests.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らは家具なのだから、主のリクエストに応えるだけなのだ。
Russian (RU): Они мебель, и потому вынуждены повиноваться господину.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas são mobílias, portanto tudo o que elas fazem é responder às ordens de seus mestres.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她們是家具，所以她們只是在回應主人的要求。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她们是家具，所以她们只是在回应主人的要求。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono mobili, quindi rispondono solo agli ordini del loro padrone.

Steam (ST): Even if they really did attack my family, I can't hate them.
Umineko Project (UP): Even if they really had attacked my family, I couldn't hate them.
PC Japanese (JP): もし本当に彼女らが私の家族に手を掛けていたとしても、彼女らを憎むことは出来ない。
Russian (RU): Даже если они действительно нападали на мою семью, я не могу ненавидеть их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo se elas realmente tiverem atacado minha família, eu não poderia odiá‐las.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 即便她們真的對我的家人下過手，我也無法憎恨她們。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 即便她们真的对我的家人下过手，我也无法憎恨她们。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se avessero attaccato sul serio la mia famiglia, non potrei odiarle.

Steam (ST): ......The one I really hated... was the Golden Witch, {f:5:Beatrice}. ......Or else that ringleader of the Ushiromiya Suspicion, Aunt Eva.
Umineko Project (UP): ......The one I really hated......was the Golden Witch {f:5:Beatrice}.{n}.........Or else the one at the very center of Rokkenjimagate, Aunt Eva.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私が本当に憎むのは、……黄金の魔女ベアトリーチェ。………もしくは、六軒島疑惑の張本人、絵羽伯母さん。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……私が本当に憎むのは、……黄金の魔女ベアトリーチェ。{n}………もしくは、六軒島疑惑の張本人、絵羽伯母さん。
Russian (RU): ......Потому что я ненавижу Золотую Ведьму {f:5:Беатриче}.{n}.........Или главную подозреваемую, тётю Еву.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A única que eu realmente odiei......foi a Bruxa Dourada {f:5:Beatrice}.{n}.........Ou então, a suspeita de se a perpetrador do Caso Rokkenjima, a tia Eva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……我真正憎恨的是，……黃金的魔女貝阿朵莉切。{n}………或，六軒島疑雲的元凶，繪羽姑母。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……我真正憎恨的是，……黄金的魔女贝阿朵莉切。{n}………或，六轩岛疑云的元凶，绘羽姑母。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quello che odiavo davvero... era la Strega Dorata Beatrice. ... O magari il capobanda dei sospetti sugli Ushiromiya, Eva oba-san.

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "...Ange-sama, quickly, the next page."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Ange‐sama, hurry up, next page."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……縁寿さまぁ、早くっ、次のページっ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……縁寿さまぁ、早くっ、次のページっ」
Russian (RU): "......Энджи‐сама, скорее, страница, следующая страница!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Ange‐sama, rápido, próxima página."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……緣壽小姐，快點，下一頁。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……缘寿小姐，快点，下一页。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ange-sama, presto, la prossima pagina."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Oh, sorry. ......I'm tired. Mind if I take a break?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Oh, sorry. .........I'm tired. Mind if I take a break?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "In the first year of elementary school, on a Japanese language test, there was a problem when I was given a picture of a gun and was told to write its name in four squares. It got marked wrong because I wrote the English word "rifle" in katakana ({ruby:ra‐i‐fu‐ru:{p:0:ライフル}})."
Umineko Project (UP): "In the first year of elementary school, on a Japanese language test, there was a question where I was given a picture of a gun and four squares, and it said to write its name in the four squares. Wrote "rifle"—{ruby:ra‐i‐fu‐ru:{p:0:ライフル}}—and got it marked wrong."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "In the first year of elementary school, on a Japanese language test, there was a problem when I was given a picture of a gun and was told to write its name in four squares. It got marked wrong because I wrote the English word "rifle" in katakana ({ruby:ra‐i‐fu‐ru:{p:0:{p:0:ライフル}}})."
PC Japanese (JP): 「小学１年生の時、国語のテストで、鉄砲のイラストの脇に四角が４マスあって、そこに名前を書きなさいって問題があった。ライフルって書いたらバツだった。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「小学１年生の時、国語のテストで、鉄砲のイラストの脇に四角が４マスあって、そこに名前を書きなさいって問題があった。ライフルって書いたらバツだった」
Russian (RU): "В первом классе начальной школы, когда был тест по японскому, Марии была дана картинка пистолета и четыре квадратика, в которые нужно было вписать слово 'пистолет'. Вписала '{ruby:rifle:ружьё}', {ruby:ra‐i‐fu‐ru:{p:0:ライフル}}, и его зачеркнули."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "No primeiro ano do fundamental, em uma prova de japonês, tinha uma questão onde mostrava o desenho de uma arma e quatro quadrados em branco, dizendo para escrever o nome dela nesses quadrados. Escrevi "rifle" — {ruby:ra‐i‐fu‐ru:{p:0:ライフル}} — e errei."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「小學一年級的國語考試上，有道在畫著把槍的圖邊留有四個四角形空格的看圖填空。真里亞填了“ライフル”（rifle），結果得到了個叉。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「小学一年级的国语考试上，有道在画着把枪的图边留有四个四角形空格的看图填空。真里亚填了“ライフル”（rifle），结果得到了个叉。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Al primo anno di scuola elementare, in un test di lingua giapponese, c'era un problema in cui erano stati dati a Maria l'immagine di una pistola e quattro quadrati, e le era stato detto di scriverne il nome nei quattro quadrati. Maria è stata punita per aver scritto ‘rifle’ ({p:0:ライフル}/raifuru)."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Há uma diferença entre criação e invocação. ......E...ressurreição também é diferente."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「創造與召喚不同。……並且，返魂也與這兩者不同。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「创造与召唤不同。……并且，返魂也与这两者不同。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "...... So, your greatest wish really is to revive your family...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "............... So your greatest wish really is to revive your family...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………。やっぱり、一番の願いは、家族を蘇らせること…？」
Russian (RU): "............Так получается, что твое самое сокровенное желание — воскресить семью?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............... Então seu maior desejo é realmente reviver sua família...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……………。果然，緣壽最大的願望，是復甦家人嗎…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………。果然，缘寿最大的愿望，是复苏家人吗…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Quindi il tuo più grande desiderio è davvero far rivivere la tua famiglia...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Yeah. ......I have a vessel for it. This."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah. ............I have a vessel for it. This."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん。…………依り代は持ってるよ。これ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん。…………依り代は持ってるよ。これ」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. ............Tenho um receptáculo para isso. Isto."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。…………我帶有依代。這個。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯。…………我带有依代。这个。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì. ... Ho qualcosa per poterlo fare. Questo."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "That's right. ...I'm sure that hair accessory will eventually become the key to summoning Battler. ...The rest is up to your training, Ange."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes. ...I'm sure that hair accessory will become the key to summoning Battler someday. ......The rest is up to your training, Ange."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうだね。…その頭飾りなら、いつかきっと、戦人を呼び出す鍵になるよ。……あとは縁寿の修行次第だね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうだね。…その髪飾りなら、いつかきっと、戦人を呼び出す鍵になるよ。……あとは縁寿の修行次第だね」
Russian (RU): "Верно. ...Твоя заколка станет ключом к призыву Баттлера. ......А всё остальное зависит от того, как ты подготовишься, Энджи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. ...Eu tenho certeza que esse acessório de cabelo se tornará a chave para invocar o Battler algum dia. ......O resto depende do seu treinamento."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是呢。…這個頭飾，總有一天，一定能成為召喚出戰人的鑰匙喲。……剩下的，就看緣壽自身的修行了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是呢。…这个头饰，总有一天，一定能成为召唤出战人的钥匙哟。……剩下的，就看缘寿自身的修行了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Già. ... Sono sicura che questo accessorio per capelli diventerà in futuro la chiave per richiamare Battler. ... Il resto dipende dai tuoi allenamenti, Ange."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Although not knowing how long it'll take is enough to make me cry."
Umineko Project (UP): "Although not knowing how long that's going to take makes me cry."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それが、いつまで掛かるのかわからないのが泣けるけれども。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それが、いつまで掛かるのかわからないのが泣けるけれども」
Russian (RU): "Хоть я даже и не знаю, сколько времени займёт, всё равно слёзы на глазах выступают."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Embora não saber quanto tempo isto vai levar me faz querer chorar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過，天知道這要花多長時間，想哭。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过，天知道这要花多长时间，想哭。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Anche se non sapere quanto tempo ci vorrà, è abbastanza per farmi piangere."

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu... Stay strong, even if it's tough... If you don't give up, Ange, it will definitely, definitely come true someday...’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryu... Stay strong, even if it's tough... If you don't give up, it will definitely definitely happen someday...’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅ…。辛くてもしっかり…。縁寿が諦めなければ、絶対に絶対にいつか叶うよ…。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『うりゅ…。辛くてもしっかり…。縁寿が諦めなければ、絶対に絶対にいつか叶うよ…』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю... Мужайся, даже если тебе тяжело... Если ты не сдашься, Энджи, твоё желание когда‐нибудь обязательно сбудется.{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryu... Fique forte, mesmo que seja difícil... Se você não desistir, um dia certamente vai se tornar realidade...’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『嗚溜…。雖然很辛苦，但請堅持…。只要緣壽不放棄，總有一天，絕對絕對能實現心願…』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『呜溜…。虽然很辛苦，但请坚持…。只要缘寿不放弃，总有一天，绝对绝对能实现心愿…』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Uryu... sii forte, anche se è dura... se non ti arrendi, Ange, sicurissimamente un giorno il tuo desiderio si avvererà... {p:0:』}

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "If someone gave me some proof that it'd definitely be granted, at least that would calm my heart."
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm sure I'd feel a lot more at ease if someone would just give me some proof of that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「絶対に叶うという保証を、誰かがくれたなら、きっと心も休まるでしょうにね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「絶対に叶うという保証を、誰かがくれたなら、きっと心も休まるでしょうにね」
Russian (RU): "Если кто‐нибудь смог дать мне гарантию, что оно сбудется, то тогда у меня хотя бы здорово полегчало на душе."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se alguém me desse alguma prova de que isso vai mesmo acontecer, eu ficaria muito aliviada."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「要是有誰向我保證過絕對會實現，我一定也就能安下心來了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「要是有谁向我保证过绝对会实现，我一定也就能安下心来了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se qualcuno mi fornisse la prova che verrà esaudito di sicuro, almeno potrebbe calmare il mio cuore."

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu! Then I guarantee it! Without a doubt, Ange will surely have her wish granted someday!’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryu! Then I'll guarantee it! No doubt about it, someday, you'll be able to make your wish come true!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅ！　ならボクが保証するー！　縁寿はいつかきっと、必ず願いを叶えられるよ！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю! Тогда я гарантирую тебе! Твоё желание однажды вне всяких сомнений сбудется!{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryu! Então eu garanto! Sem dúvida quanto a isso, algum dia, você será capaz de tornar seu desejo realidade!’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『嗚溜！那麼，偶來保證——！緣壽總有一天，必定能實現心願！』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『呜溜！那么，偶来保证——！缘寿总有一天，必定能实现心愿！』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Uryu! Allora lo garantisco io! Senza dubbio, il desiderio di Ange verrà esaudito un giorno!{p:0:』}

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...Thanks. I'm glad to hear it, even if you're just saying it to console me."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Thanks. I'm happy even for consolation."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ありがと。気休めでも嬉しいわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……ありがと。気休めでも嬉しいわ」
Russian (RU): "Спасибо. Я рада и такому утешению."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Obrigada. Eu fico feliz, mesmo que você só esteja tentando me consolar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……謝謝。就算是安慰話，我也很高興哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……谢谢。就算是安慰话，我也很高兴哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Grazie. Sono felice, anche se è solo per consolarmi."

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘It's not like that, uryu-.’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘It's not consolation...uryuu.’
PC Japanese (JP): 『気休めじゃないよぅ、うりゅー。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『気休めじゃないよぅ、うりゅー』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Это не утешение, урю.{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Não é consolação...uryuu.’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『不是安慰話喲，嗚溜——。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『不是安慰话哟，呜溜——。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Non ti sto consolando, uryu. {p:0:』}

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "Stop it, Ange. That kind of emotion will turn into the magic-resisting toxin. The feeling that your dreams will definitely come true is the best seed that buds into magic power."
Umineko Project (UP): "Stop it, Ange. That kind of emotion will become the anti‐magic toxin. The feeling that your dreams will definitely come true is the best seed that buds into magic power."
PC Japanese (JP): 「駄目だよ、縁寿。そういう感情は反魔法の毒素になるよ。夢は必ず叶うって気持ちが、一番よく芽吹く魔力の種なんだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「駄目だよ、縁寿。そういう感情は反魔法の毒素になるよ。夢は必ず叶うって気持ちが、一番よく芽吹く魔力の種なんだよ」
Russian (RU): "Перестань, Энджи. Такое чувство может преобразиться в антимагический токсин. Тогда как нет лучшего семени, порождающего магическую силу, чем чувство, что твои мечты обязательно сбудутся."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pare, Ange. Esse tipo de emoção vai se transformar em toxina antimagia.{n}O sentimento de que seus sonhos vão se tornar realidade é a melhor semente que faz brotar o poder mágico."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不行喲，緣壽。這種感情會化為反魔法毒素的。相信夢想必會實現的信念，是最易發芽的魔力之種喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不行哟，缘寿。这种感情会化为反魔法毒素的。相信梦想必会实现的信念，是最易发芽的魔力之种哟。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Basta, Ange. Emozioni del genere diventeranno tossina anti-magia. {n}Il sentimento che i tuoi desideri diverranno realtà è il miglior seme per far germogliare il potere magico."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...... ...That's right, sorry, Teacher."
Umineko Project (UP): "............ ......You're right, sorry, Master."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………。……そうね、ごめんなさいお師匠様。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………。……そうね、ごめんなさいお師匠様」
Russian (RU): "...............Пожалуй, что так. Извини, наставница."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............ ......Você está certa, desculpe, professora."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………。……是呢，對不起，師傅大人。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………。……是呢，对不起，师傅大人。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Giusto, mi dispiace, Maestra."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "You need to be a bit greedier, Ange-sama. Go however far it takes to get the thing you desire! You're lacking the willpower to never give up until you get it!"
Umineko Project (UP): "You need to be a bit greedier, Ange‐sama. Go however far for the thing that you desire! Never give up until you get it! That's the willpower you're lacking!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「縁寿さまは少し強欲さが足りないのよ。欲しい物のためにはどこまでも！　手に入れるまで絶対に諦めないという、根性が足りない！」
Russian (RU): "Вам надо быть поалчней, Энджи‐сама. Заходите так далеко, насколько это потребуется ради обретения объекта ваших желаний! Вам не достаёт силы воли не сдаваться до тех пор, пока не заполучите желанное!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você precisa ser um pouco mais gananciosa, Ange‐sama. Vá até onde precisar, pelas coisas que você desejar! Nunca desista até que você as consiga! Essa força de vontade é o que falta a você!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「緣壽小姐還稍微缺點貪婪。缺少為想要的東西堅持到底！在到手前絕不放棄的，毅力！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「缘寿小姐还稍微缺点贪婪。缺少为想要的东西坚持到底！在到手前绝不放弃的，毅力！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Deve essere un po' più avida, Ange-sama. Si spinga ovunque per ottenere ciò che desidera! Non ha la volontà di resistere fino ad ottenerla!"

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu-! That isn't true, Ange's doing her best...!’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryuu! That isn't true, Ange is doing her best...!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅー！　そんなことないよ、縁寿はがんばってるよ…！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю‐! Неправда, Энджи старается изо всех сил!{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryuu! Isso não é verdade, a Ange está fazendo o seu melhor...!’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『嗚溜——！沒這種事，緣壽很努力喲…！』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『呜溜——！没这种事，缘寿很努力哟…！』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Uryu-! Non è vero, Ange sta facendo del suo meglio...!{p:0:』}

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Thanks, Sakutaro, Mammon. Crying about it won't help anything. There's nothing I can do except hang in there. I'll try hard. I'll grit my teeth. I'll definitely make my dreams come true. With certainty."
Umineko Project (UP): "Thanks, Sakutaro, Mammon. Crying about it won't help anything. There's nothing I can do except hang in there. I'll try hard. Grit my teeth. And I'll definitely make my dreams come true. For certain."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ありがとう、さくたろ、マモン。泣き言なんて何の足しにもならないもんね。私にはただがんばるしか道はないのよ。努力するわ。歯を食いしばってね。そして必ず夢を叶えるわ。絶対に。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ありがとう、さくたろ、マモン。泣き言なんて何の足しにもならないもんね。私にはただがんばるしか道はないのよ。努力するわ。歯を食いしばってね。そして必ず夢を叶えるわ。絶対に」
Russian (RU): "Спасибо, Сакутаро, Мамона. Однако сокрушениями по этому поводу делу не поможешь. Мне ничего не остаётся, кроме как держаться. Я буду упорно трудиться. Стиснув зубы. И обязательно заставлю свои мечты сбыться. Непременно."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Obrigada, Sakutaro, Mammon. Chorar sobre isso não vai ajudar em nada. Não há nada que eu possa fazer além de continuar. Farei todo o possível. Cerrarei meus dentes e persistirei. E definitivamente tornarei meus sonhos em realidade. Com certeza."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「謝謝，櫻太郎、馬蒙。說喪氣話可不會有任何進展。我只有努力這一條路可走。我會努力的。咬緊牙關。一定要實現夢想。絕對。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「谢谢，樱太郎、马蒙。说丧气话可不会有任何进展。我只有努力这一条路可走。我会努力的。咬紧牙关。一定要实现梦想。绝对。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Grazie Sakutarou, Mammon. Lamentarsene non servirà a niente. Non posso fare altro che resistere. Proverò con tutta me stessa. Stringerò i denti. Avvererò senza dubbio i miei sogni. Senza dubbio."

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu! You're awesome, Ange, do your best! Mammon and I will support you!’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryu! You're awesome, Ange, do your best! Mammon and I will support youuu!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅ！　縁寿偉いよ、がんばろう！　ボクもマモンも応援するー！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю! Ты потрясающая, Энджи, удачи тебе! Мамона и я будет поддерживать тебя!{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryu! Você é incrível, Ange, faça o seu melhor! A Mammon e eu vamos apoiar você!’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『嗚溜！緣壽好棒，加油加油！偶與馬蒙也會聲援你的——！』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『呜溜！缘寿好棒，加油加油！偶与马蒙也会声援你的——！』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Uryu! Sei fantastica, Ange, fai del tuo meglio! Io e Mammon ti saremo sempre accanto-!{p:0:』}

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Yes, we'll support you. The greedier our master is, the more our worth will increase."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, we will. The greedier our master is, the more our worth will increase."
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇ、応援します。主が強欲であればあるほど、私たちの価値も上がるというもの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ、応援します。主が強欲であればあるほど、私たちの価値も上がるというもの」
Russian (RU): "Да, мы поддержим вас. Чем алчней наша госпожа, тем выше наша цена."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, vamos sim. Quanto mais gananciosa nossa mestra for, mais nosso valor vai aumentar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是的，我們都會聲援您。畢竟，主人越是貪婪，我們的價值就會變得越高嘛。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是的，我们都会声援您。毕竟，主人越是贪婪，我们的价值就会变得越高嘛。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì, la aiuteremo. Più è avido il nostro padrone, più il nostro valore aumenterà."

Speaker: Beelzebub
Steam (ST): "More importantly, Ange-samaa! We've finally got 10 people gathered heeere!"
Umineko Project (UP): "More importantly, Ange‐samaa! We have ten whole people here, sooo..."

Russian (RU): "Что важнее, Энджи‐сама‐а! Нас наконец‐то набралось тут 10 человек!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mais importante, Ange‐samaa! Temos várias pessoas aqui, entãooo..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「聽我說，緣壽小姐！難得有十人聚在一起——！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「听我说，缘寿小姐！难得有十人聚在一起——！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E soprattutto, Ange-samaa! Finalmente ci sono 10 persone radunate qui!"

Speaker: Asmodeus
Steam (ST): "We planned to have everyone play shiritori or something!"
Umineko Project (UP): "We were thinking, maybe we could all play {c:86EF9C:shiritori} together or something!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「みんなでしりとりでもして遊ぼうって提案がありましてぇ！」
Russian (RU): "Мы собирались все вместе сыграть в {c:86EF9C:ширитори} или что‐нибудь в этом роде!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nós estávamos pensando que talvez pudéssemos jogar {c:86EF9C:shiritori} juntas ou algo assim!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我们提议，大家一起来玩词语接龙！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Avevamo intenzione di far giocare tutti a {c:86EF9C:shiritori} o qualcosa del genere!"

Umineko Project (UP): "Penalty if you lose! Let me nibble your ea~rs!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「負けたら罰ゲーム！　私に耳をかじらせて〜！」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Com uma penalidade para quem perder! Deixe‐me morder suas oreli~nhas"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「输了就玩惩罚游戏！让我啃耳朵～！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se perdi, devi pagare pegno! Fatemi mordicchiare le orecchie di qualcu~no!"

Speaker: Satan
Steam (ST): "Come on, is hunger the only thing inside that head of yours?!"
