Russian (RU): "'{ruby:gesuidou:Дренажная система}', '{ruby:umetatechi:обретённые земли}', '{ruby:chikashitsu:подвал}'. Что‐то вроде такого?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "{ruby:gesuidou:‘Rede de drenagem’}, {ruby:umetatechi:"Aterramento marítimo"}, {ruby:chikashitsu:"Porão"}. Algo assim?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「“{ruby:gesuidou:下水道}”、“{ruby:umetatechi:填埋地}”、“{ruby:chikashitsu:地下室}”。小試牛刀哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「“{ruby:gesuidou:下水道}”、“{ruby:umetatechi:填埋地}”、“{ruby:chikashitsu:地下室}”。小试牛刀哦？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "‘Sistema di drenaggio’ (gesuidou), ‘Terra bonificata’ (umetatechi), ‘Cantina’ (chikashitsu). Qualcosa del genere?"

Speaker: Leviathan
Steam (ST): "Onee-sama, those are all pretty crummy words, *giggle*!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Onee‐sama, those are all pretty unrefined words, *giggle*!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お姉様、何だか品のない単語ばっかりー、くすくす！」
Russian (RU): "Онее‐сама, всё это неизящные слова, *хи‐хи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Onee‐sama, essas são todas palavras nada refinadas, *risos*!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「姐姐，怎麼盡是接些沒品的詞呀——，嘻嘻！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「姐姐，怎么尽是接些没品的词呀——，嘻嘻！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Onee-sama, queste non sono parole molto raffinate, *giggle*!"

Speaker: Lucifer
Steam (ST): "S-So what? Then why don't you try following up with something refined!! Anyway, that's three points for me. The next one's "tsu", okay, "tsu"!"
Umineko Project (UP): "S‐so what, why don't you try following up with something refined, then!! Anyway, that's three points for me. The next one's "tsu", alright, "tsu"!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「な、何よ、じゃあ品のいい単語で続けてみなさいよっ！！とにかく私、３点ね。次は“つ”よ、“つ”！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「な、何よ、じゃあ品のいい単語で続けてみなさいよっ！！　とにかく私、３点ね。次は“つ”よ、“つ”！」
Russian (RU): "Н‐ну и что, тогда почему бы тебе ни придумать что‐нибудь изящное в продолжение! В любом случае, мне три очка. Дальше 'цу', хорошо? 'Цу'!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E‐E daí, então por que não tenta seguir com algo refinado!! De qualquer forma, são três pontos para mim. A próxima é com "tsu", certo, "tsu"!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「怎、怎麼，那、那你來接個有品的詞看看呀！！總之我得三分。下一個是“tsu”喲、“tsu”！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「怎、怎么，那、那你来接个有品的词看看呀！！总之我得三分。下一个是“tsu”哟、“tsu”！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E... e allora, allora perché non provi tu ad andare avanti con qualche parola raffinata!! Comunque, sono tre punti per me. Il prossimo è ‘tsu’, eh, ‘tsu’!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "I've never played such a weird shiritori before. Uu-uu-! It's fun!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Never played such a weird shiritori before. Uu‐uu! Fun!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「こんな変なしりとり初めて。うーうー！　面白い！」
Russian (RU): "Никогда прежде не играла в такое странное ширитори. У‐у‐у! Интересно!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nunca brinquei de um shiritori tão estranho. Uu‐uu! Tão divertido!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「第一次碰上這麼怪的接龍。嗚——嗚——！好玩！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「第一次碰上这么怪的接龙。呜——呜——！好玩！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mai giocato ad uno shiritori così strano. Uu-uu-! Interessante!"

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu-! I don't get it at all, but it's fun. Uryu-!’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryuu! I don't get it at all, but it's fun. Uryuu!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅー！　全然わかんないけど面白い。うりゅー！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю! Я совсем ничего не понимаю, но это интересно. Урю‐!{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryuu! Eu não entendi nada, mas é divertido. Uryuu!’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『嗚溜——！雖然完全想不出來，但好好玩。嗚溜——！』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『呜溜——！虽然完全想不出来，但好好玩。呜溜——！』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Uryu-! Non ci capisco nulla, ma è interessante. Uryu-!{p:0:』}

Steam (ST): I've played normal shiritori before, but I've never experienced a shiritori this weird.
Umineko Project (UP): I'd played normal shiritori before, but this kind of weird shiritori was a new experience for me.
PC Japanese (JP): 普通のしりとりをしたことはあるけれど、こんなおかしなしりとりは始めての経験だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 普通のしりとりをしたことはあるけれど、こんなおかしなしりとりは初めての経験だ。
Russian (RU): Мне доводилось играть в нормальное ширитори, но в такое странное ещё нет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu já brinquei de shiritori normal antes, mas esse shiritori peculiar é uma experiência nova para mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然有玩過普通的接龍，但這等怪異的接龍倒是頭一次玩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然有玩过普通的接龙，但这等怪异的接龙倒是头一次玩。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ho giocato allo shiritori normale prima di questo, ma non ho mai provato uno shiritori così strano.

Steam (ST): There's only the lively Seven Sisters, Maria onee-chan, Sakutaro, and me.
Umineko Project (UP): The Seven Sisters, who would be lively enough just on their own; Maria onee‐chan; Sakutaro; and me.
PC Japanese (JP): ただでさえ賑やかな七姉妹に、真里亞お姉ちゃんにさくたろに、私。
Russian (RU): Есть только бойкие семь сестёр, Мария онее‐чан, Сакутаро и я.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As Sete Irmãs, que sozinhas já são muito animadas; a Maria onee‐chan; o Sakutaro; e eu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 本就夠鬧騰了的七姐妹，再加上真里亞姐姐、櫻太郎，以及我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 本就够闹腾了的七姐妹，再加上真里亚姐姐、樱太郎，以及我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ci sono solo le vivaci Sette Sorelle, Maria Onee-chan, Sakutarou, e io.

Steam (ST): I'm now surrounded by friends that are so fun to be with.
Umineko Project (UP): I was now surrounded by friends that were just so fun.
PC Japanese (JP): こんな楽しい仲間たちに、私は今や囲まれている。
Russian (RU): Теперь я окружена друзьями и мне так весело.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estava cercada por amigos tão divertidos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此刻的我被圍在了此等愉快的伙伴們之中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此刻的我被围在了此等愉快的伙伴们之中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono circondata da amici così divertenti.

Steam (ST): ...The courage to accept a world of magic, a world of witches...
Umineko Project (UP): ......The courage to accept a world of magic, a world of witches...
PC Japanese (JP): ……魔法の世界、魔女の世界を受け容れる勇気。
Russian (RU): .....Смелость принять мир магии и мир ведьмы...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A coragem para aceitar o mundo da magia, o mundo das bruxas...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……去接受魔法的世界、魔女的世界的勇氣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……去接受魔法的世界、魔女的世界的勇气。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il coraggio di accettare un mondo magico, un mondo di streghe...

Steam (ST): ...That alone didn't change the fact that I was still locked up in an academy, without a single friend in my class.
Umineko Project (UP): ...That alone wouldn't change the fact that I was locked up in an academy, without a single friend in my class.
PC Japanese (JP): …それを持つだけで、私は相変わらず学園に閉じ込められていて、クラスにはたったひとりの友達もいないことに変わりはない。
Russian (RU): Одно это не изменило факта, что я всё ещё была заточена в этой академии без единой подруги из своего класса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Apenas isso não muda o fato de que eu estava trancada dentro da academia, sem uma única amiga na minha classe.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …僅憑這勇氣，並不能改變我被關在學園裡，在班上連一個朋友都沒有的事實。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …仅凭这勇气，并不能改变我被关在学园里，在班上连一个朋友都没有的事实。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Questo non cambiava il fatto che fossi ancora bloccata in un'accademia, senza un solo amico nella mia classe.

Steam (ST): But despite that, I'm able to have such a fun and lively time.
Umineko Project (UP): But I was having such a fun and merry time regardless.
PC Japanese (JP): にもかかわらず、こんなにも楽しく賑やかに過ごせている。
Russian (RU): Но несмотря на это, я так весело и энергично провожу время.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas apesar de tudo, eu me divertia muito, sempre tão animado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可儘管如此，現在的我卻在如此熱熱鬧鬧地開心度日。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可尽管如此，现在的我却在如此热热闹闹地开心度日。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma nonostante ciò, riesco ad avere momenti così divertenti e vivaci.

Steam (ST): ......I'll also become a witch, like Maria onee-chan.
Umineko Project (UP): .........I'll become a witch like Maria onee‐chan.
PC Japanese (JP): ………私も、真里亞お姉ちゃんのような、魔女になろう。
Russian (RU): .........Я тоже стану ведьмой, как Мария онее‐чан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Eu irei me tornar uma bruxa como a Maria onee‐chan.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………我也想成為像真里亞姐姐那樣的魔女。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………我也想成为像真里亚姐姐那样的魔女。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Diventerò anch'io una strega, come Maria Onee-chan.

Steam (ST): And someday, I'll add my family to this fun circle.
Umineko Project (UP): And someday, I'll add my family to this happy circle.
PC Japanese (JP): そしていつの日にか、この楽しい輪に、家族も加えよう。
Russian (RU): И когда‐нибудь добавлю в этот весёлый кружок свою семью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E um dia, vou adicionar a minha família a este círculo feliz.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，在將來的某一天，讓我的家人也加入這個愉快的社交圈。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，在将来的某一天，让我的家人也加入这个愉快的社交圈。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E un giorno, aggiungerò la mia famiglia a questo divertente circolo.

Steam (ST): Dad, Mom. And Onii-chan.
Umineko Project (UP): Mom, Dad. And Onii‐chan.
PC Japanese (JP): お父さん、お母さん。そしてお兄ちゃん。
Russian (RU): Папу, маму. И братика.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha mãe, meu pai. E o onii‐chan.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 爸爸、媽媽。還有哥哥。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 爸爸、妈妈。还有哥哥。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Papà, Mamma. E Onii-chan.

Steam (ST): ...And if possible, George onii-chan and Jessica onee-chan. And the other relatives.
Umineko Project (UP): ......If possible, George onii‐chan and Jessica onee‐chan, too. And my other relatives.
PC Japanese (JP): ……もし許されるなら、譲治お兄ちゃんや朱志香お姉ちゃんも。他の親戚たちも。
Russian (RU): .....И, если получится, Джорджа онии‐чана и Джессику онее‐чан. И всех остальных родственников.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Se possível, o George onii‐chan e a Jessica onee‐chan também. E todos os meus outros parentes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……如果可以的話，我還想召喚出讓治哥哥，朱志香姐姐。還有其他親戚。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……如果可以的话，我还想召唤出让治哥哥，朱志香姐姐。还有其他亲戚。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Se possibile, George 0nii-chan e Jessica Onee-chan. E gli altri parenti.

Steam (ST): I'll call everyone, everyone here without a single person missing, ...and we'll all gather together.
Umineko Project (UP): I'll call everyone, everyone here, without a single person missing, ...and we'll all be gathered together.
PC Japanese (JP): みんなみんなここに呼んで、誰一人欠けることなく、…みんなで集まろう。
Russian (RU): Я призову сюда всех, всех без исключения, каждого человека... И мы соберёмся дружной компанией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu irei chamar todos, todos, sem deixar nenhuma pessoa de fora, ...e nós vamos estar todos reunidos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 把大家都召喚到此處，一個不少，…大家一起團聚。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 把大家都召唤到此处，一个不少，…大家一起团聚。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Chiamerò tutti, tutti qui senza che nessuno manchi... e ci riuniremo insieme.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...This is my...dream. ...That's right. Until I make that come true, I definitely won't lose heart."
Umineko Project (UP): "......That is my...dream. ......Yes, and until I make it come true, I'm definitely not going to lose heart."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……それが私の、夢。……そうよ。私はそれを叶えるまで、絶対に挫けない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……それが私の、夢。……そうよ。私はそれを叶えるまで、絶対に挫けない」
Russian (RU): ".....Такова... моя мечта. .......Точно. Пока я не преуспею в этом, я ни за что не отчаюсь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Esse é meu...sonho. ......Sim, e até que isso se torne realidade, eu jamais me deixarei abater."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這就是我的，夢想。……對。在實現這個夢想前，我絕對不氣餒。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这就是我的，梦想。……对。在实现这个梦想前，我绝对不气馁。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Questo è il mio... sogno. ... È così. Non mi rassegnerò, finché non lo avrò avverato."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "I'm sure you'll become a Great Witch, Ange-sama. As long as you believe in that. We Seven Stakes of Purgatory will always serve by your side until that day comes."
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm sure you'll become a Great Witch, Ange‐sama. As long as you believe that. We Seven Stakes of Purgatory will always serve by your side until that day comes."
PC Japanese (JP): 「縁寿さまはきっと大魔女になられます。あなたがそうだと信じるだけで。我ら煉獄の七姉妹は、その日まで常にお側にお仕えするでしょう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿さまはきっと大魔女になられます。あなたがそうだと信じるだけで。我ら煉獄の七姉妹は、その日まで常にお側にお仕えするでしょう」
Russian (RU): "Я уверена, вы станете Великой Ведьмой, Энджи‐сама. Пока в вас есть вера. Мы, семь кинжалов чистилища, всегда будем прислуживать вам до прихода этого дня."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu tenho certeza que você vai se tornar uma Grande Bruxa, Ange‐sama. Contanto que você acredite nisso. Nós, Sete Estacas do Purgatório, iremos sempre servir ao seu lado até que este dia chegue."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「緣壽小姐一定能成為大魔女的。只要您堅信這一點。我們煉獄七姐妹將會寸步不離地侍奉您到那一天。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「缘寿小姐一定能成为大魔女的。只要您坚信这一点。我们炼狱七姐妹将会寸步不离地侍奉您到那一天。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sono sicura che diventerai una Grande Strega, Ange-sama. Se lo crederai. {n}Noi, i Sette Pugnali del Purgatorio saremo sempre al suo fianco fino all'avvento di quel giorno."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "You'll be there for me...? No matter how long, ...you'll lend me your strength?"
Umineko Project (UP): "You'll be there...? No matter how long, ......you'll lend me your strength?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「いてくれる…？　いつまでも。……私の力になってくれる？」
Russian (RU): "Ты будешь здесь? И неважно, сколь долгим будет срок... ты поделишься со мной своей силой?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vocês estarão lá...? Não importa quanto tempo demore, ......vocês vão me emprestar a força de vocês?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「會陪著我…？不論何時，……都會為我分憂？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「会陪着我…？不论何时，……都会为我分忧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ci sarete...? Non importa per quanto tempo... voi mi darete la vostra forza?"

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Of course. After all, I'm your friend. Right, Ange-sama?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Of course. After all, I'm your friend, right, Ange‐sama?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「当然。だって私、縁寿さまの友達じゃないですか？」
Russian (RU): "Разумеется. Ведь я, как‐никак, ваш друг, верно, Энджи‐сама?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É claro. Afinal, eu sou sua amiga, certo, Ange‐sama?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這是當然。畢竟，我可是緣壽小姐的朋友吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这是当然。毕竟，我可是缘寿小姐的朋友吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ovvio. Dopotutto, sono sua amica, vero, Ange-sama?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......... ...Yes, that's right. Let's all stick together and play together. Today, and in the future, always, ...always."
Umineko Project (UP): "........................ ......Yes, you are. Let's always stick together and play together. Today, and in the future...forevermore."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………………。……えぇ、そうね。常に全員揃って、みんなで遊びましょう。今も、これからも、ずっと、ずっと。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……………………。……えぇ、そうね。常に全員揃って、みんなで遊びましょう。今も、これからも、ずっと、ずっと」
Russian (RU): "........................Да, это так. Давайте поиграем вместе в дружной компании. Сегодня, в будущем... и всегда... всегда."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "........................ ......Sim, você é. Vamos sempre ficar juntas e brincar juntas. Hoje, e também no futuro...para todo sempre."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……………………。……嗯，是呢。每時每刻，我們都要全員聚在一起，大家一起玩。現在、將來、永遠、永遠。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………………。……嗯，是呢。每时每刻，我们都要全员聚在一起，大家一起玩。现在、将来、永远、永远。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Sì, è così. Stiamo tutte insieme e giochiamo. Oggi, e in futuro... sempre... sempre."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Until the day your dream comes true, Ange-sama."
Umineko Project (UP): "Until the day you can make your dream come true."
PC Japanese (JP): 「縁寿さまが夢を叶えられる日まで。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿さまが夢を叶えられる日まで」
Russian (RU): "До того дня, когда сбудутся ваши мечты, Энджи‐сама."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Até o dia em que seu sonho se tornar realidade."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「直至緣壽小姐實現夢想的那一天。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「直至缘寿小姐实现梦想的那一天。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Fino al giorno in cui il suo sogno si avvererà, Ange-sama."

Steam (ST): The lively, ten-person game of shiritori, alongside a street cut off from time, under the constantly bright rays of the sun, could have continued forever...
Umineko Project (UP): The lively, ten‐person game of shiritori, cut off from time alongside the street, under the forever bright warmth of the sun, continued without end......
PC Japanese (JP): １０人での賑やかなしりとりが、いつまでも温かな日差しの時間のまま切り取られた明るい街並みの中で、いつまでも続けられるのだった……。
Russian (RU): Бойкая игра в ширитори на десять персон, изредка прерываемая улицей, под непрерывными яркими лучами солнца, могла продолжаться вечно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O animado shiritori com dez pessoas, cortado do tempo ao lado da rua, sob o constante calor dos raios do sol, poderia ter continuado para sempre......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 十人一起鬧哄哄地玩的接龍遊戲，於截取出的永遠照射著溫暖陽光的明媚街景中，得以無止境地繼續了下去……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 十人一起闹哄哄地玩的接龙游戏，于截取出的永远照射着温暖阳光的明媚街景中，得以无止境地继续了下去……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il vivace gioco dello shiritori con 10 persone, fuori dal tempo, sotto i raggi costantemente brillanti del sole, poteva essere continuato per sempre...

Steam (ST): "......Wait, seriously? What's going on, Ushiromiya-saan?"
Umineko Project (UP): ".........What. The. Hell. {i:Seriously}, Ushiromiya‐saan?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………マジ、本当、どーゆうわけぇ、右代宮さぁん？」
Russian (RU): ".......Нет, ну в самом деле. {i:Как это понимать}, Уширомия‐са‐ан?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Sério mesmo? {i:O que isso significa}, Ushiromiya‐saan?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………真是的，你是在搞啥呀，右代宮同學？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………真是的，你是在搞啥呀，右代宫同学？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Aspetta, sul serio? Che è successo, Ushiromiya-san?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): [=JPC]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Steam (ST): ...In the end, I wasn't able to get a very good grade on my test.
Umineko Project (UP): ......In the end, I wasn't able to make a very good grade on my test.
PC Japanese (JP): ……結局。私はテストで、大した成績を取ることは出来なかった。
Russian (RU): ....В конечном итоге мне не удалось получить достаточно хорошую оценку по контрольной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......No fim, eu não fui capaz de tirar uma boa nota na prova.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……結果。我在考試上，並沒有取得好成績。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……结果。我在考试上，并没有取得好成绩。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Alla fine. Non sono riuscita ad ottenere un voto molto buono nel mio test.

Steam (ST): I tried memorizing things in my own way, but if you could manage anything by cramming the night before a test, no one would ever worry about tests.
Umineko Project (UP): I had thought I'd memorized things, in my own way, but if you could manage anything by cramming all night like that, no one would worry about tests.
PC Japanese (JP): 私なりに暗記をしたつもりだったが、そんな一夜漬け程度でどうにかなるなら、誰だってテストで悩んだりしない。
Russian (RU): Я попыталась по‐своему запомнить материал, но если бы всё запоминалось одной зубрёжкой на всю ночь, никому бы не пришлось беспокоиться о тестах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu pensei ter memorizado as coisas, da minha maneira, mas se você pudesse gerenciar as coisas passando as noites estudando, ninguém iria ficar preocupada com suas notas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然我有去背過書，但那種臨時抱佛腳管用的話，就沒人會為考試煩心了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然我有去背过书，但那种临时抱佛脚管用的话，就没人会为考试烦心了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Avevo provato a memorizzare le cose con un mio metodo, ma se si potesse fare tutto sgobbando tutta la notte, nessuno si preoccuperebbe dei test.

Steam (ST): "Normally, when you know the problems beforehand, you should be able to pass easily, right? Easily!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Normally, when you know the questions beforehand, you'd ace it easily, right? Easily!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「予め問題がわかってたら、普通、楽勝じゃない？　楽勝ぉ！」
Russian (RU): "Обычно, если заранее знаешь вопросы, можно же с лёгкостью хорошо написать, верно? С лёгкостью!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Normalmente, quando você sabe as questões com antecedência, deveria acertar fácil, certo? Acertar fácil!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「預先知道試題的話一般不是小菜一碟嘛？小菜一碟啊！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「预先知道试题的话一般不是小菜一碟嘛？小菜一碟啊！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Normalmente, quando si conoscono i problemi in anticipo, si riesce a passare facilmente, giusto? Facilmente!"

Steam (ST): "It's true that we didn't go so far as to write the answers into the blanks for you. We thought you'd studied at least that much."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's true that we didn't go so far as to write the answers into the blanks for you. We thought you'd have the sense to study at least that much."
PC Japanese (JP): 「さすがの私たちも、空欄に答えまでは書き込みませんでしたわ。その程度はお勉強してくれると信じてましたからぁ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さすがの私たちも、空欄に答えまでは書き込みませんでしたわ。その程度はお勉強してくれると信じてましたからぁ」
Russian (RU): "Да, мы, конечно, не написали тебе ответы на них. Поскольку подумали, что ты выучишь достаточно материала и сдашь тест."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É verdade que não fomos tão longe a ponto de escrever as questões no vazio para você. Nós pensamos que você tinha ao menos estudado o mínimo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我們再怎麼說，也不會幫到直接把答案填進空欄。因為我們相信你至少學到了這個程度。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我们再怎么说，也不会帮到直接把答案填进空栏。因为我们相信你至少学到了这个程度。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È vero, non abbiamo fatto tanto da scriverti le domande negli spazi vuoti. Perché pensavamo che avessi studiato almeno un po'."

Steam (ST): "What the hell? Come on, are you serious? I can't believe it! They're almost all wrong, aren't they? Did you really study properly?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Oh my God! No frigging way. This is... God almighty...! They're almost all wrong, aren't they? Did you really actually study for this?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「何これ？！　ちょっとマジこれ、信じらんなぁい！　ほとんど駄目じゃない？　あんた本当にちゃんと予習したわけぇ？！」
Russian (RU): "Какого чёрта? Ты это серьёзно? Поверить не могу! У тебя почти повсеместно отвечено неправильно. Ты хоть училась как следует?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O que é isso?! Sério, sem chance. Não consigo acreditar...! Estão quase todas erradas, não estão? Você estudou mesmo pra isso?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這啥呀？！這個真的難以置信！這不幾乎完全不行嘛？你真的有去好好預習？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这啥呀？！这个真的难以置信！这不几乎完全不行嘛？你真的有去好好预习？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ma che diavolo...? Andiamo, stai scherzando? Non ci posso credere! Sono quasi tutte sbagliate, non vedi? Hai davvero studiato come si deve?!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ".........More or less..."
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Più o meno..."

Steam (ST): "This isn't what you call more or less, Ushiromiya-san. ...It's so horrible that it makes me dizzy, okay?"
Umineko Project (UP): "This isn't what you call more or less, Ushiromiya‐san. ......My mind is reeling from how horrible this is."
PC Japanese (JP): 「一応ってレベルじゃありませんことよ、右代宮さん。……ここまでひどいと私、眩暈すらしそうですわよ？」
Russian (RU): "Такой результат 'более и менее' не назовёшь, Уширомия‐сан. Он настолько ужасен, что голова кругом идёт, понимаешь?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso não é o que você chama de mais ou menos, Ushiromiya‐san. ......É tão horrível que estou até ficando tonta."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這可不是“姑且”的程度喲，右代宮同學。……低到這個地步，我都快暈過去了哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这可不是“姑且”的程度哟，右代宫同学。……低到这个地步，我都快晕过去了哦？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Questo non è un ‘più o meno’, Ushiromiya-san. ... È talmente orribile che sono sconcertata, capisci?"

Steam (ST): "Oh, God. Please forgive her for getting a miserable grade on such an easy test... and for making the average score for the entire class plummet...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "O Lord. Please forgive her for getting a miserable grade on such an easy test, and plummeting the average score for the entire class...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「おぉ、神よ。こんなカンタンなテストすら無残な成績を残し、クラス全体の平均点をガタ落ちさせる彼女をどうかお許しください…！」
Russian (RU): "О, Господи. Прошу, прости её за получение столь ужасной оценки за столь простейшую контрольную, из‐за чего средний балл класса упал ниже некуда!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ó Deus. Por favor, perdoe‐a por tirar uma nota tão miserável em uma prova tão fácil, fazendo a nota de toda classe despencar...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哦，神啊。請您千萬原諒，連如此簡單的考試都拿到了慘不忍睹的成績，大大拉低了全班平均分的她吧…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哦，神啊。请您千万原谅，连如此简单的考试都拿到了惨不忍睹的成绩，大大拉低了全班平均分的她吧…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Oh, Dio. Per favore, perdonala per aver ottenuto un voto così basso in un test così facile, e aver fatto cadere a piombo il punteggio medio dell'intera classe...!"

Steam (ST): "*giggle*giggle*giggle*, *cackle*cackle*cackle*, ahahahahahahaha."
Umineko Project (UP): "*giggle*giggle*giggle*, *cackle*cackle*cackle*, ahahahahahahaha."
PC Japanese (JP): 「くすくすくすくす、けらけらけらけら、あははははははは。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「くすくすくすくす、けらけらけらけら、あははははははは」
Russian (RU): "*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*, *хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*, аха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "*risos*risos*risos*, *gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*, ahahahahahahaha."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嘻嘻嘻嘻，呵呵呵呵，啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): [=UP]

Steam (ST): ...The same test had been given in another class first. That test paper had been obtained, so the average score for our class had been unusually high.
Umineko Project (UP): ......The same test had been given to another class first.{n}They had managed to get hold of that test paper, so the average score for this test was unusually high.
PC Japanese (JP): ……同じテストが、先に他のクラスで行なわれた。そのテスト用紙が入手されていたので、今回のテストの平均点は非常に高かった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……同じテストが、先に他のクラスで行なわれた。{n}そのテスト用紙が入手されていたので、今回のテストの平均点は非常に高かった。
Russian (RU): ......Эту контрольную сначала написал другой класс.{n}Моему классу удалось заполучить листок с контрольными вопросами, поэтому средний бал за эту контрольную оказался необычайно высок.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A mesma prova foi entregue para outra classe antes.{n}Elas conseguiram pegar uma dessas provas, por isso a nota média dessa prova foi incomumente alta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……別的班先行考過同樣的考試。{n}由於事先搞到了試卷，所以這次考試的平均分非常高。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……别的班先行考过同样的考试。{n}由于事先搞到了试卷，所以这次考试的平均分非常高。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Lo stesso test era stato dato in precedenza ad un'altra classe. È stato ottenuto il foglio del test, quindi il punteggio medio per questo test è stato insolitamente alto.

Steam (ST): Enough to obscure my slight improvement.
Umineko Project (UP): Enough to obscure my slight improvement.
PC Japanese (JP): 私のささやかな点数アップなど霞む位に。
Russian (RU): Достаточно высок, чтобы затмить моё лёгкое усовершенствование знаний.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pare de obscurecer minha leve melhora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我提高的那一點點分數根本看不出來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我提高的那一点点分数根本看不出来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Abbastanza da oscurare il mio piccolo miglioramento.

Steam (ST): However, ...there were some things I had no excuse for.
Umineko Project (UP): However, ......there were some things that I couldn't make an excuse for.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、……言い訳の余地のない部分も、若干はある。
Russian (RU): Однако... имелось несколько вещей, которым я не могла найти оправдания.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Contudo, ......há algumas coisas para quais eu não tenho desculpas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，……我自身也存在著若干無可辯解之處。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，……我自身也存在着若干无可辩解之处。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Però... c'erano delle cose per cui non mi potevo giustificare.

Steam (ST): If I'd spent that entire day studying like mad, I might've been able to get a slightly higher score.
Umineko Project (UP): If I had spent that entire day studying like mad, I might have been able to get a slightly higher score.
PC Japanese (JP): あの日一日を、死に物狂いで勉強していたなら、あるいはもうちょっとは点数が取れていたかもしれない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): あの日一日を、死に物ぐるいで勉強していたなら、あるいはもうちょっとは点数が取れていたかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Если бы я потратила целый день, учась как сумасшедшая, то смогла бы получить оценку повыше.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu tivesse passado a noite inteira estudando como louca, eu poderia ter sido capaz de tirar uma nota um pouco melhor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那天，要是一整天都在拼死學習的話，也許就能取得更高點的分數了吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那天，要是一整天都在拼死学习的话，也许就能取得更高点的分数了吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se avessi speso un giorno intero a studiare come una pazza, avrei potuto ottenere un punteggio ancora più alto.

Steam (ST): ...But I hadn't gone that far.
Umineko Project (UP): ......But I hadn't gone that far.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし私はそこまではしなかった。
Russian (RU): ......Но увы, я так не поступила.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas eu não fui tão longe.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……可是，我並沒有這麼做。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……可是，我并没有这么做。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma non ho fatto così tanto.

Steam (ST): After that on that day, ...I spent the whole time having fun playing shiritori with the Seven Sisters, Sakutaro and Onee-chan.
Umineko Project (UP): After all, after that on that day, ......I had spent the time having fun playing shiritori with the Seven Sisters, Sakutaro, and Onee‐chan.
PC Japanese (JP): だってあの日はあの後、…七姉妹とさくたろとお姉ちゃんと、……楽しくしりとりをして過ごしてしまったのだから。
Russian (RU): Ведь тот день я потратила время на весёлую игру в ширитори с Семью Сёстрами, Сакутаро и онее‐чан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, mais tarde naquele dia, ......eu passei o tempo todo brincando de shiritori com as Sete Irmãs, o Sakutaro e a onee‐chan.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為，那天後來全用在了，…與七姐妹、櫻太郎、真里亞姐姐，……一起開開心心玩的詞語接龍上了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为，那天后来全用在了，…与七姐妹、樱太郎、真里亚姐姐，……一起开开心心玩的词语接龙上了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopotutto, dopo quel giorno... avevo impiegato il mio tempo divertendomi e giocando allo shiritori con le Sette Sorelle, Sakutarou e Onee-chan.

Steam (ST): As expected, the winner had been Maria onee-chan. She was a strong player thanks to her wide knowledge of trivia.
Umineko Project (UP): As expected, the winner had been Maria onee‐chan.{n}She had been a strong player because of her various bits of random knowledge.
PC Japanese (JP): 優勝したのはやっぱり真里亞お姉ちゃん。色々な雑学知識を持っているから強かった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 優勝したのはやっぱり真里亞お姉ちゃん。{n}色々な雑学知識を持っているから強かった。
Russian (RU): Как и ожидалось, победила Мария онее‐чан.{n}Она оказалась сильным игроком из‐за своих познаний о всяких разных вещах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como esperado, a vencedora foi a Maria onee‐chan.{n}Ela era a jogadora mais forte por causa de seus conhecimentos diversos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 獲優勝的果然是真里亞姐姐。{n}姐姐擁有各種各樣的雜學知識，實力雄厚。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 获优胜的果然是真里亚姐姐。{n}姐姐拥有各种各样的杂学知识，实力雄厚。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come mi aspettavo, aveva vinto Maria Onee-chan. Era stata una forte giocatrice, grazie alle sue varie conoscenze.

Steam (ST): Sakutaro had gotten the punishment game.
Umineko Project (UP): Sakutaro had gotten the penalty.
PC Japanese (JP): 罰ゲームはさくたろだった。
Russian (RU): Наказание досталось Сакутаро.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Sakutaro ficou com a penalidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 玩懲罰遊戲的是櫻太郎。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 玩惩罚游戏的是樱太郎。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sakutarou aveva ottenuto la penitenza.

Steam (ST): He spent the whole time cheering for everyone else's answers, completely forgotting to think of any himself.
Umineko Project (UP): He had spent the whole time cheering for everyone else's answers, and had completely forgotten to think of any himself.
PC Japanese (JP): みんなの解答を、きゃっきゃと褒めてるばっかりで、自分が解答するのをすっかり忘れてたから。
Russian (RU): Он потратил всё время на подбадривание других давать ответы, совершенно забыв отвечать самому.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele passou o tempo torcendo pelas respostas de todas, e esqueceu completamente de pensar nele mesmo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他光是在興奮地誇獎著大家的解答，把自己搶答的事給徹底忘了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他光是在兴奋地夸奖着大家的解答，把自己抢答的事给彻底忘了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era occupato ad incitare le altre per le loro risposte, e si era completamente dimenticato di pensarne per se stesso.

Steam (ST): ...Because of that, he'd been squished by the Seven Sisters and had his ears thoroughly nibbled, hadn't he?
Umineko Project (UP): ......Because of that, he got dogpiled by the Seven Sisters and had his ears thoroughly nibbled, didn't he?
PC Japanese (JP): ……そんなわけで七姉妹に揉みくちゃにされて、耳をはむはむされまくっていたっけ。
Russian (RU): Из‐за этого его как следует затискали, а его уши зажевали семь сестёр, не так ли?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Por causa disso, as Sete Irmãs pularam todas para cima dele, e ele teve suas orelhas mordidas, não teve?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……然後，他是被七姐妹摸了個夠，把耳朵啃了個夠，來著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……然后，他是被七姐妹摸了个够，把耳朵啃了个够，来着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... A causa di ciò, è stato stritolato dalle Sette Sorelle e le sue orecchie sono state mordicchiate del tutto, non è vero?

Steam (ST): "Heey, are you listening, Ushiromiya-san?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Excuse me, are you listening, Ushiromiya‐san?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ねぇっ、聞いてる右代宮さん？！」
Russian (RU): "Э‐эй, ты слушаешь, Уширомия‐сан?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ei, tá me ouvindo, Ushiromiya‐san?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂，有沒有在聽呀，右代宮同學？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂，有没有在听呀，右代宫同学？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Eehi, stai ascoltando, Ushiromiya-san?!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): [=JPC]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Steam (ST): They were surrounding me, twittering like small birds. They were annoying, smelly.
Umineko Project (UP): They were surrounding me, twittering like small birds.{n}Annoying, smelly.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らは私を取り囲んだまま、小鳥のように囀る。うるさくて、臭い。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 彼女らは私を取り囲んだまま、小鳥のように囀る。{n}うるさくて、臭い。
Russian (RU): Они окружили меня, галдя, как мелкие птахи.{n}И они раздражали и противно пахли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas estão me cercando, piando como pequenos pássaros.{n}Irritantes, fedidas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 圍住我的她們，猶如小鳥般嘰嘰喳喳。{n}又臭又煩人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 围住我的她们，犹如小鸟般叽叽喳喳。{n}又臭又烦人。

Steam (ST): On the outside of that circle was Mammon, an exasperated expression on her face...

Umineko Project (UP): ".........It's probably because of that collective responsibility thing. Instead of worrying about their own grades, they're more concerned about how embarrassing it is for the class average to be low."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Provavelmente é por causa daquela responsabilidade coletiva. Ao invés de ficar se preocupando com as próprias notas, elas estão mais preocupadas em como é vergonhoso a média da classe ter baixado."

Umineko Project (UP): "Or maybe it's because they really really hate the volunteer work they're forced to do as punishment."

Umineko Project (UP): "So in other words, they aren't studying because they want their grades to be good, but because of collective responsibility and because they hate volunteer work?"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Provavelmente é porque, ao invés de se esforçarem por conta própria, é mais fácil forçar você a se empenhar para aumentar a nota da turma e satisfazer a ganância delas. ......Humanos são todos gananciosos.
