Steam (ST): The purpose of use was for a class study group. A wonderful little gathering so that they could all surround me and make me study. I'm so grateful I could cry.
Umineko Project (UP): The purpose of use was for a class study group. A wonderful little gathering so that they can all collect around me and make me study. I'm overjoyed.
PC Japanese (JP): 使用目的は、クラス勉強会。私ひとりを囲んで勉強させるための、ありがたくて涙が出る催しだった。
Russian (RU): Целью было организовать группу для повторения материала. Чудесное маленькое собрание, чтобы все они могли окружить меня и принудить учиться. Я так благодарна, что щас аж разрыдаюсь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O propósito disto era para que a classe estudasse em grupo. Um maravilhoso pequeno encontro para que todas pudessem se juntar ao meu redor e me fazer estudar. Estou tão feliz que quero chorar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 佔用教室的目的是開班級學習會。這是將我一個人圍起來，助我學習，令我“感激”得掉眼淚的活動。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 占用教室的目的是开班级学习会。这是将我一个人围起来，助我学习，令我“感激”得掉眼泪的活动。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lo scopo del suo utilizzo era formare un gruppo di studio. Un piccolo, stupendo raduno in modo da circondarmi e farmi studiare. Ne ero così grata che avrei potuto piangere.

Steam (ST): Which meant that every day, all of my lunch and three hours of my afternoon would be stolen.
Umineko Project (UP): Which meant that every day, I would have all of my lunch and three hours of my afternoon stolen away from me.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は毎日、昼休みの全てと放課後の３時間を、奪われることになったわけだ。
Russian (RU): А означало это, что каждый день вся моя большая перемена и вечерние часы шли коту под хвост.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que significaria que todos os dias, eu teria meu intervalo e mais três horas da minha tarde, roubadas mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我每天的整個午休與放學後的三個小時都將遭到剝奪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我每天的整个午休与放学后的三个小时都将遭到剥夺。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciò significava che ogni giorno, tutte le mie ore per il pranzo e tre ore del mio pomeriggio sarebbero state rubate.

Steam (ST): The academy and its student council, with its theme of student self-government, instantly approved of this pleasant activity that the students were taking up of their own initiative...
Umineko Project (UP): The academy and its student council, with its motto of student self‐government, instantly approved of this pleasant activity that the students were taking up of their own initiative...
PC Japanese (JP): 生徒自治をモットーとする学園と生徒会は、生徒による自主的なこの微笑ましい活動を、二つ返事で承認した…。
Russian (RU): Академия и её студенческий совет, исповедующие принцип ученического самоуправления, моментально дали добро на приятное занятие, которое ученики выбрали по собственной инициативе...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A academia, e também o conselho estudantil, na qual o lema é autogoverno, instantaneamente aprovou essa agradável atividade que as estudantes propuseram de iniciativa própria...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 以學生自治為方針的學園與學生會，一口答應了，這個由學生自主發起的，令人欣慰的活動…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 以学生自治为方针的学园与学生会，一口答应了，这个由学生自主发起的，令人欣慰的活动…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'accademia e il suo consiglio studentesco, con l'importanza che attribuivano all'autogoverno dello studente, approvarono subito questa piacevole attività che gli studenti stavano facendo di loro iniziativa...

Steam (ST): In other words, I was no longer able to escape after school by leaving the classroom...
Umineko Project (UP): In other words, I would no be longer able to escape after school by leaving the classroom...
PC Japanese (JP): つまり私は、放課後に逃げるように教室を後にすることが、出来なくなったわけだ…。
Russian (RU): Другими словами, побег из класса после школы был мне отрезан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, eu não seria mais capaz de escapar depois da aula, deixando a sala de aula...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 總之，我再也沒法在放學後如逃跑般地離開教室了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 总之，我再也没法在放学后如逃跑般地离开教室了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In altre parole, non mi era più concesso scappare dopo la scuola, lasciando la classe...

Steam (ST): After school, the first class study group meeting started right away.
Umineko Project (UP): After school, the first class study group meeting started right away.
PC Japanese (JP): 放課後に、さっそく第１回のクラス勉強会が開かれた。
Russian (RU): После школы тут же началось первое заседание ученической группы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois da escola, o encontro da primeira turma de estudos em grupo iria começar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 放學後，當即就召開了第一屆班級學習會。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 放学后，当即就召开了第一届班级学习会。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo le lezioni, l'incontro del gruppo di studio iniziò rapidamente.

Steam (ST): Would they open a textbook, then kindly and carefully explain so that even I could understand it? Of course it didn't turn out like such a naive illusion.
Umineko Project (UP): Would they open a textbook, then kindly and carefully explain so that even I could understand it? Of course it was nothing like that naive fantasy.
PC Japanese (JP): 教科書を開いて、私にもわかるように懇切丁寧に教えてくれる？　そんな甘い幻想はさすがにない。
Russian (RU): Открыли ли они учебник и любезно и тщательно объяснили мне материал так, чтобы даже я могла бы его уяснить? Ага, щас, мечтать не вредно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas iriam abrir seus cadernos, então gentilmente e cuidadosamente me explicar mesmo aquilo que eu não entendi? É claro que isso não é nada mais do que uma ingênua fantasia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 翻開課本，認真懇切地把我也教懂？再怎麼說，我都不會抱這種天真的幻想。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 翻开课本，认真恳切地把我也教懂？再怎么说，我都不会抱这种天真的幻想。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Avrebbero aperto un libro di testo, e mi avrebbero spiegato gentilmente e attentamente in modo che persino io potessi capirlo? Ovviamente si rivelò solo una semplice illusione.

Steam (ST): After school in the classroom, dozens of my classmates crowded around my desk.
Umineko Project (UP): After school in the classroom, around a dozen of my classmates crowded around my desk.
PC Japanese (JP): 放課後の教室に、私の席を取り囲むように十数人のクラスメートがいた。
Russian (RU): Дюжина моих одноклассниц окружила мою парту.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois da aula, ainda na sala, várias das minhas colegas se amontoaram ao redor da minha mesa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在放學後的教室裡，十多位同學圍住了我的位子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在放学后的教室里，十多位同学围住了我的位子。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo le lezioni nella classe, dozzine di mie compagne si affollarono attorno al mio banco.

Steam (ST): First, before we started studying...
Umineko Project (UP): First, before we started studying...
PC Japanese (JP): まず、勉強を始める前に。
Russian (RU): Но перед тем, как начать учиться...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Primeiro, antes de começarmos a estudar...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 首先，在開始學習前。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 首先，在开始学习前。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Prima di tutto, prima che iniziassimo a studiare...

Steam (ST): Why were my grades so bad? What was the reason? It was decided that we couldn't start until I could clearly answer those questions, become aware of the problem, and show regret for my actions.
Umineko Project (UP): Why were my grades so bad? What was the reason?{n}It was decided that we couldn't start until I could clearly answer those questions, become aware of the problem, and show remorse for my actions.
PC Japanese (JP): なぜ私の成績が悪いのか。その理由は何なのか。それをはっきりさせて、自覚、反省をしてもらわないことには始まらない、ということになった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): なぜ私の成績が悪いのか。その理由は何なのか。{n}それをはっきりさせて、自覚、反省をしてもらわないことには始まらない、ということになった。
Russian (RU): Почему мои оценки столь ужасны? В чём причина?{n}Было решено, что мы не сможем начать, пока я чётко не отвечу на эти вопросы, не осознаю свою неправоту и не раскаюсь в своих поступках.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por que minhas notas são tão ruins? Qual era o motivo?{n}Foi decidido que não poderíamos começar até alguém responder claramente essa questão, ficar ciente do problema e demonstrar remorso pelos meus atos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我為什麼成績差？這個原因是什麼？{n}不去搞清楚這些，不作出自我反省，就沒法開始。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我为什么成绩差？这个原因是什么？{n}不去搞清楚这些，不作出自我反省，就没法开始。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché i miei voti erano così bassi? Per quale motivo? Fu deciso che non avremmo potuto iniziare finché non avessi risposto chiaramente a quelle domande, mi fossi accorta del problema, e mi fossi pentita delle mie azioni.

Steam (ST): ...Of course, there's no way for me to respond when asked a question like that.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Of course, there was no way I had an answer to a question like that.
PC Japanese (JP): ……もちろん、そんなことを聞かれても、私には答えられるわけもない。
Russian (RU): .....Разумеется, я никак не могла ответить на такой вопрос.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......É claro, não tem como eu ter uma resposta para uma pergunta como essa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……當然，即便聽了這些話，我也沒可能作出回答。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……当然，即便听了这些话，我也没可能作出回答。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ovviamente, non c'è modo per me di rispondere quando mi viene fatta una domanda come quella.

Steam (ST): They've loathed me all this time. And they've rejected me and kept me at a distance, preventing me from joining in on their community.
Umineko Project (UP): They had avoided me like the plague up until now. And they had rejected me and kept me at a distance so as not to include me in their communities.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らは私を忌み嫌ってきた。そしてコミュニティに私を加えないよう、拒絶して遠ざけてきた。
Russian (RU): Они стали презирать меня. Они отвергали меня и держали на расстоянии, чтобы я не могла влиться в их общество.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas me evitaram até agora, como se eu fosse uma praga. Elas me rejeitaram, me mantendo distante não me incluindo em seus grupos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她們一直很厭惡我。為了不讓我加入她們的圈子，一直拒絕我，遠遠地避開我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她们一直很厌恶我。为了不让我加入她们的圈子，一直拒绝我，远远地避开我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Hanno iniziato a detestarmi, ora. E hanno iniziato a respingermi e a tenermi a distanza in modo che non potessi entrare nel loro gruppo.

Steam (ST): So, I've avoided their community myself. There shouldn't have been any conflict for either of us that way.
Umineko Project (UP): So I had been avoiding their communities myself. There shouldn't have been any conflict between us that way.
PC Japanese (JP): だから私も、彼女らのコミュニティを避けるようにしてきた。そこに、両者の衝突はないはずだ。
Russian (RU): Поэтому я сама стала чураться их общества. Так между нами не возникло бы конфликта.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso eu estive evitando os grupos delas também. Não deveria haver nenhum conflito entre nós dessa forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，我也在努力避開她們的圈子。在這問題上，兩者應該沒有衝突。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，我也在努力避开她们的圈子。在这问题上，两者应该没有冲突。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi avevo iniziato da sola ad evitarle. In quel modo non ci sarebbe dovuto essere alcun conflitto tra noi.

Steam (ST): So even in this group that was enthusiastic about raising the class average, they obviously kept me at a distance.
Umineko Project (UP): So even when they formed this community intent on raising the class average, I obviously kept well away from it.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、彼女らがクラスの平均点を上げようと意気込むそのコミュニティにも、当然、私は足を遠ざけた。
Russian (RU): Так что хоть эта группка и горела желанием повысить средний балл класса, они со всей очевидностью держали меня на расстоянии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, mesmo quando elas formaram esse grupo com a intenção de aumentar a média da classe, é óbvio que eu me manteria distante dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，對於她們那幹勁衝天地想要提高班級平均分的小圈子，我當然也是避而遠之。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，对于她们那干劲冲天地想要提高班级平均分的小圈子，我当然也是避而远之。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi anche da questo gruppo, ossessionato dall'alzare la media della classe, ovviamente mi avevano tagliato fuori.

Steam (ST): Even if I tried to join in, they would probably ignore me, like they always did in the past.
Umineko Project (UP): Even if I had tried to join in, they would probably have ignored me, just like they had always done in the past.
PC Japanese (JP): 私がそのコミュニティに加わろうとしても、彼女らはそれまで常にそうしてきたように、私を無視しただろう。
Russian (RU): Даже попытайся я присоединиться к ним, они наверняка бы проигнорировали меня, как делали это в прошлом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo se eu tivesse tentado me juntar, elas provavelmente iriam me ignorar, assim como sempre fizeram no passado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 即便我想加入，她們也會無視我吧，就像以前一直以來所做的那樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 即便我想加入，她们也会无视我吧，就像以前一直以来所做的那样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Abche se avessi provato ad entrarci, probabilmente mi avrebbero ignorato, come avevano sempre fatto in passato.

Steam (ST): "If you'd just asked, we would've taught you whatever you wanted. Riiiiiiiight?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "If you'd just have asked, we'd have taught you as much you wanted. Wouldn't weeeee?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「言ってくれれば私たち、いくらでも教えてあげたよ？　ねーーー？！」
Russian (RU): "Если попросишь, мы тебя чему угодно научим. Ла‐а‐а‐адно?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se você simplesmente tivesse pedido, nós teríamos ensinado tudo o que quisesse. Não é mesmoooo?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你要是有說，我們早就傾囊相授了哦？喂——？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你要是有说，我们早就倾囊相授了哦？喂——？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se ce lo chiedi, ti insegneremo tutto ciò che vuoi. Okaaaaaaaaaay?!"

Steam (ST): """We wouuuuuuuld!!!"""
Umineko Project (UP): """We wouuuuuuuld!!!"""
PC Japanese (JP): 「「「ねえーーーーッ！！！」」」
Russian (RU): """Ла‐а‐а‐а‐а‐а‐а‐адно?!!"""
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): """Siiiiiiimmmmm!!!"""
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): """Okaaaaaaaaaaaaay?!!!"""

Steam (ST): They were getting themselves all worked up. ...I've already had enough of the hypocrisy of their tacked-on excuses.
Umineko Project (UP): Such enthusiasm. ......I'd had enough of their ex‐post‐facto pretenses of charity.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女たちはそう息巻く。……彼女たちの後付けの偽善はもううんざりだった。
Russian (RU): Они начали заводиться. Я, в свою очередь, уже была сыта по горло их ханжеством и лицемерием.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quanto entusiasmo. ......Eu já tive o bastante da hipocrisia de suas desculpas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她們怒氣衝衝地如此說道。……我已煩透她們事後的偽善了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她们怒气冲冲地如此说道。……我已烦透她们事后的伪善了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si stavano innervosendo da sole. ... Ne avevo già abbastanza dell'ipocrisia nel loro piccolo poscritto.

Steam (ST): "Ushiromiya-san, your problem is that you're lacking a cooperative personality. You mustn't be satisfied as long as everything's good for you alone."
Umineko Project (UP): "Ushiromiya‐san, the thing that's bad about you is you're lacking a cooperative attitude. You only think about yourself—it's that selfish way of thinking that's the problem."
PC Japanese (JP): 「右代宮さんの悪いところはね、協調性がないところなのよ。自分さえ良ければいいって思ってるその考えがいけないのよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「右代宮さんの悪いところはね、協調性がないところなのよ。自分さえ良ければいいって思ってるその考えがいけないのよ」
Russian (RU): "Уширомия‐сан, что в тебе плохо, так это отсутствие чувства локтя. Тебе не следует думать, будто всё в порядке, пока довольна только ты."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ushiromiya‐san, o seu problema é sua falta de cooperação em sua personalidade. Você só pensa em si mesma — essa sua forma egoísta de pensar é o problema."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「右代宮同學不對的地方是“沒有協作性”的這一點喲。這種“只要自己好就行了”的想法可要不得哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「右代宫同学不对的地方是“没有协作性”的这一点哟。这种“只要自己好就行了”的想法可要不得哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ushiromiya-san, la cosa brutta di te è che manchi di personalità cooperativa. Non devi pensare che tutto vada bene se va bene solo per te."

Steam (ST): "Those who gather in Saint Lucia's place of learning shall have a cooperative heart. It's written right there in the student handbook, right?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Those who gather in Saint Lucia's place of learning shall have a cooperative heart. It is written right there in the student handbook, you know?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「聖ルチーアの学び舎に集う者は協調の心を持つように。ちゃんと生徒手帳にも明記されてましてよ？」
Russian (RU): "Собравшиеся под крышей Святой Люции должны владеть дружественной душой. Так ведь гласит книга для учениц, верно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Aquelas que se reúnem no instituto de ensino da Santa Lucia devem possuir um coração cooperativo. Está escrito no livro do estudante, sabia?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「同聚聖露琪亞學舍之人，當懂得團結協作。這條有好好明確記在學生手冊上吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「同聚圣露琪亚学舍之人，当懂得团结协作。这条有好好明确记在学生手册上吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Coloro che si riuniscono a Santa Lucia per imparare devono avere un cuore cooperativo. È scritto proprio qua, nel manuale dello studente, no?"

Steam (ST): "I think having a cooperative heart is what gives birth to the desire to study together and contribute to the entire class. I believe that itself is the thing you lack before you even start studying, Ushiromiya-san, but what do you say?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "I think if you have a cooperative attitude, that's what gives birth to the desire to study together and contribute to the entire class. I think {i:that's} the most fundamental thing that you're lacking, how about you?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「協調性があれば、クラス全体に貢献するために一緒にお勉強しようという意思も生まれると思うの。そここそが右代宮さんに、お勉強以前に欠けている部分だと思うんだけど、どう思うかしらぁ？！」
Russian (RU): "Я считаю, что дружественная душа, это то, что порождает желание учиться вместе и делать вклад в весь класс. Полагаю, именно этого тебе недостаёт, прежде чем браться за учёбу, Уширомия‐сан. А как ты сама считаешь?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu acredito que se você tiver uma atitude cooperativa, isso vai dar à luz ao desejo de estudar em grupo e contribuir para toda a classe. Eu acredito que {i:isso é} a coisa mais fundamental que falta em você, não acha?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我認為，只要有了協作性，就會隨之產生，為了給全班做貢獻，而與大家一起好好學習的想法。我覺得，這正是右代宮同學在學習之前就欠缺了的東西，你覺得呢？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我认为，只要有了协作性，就会随之产生，为了给全班做贡献，而与大家一起好好学习的想法。我觉得，这正是右代宫同学在学习之前就欠缺了的东西，你觉得呢？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Penso che avere un cuore cooperativo sia ciò che dà vita al desiderio di studiare insieme e di contribuire all'intera classe. Credo che questa sia la cosa che ti manca, ancora prima di studiare, Ushiromiya-san, ma tu cosa ne pensi?!"

Steam (ST): "Heeey, have you even been listening to us?! We went to all the trouble of staying after school to say this {i:for your sake}, right?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Heeey, have you been listening to us?! We've gone to all the trouble of staying after school to have this talk {i:for your sake}, you know?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ねーぇ、さっきから私たちの話を聞いてるゥ？！{i:貴女のため}に私たちはわざわざ放課後に残ってこうしてお話しているのよー？！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ねーぇ、さっきから私たちの話を聞いてるゥ？！　{i:貴女のため}に私たちはわざわざ放課後に残ってこうしてお話しているのよー？！」
Russian (RU): "Э‐эй, ты нас слушаешь?! Мы тратим своё послешкольное время, чтобы сказать тебе это ради {i:твоего же блага}, ты понимаешь?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eiii, você está nos ouvindo?! Nós tivemos todo o trabalho de ficar depois da aula para ter essa conversa {i:pelo seu bem}, sabia?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂——，從剛才開始，有沒有在聽我們的話啊？！我們是{i:為了你}才特意在放學後留下來，與你談話的哦——？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂——，从刚才开始，有没有在听我们的话啊？！我们是{i:为了你}才特意在放学后留下来，与你谈话的哦——？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Eeehi, ci stavi ascoltando?! Ci siamo sforzate, e siamo rimaste dopo la scuola per dirti questo per il tuo bene, capisci?!"

Steam (ST): ......... I'm so grateful I could cry.
Umineko Project (UP): .....................The tears of gratitude are pouring down.
PC Japanese (JP): …………………。ありがたくて、涙が出る。
Russian (RU): ..................Да я щас прямо всплакну от благодарности.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .....................As lágrimas de gratidão estão escorrendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………………。感動得，眼淚都流出來了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …………………。感动得，眼泪都流出来了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ne sono così grata che potrei piangere.

Steam (ST): Of course, they didn't like that.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, they didn't like that.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん、それを咎められた。
Russian (RU): Разумеется, им это не понравилось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, elas não gostaram disso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當然，這也挨訓了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，这也挨训了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ovviamente, a loro non era piaciuto.

Steam (ST): "This way, it almost makes it look like we're bullying you", they reprimanded me.
Umineko Project (UP): "This way, it almost makes it look like we're bullying you", they scolded me.
PC Japanese (JP): “これではまるで、私たちが虐めてるみたいじゃない”と、さらに叱責された。
Russian (RU): "Со стороны это выглядит так, словно мы тебя обижаем", — выговорили они мне.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Dessa forma, quase faz parecer que estamos fazendo bullying com você", elas me repreenderam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “這樣子不就簡直像是我們在欺負你嘛”地，又挨了訓。
Chinese Simplified (CN): “这样子不就简直像是我们在欺负你嘛”地，又挨了训。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘In questo modo, sembra quasi che stiamo facendo le prepotenti con te’, mi ripresero.

Steam (ST): Fortunately, I'm normally all cried out anyway. If I'm told not to cry, I can hold it back.
Umineko Project (UP): Fortunately, I'm normally all cried out anyway.{n}If I'm told not to cry, I can hold it back.
PC Japanese (JP): 幸い、涙なんて普段から絞り尽くしてる。泣くなと言われたなら、堪えることだって出来るさ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 幸い、涙なんて普段から絞り尽くしてる。{n}泣くなと言われたなら、堪えることだって出来るさ。
Russian (RU): К счастью, меня нелегко довести до слёз.{n}Если мне говорят не плакать, я могу сдержаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Felizmente, normalmente eu estou sempre chorando.{n}Foi‐me dito para não chorar, eu posso controlar isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 幸好平時就快把眼淚擠幹了。{n}要是說“不准哭”，我也能夠忍得住。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 幸好平时就快把眼泪挤干了。{n}要是说“不准哭”，我也能够忍得住。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fortunatamente, di solito non piango comunque. Se mi viene detto di non piangere, posso trattenermi.

Steam (ST): First, I was made to write a letter of remorse and read it out loud.
Umineko Project (UP): First, I was to write a letter of remorse and read it out loud.
PC Japanese (JP): 私はまず、反省文を書かされて、発表させられることになった。
Russian (RU): Сначала меня заставили написать покаянное письмо и зачитать его вслух.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Primeiro, eu escrevi uma carta de remorso e a li em voz alta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我首先是被命令了，寫反省書，寫完後再當眾宣讀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我首先是被命令了，写反省书，写完后再当众宣读。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): All'inizio, mi fecero scrivere una lettera di pentimento e me la fecero leggere ad alta voce.

Steam (ST): Of course, this was to be done by today.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, they meant today.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん、今日の話だ。
Russian (RU): И, разумеется, это надо было сделать сегодня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, isso foi hoje.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當然，這得在今天做完。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，这得在今天做完。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Naturalmente, questo doveva essere fatto entro quel giorno.

Steam (ST): The class committee politely applied to the student council and the staff room for an extension on the use of this classroom.
Umineko Project (UP): The class president politely applied to the student council and the staff room for an extension on the use of the classroom.
PC Japanese (JP): クラス委員長が律儀に生徒会と職員室に、教室使用の延長を申請してくれた。
Russian (RU): Комитет класса вежливо обратился в студенческий совет и учительскую для продления времени использования класса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A presidente da classe educadamente requiriu ao conselho estudantil e a sala dos professores para que fossem usadas como uma extensão dessa sala de aula.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 班委懂規矩地去了學生會與職員室，申請了延長使用教室的時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 班委懂规矩地去了学生会与职员室，申请了延长使用教室的时间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il comitato della classe chiese gentilmente al consiglio studentesco e al personale un prolungamento dell'uso di questa stanza.

Steam (ST): ...It seems it was accepted right away.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Apparently it was accepted right away.
PC Japanese (JP): ……あっさり受理されたらしい。
Russian (RU): .....Похоже, согласие было дано моментально.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Aparentemente foi aceito imediatamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……好像輕輕鬆鬆地就得到了受理。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……好像轻轻松松地就得到了受理。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sembra che fu accettato subito.

Steam (ST): Which means that starting now, I'll be forced into self-criticism for at least a full five hours here...
Umineko Project (UP): Which meant that, starting now, I would be forced into self‐criticism here for at least a full five hours......
PC Japanese (JP): つまりこれで、私は今からたっぷり５時間以上もここで自己批判を強いられるわけだ……。
Russian (RU): А это означало, что, начиная с этого момента, я была приговорена к самокритике на битых пять часов...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso significa que, a partir de agora, eu irei ser forçada à autocríticas por, no mínimo, cinco horas......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 換句話說，從現在起，我將於此被迫做上至少五個多小時的自我批評……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 换句话说，从现在起，我将于此被迫做上至少五个多小时的自我批评……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciò significa che a partire da ora, verrò forzata all'autocritica per almeno cinque ore piene...

Steam (ST): ——Ushiromiya Ange got a low score on her test and caused trouble for her classmates.
Umineko Project (UP): {m:-5:―}―I, Ushiromiya Ange, caused trouble for my classmates by getting a low score on my test.
PC Japanese (JP): ——右代宮縁寿は、テストの成績が低くて、クラスメートに迷惑を掛けました。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ――右代宮縁寿は、テストの成績が低くて、クラスメートに迷惑を掛けました。
Russian (RU): Уширомия Энджи получила низкую оценку по контрольной и доставила неприятности своим одноклассницам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {m:-5:―}―Eu, Ushiromiya Ange, causei problemas as minhas colegas de classe ao tirar notas baixas nas provas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ——右代宮緣壽，考試成績差，給班上的同學添了麻煩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ——右代宫缘寿，考试成绩差，给班上的同学添了麻烦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ――Ushiromiya Ange ha ottenuto un basso punteggio nel suo test e ha causato fastidi alle le sue compagne di classe.

Steam (ST): "That's not iiiiiit!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "That's not iiiiiit!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「違うでしょぉーッ？！？！」
Russian (RU): "Нет, не то, не ясно что ли‐и‐и?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Erraaaadooooo!!"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non è così, giuuusto?!?!"

Steam (ST): "You getting low grades and causing us trouble isn't the root of the problem, is it?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "You getting low grades and causing us trouble isn't the root of the problem, right?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「成績が低くて迷惑を掛けたってのは、根本じゃないでしょお？！」
Russian (RU): "Получение тобою плохих оценок и причинение нам неприятностей — ещё не корень всех зол, верно?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você tirar notas baixas e causar problemas para nós não é a raiz do problema, certo?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「成績差給大家添麻煩，並不是根本上的問題吧？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「成绩差给大家添麻烦，并不是根本上的问题吧？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "La radice del problema non sei tu che prendi voti bassi e ci causi guai, no?!"

Steam (ST): "It's a cooperative attitude, right? A cooperative attitude!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "It's a cooperative attitude, a cooperative attitude!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「協調性でしょ、協調性！！」
Russian (RU): "Это дух содружества, понимаешь? Дух содружества!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É cooperatividade, cooperatividade!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「協作性才對吧，協作性！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「协作性才对吧，协作性！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Devi avere un'attitudine cooperativa, giusto? Un'attitudine cooperativa!!"

Steam (ST): "Come ooon!! Why do we even have to direct Ushiromiya-san on how to write a letter of regret?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Come ooon!! Why do we even have to guide you on how to write a letter of remorse?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「もーッ！！　何で右代宮さんの反省文の書き方まで私たちが指導しなくちゃならないのよー！」
Russian (RU): "Ну‐у же! Почему нам даже приходится учить Уширомию‐сан, как писать покаянное письмо!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vamoooos!! Por que temos até mesmo que ensinar você a escrever uma carta de remorso?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「真是的！！為什麼右代宮同學連反省書的寫法都非得靠我們來指導啊——！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「真是的！！为什么右代宫同学连反省书的写法都非得靠我们来指导啊——！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Su, forza!! Perché dobbiamo persino dire ad Ushiromiya-san come scrivere una lettera di pentimento!"

Steam (ST): Their abusive jeers flew about one after another.
Umineko Project (UP): Their abusive jeers flew about one after another.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らの口汚い罵声が次々飛び交う。
Russian (RU): Их насмешки сыпались одна за другой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os escárnios abusivos delas são disparados um após o outro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她們那難聽的罵聲一句接一句地交相飛舞。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她们那难听的骂声一句接一句地交相飞舞。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I loro scherni volarono uno dopo l'altro.

Steam (ST): I followed their "directions" and erased it.
Umineko Project (UP): I followed their "guidance" and put the eraser to it.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は彼女らの“指導”に従い消しゴムを入れた。
Russian (RU): Я выслушала их "наставления" и стёрла написанное мною.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu segui as "instruções" delas e apaguei aquilo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我遵循她們的“指導”，用橡皮擦去了那行字。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我遵循她们的“指导”，用橡皮擦去了那行字。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Io seguii le loro ‘istruzioni’ e la cancellai.

Steam (ST): ——Ushiromiya Ange didn't have a cooperative attitude and caused trouble for her classmates.
Umineko Project (UP): {m:-5:―}―I, Ushiromiya Ange, caused trouble for my classmates by not having a cooperative attitude.
PC Japanese (JP): ——右代宮縁寿は、協調性がなくて、クラスメートに迷惑を掛けました。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ――右代宮縁寿は、協調性がなくて、クラスメートに迷惑を掛けました。
Russian (RU): Уширомия Энджи не наделена духом содружества и причинила неприятности своим одноклассницам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {m:-5:―}―Eu, Ushiromiya Ange, causei problemas às minhas colegas de classe por não ter uma atitude cooperativa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ——右代宮緣壽，沒有協作性，給班上的同學添了麻煩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ——右代宫缘寿，没有协作性，给班上的同学添了麻烦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ――Ushiromiya Ange non ha avuto un'attitudine cooperativa e ha causato problemi alle sue compagne di classe.

Steam (ST): "Hey, wait a sec, it's pointless if you just write whatever we say, right?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Hey, wait a sec, it's pointless if you just write whatever we say!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ねぇ、ちょっとお、私たちが言ったのをそのまま書いても意味ないのよ？！」
Russian (RU): "Эй, погоди‐ка секунду, это бессмысленно, если ты всего лишь напишешь сказанное нами, не так ли?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ei, espera um pouco, é inútil se você só escrever o que dissermos!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂，我說啊，照我們的話直接寫就沒有意義了喲？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂，我说啊，照我们的话直接写就没有意义了哟？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ehi, aspetta un secondo, è inutile se scrivi solo ciò che diciamo, giusto?!"

Steam (ST): "Do you really know what "regret" means?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Do you even frigging know what "remorse" means?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あんた、反省って意味、わかってんのー？！」
Russian (RU): "Ты хоть знаешь, что означает 'покаяние'?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você ao menos faz ideia do que "remorso" significa?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你到底明不明白反省的意思啊——？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sai veramente cosa significa ‘pentirsi’?!"

Steam (ST): "It's pointless if you don't write it in your own words, pointless!"
Umineko Project (UP): "It's pointless if you don't write it in your own words, pointless!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「自分の言葉で書かなくちゃ意味がないじゃない、自分の言葉で書かなくちゃッ！」
Russian (RU): "Не будет никакого проку, если ты не напишешь это своими собственными словами!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não faz sentido algum se não escrever com suas próprias palavras, não faz!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不以自己的話寫就沒意義了吧，得用你自己的話來寫！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不以自己的话写就没意义了吧，得用你自己的话来写！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È inutile se non lo scrivi con parole tue, inutile!"

Steam (ST): "I always thought you were a bit strange, Ushiromiya-san, but you really are weird! *giggle*giggle*giggle*!"
Umineko Project (UP): "I've always thought you were a bit strange, Ushiromiya‐san, but you really are an odd one! *giggle*giggle*giggle*!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「右代宮さんって、ちょっと不思議な子だなって思ってたけど、やっぱり変わってるよねー！　くすくすくすくす！」
Russian (RU): "Я всегда считала тебя странной, Уширомия‐сан, но это уже перебор! *хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu sempre pensei que você fosse um pouco estranha, Ushiromiya‐san, mas você é realmente bem excêntrica! *risos*risos*risos*!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「右代宮同學這人，之前就覺得有點怪怪的，果然是“與眾不同”呢——！嘻嘻嘻嘻！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「右代宫同学这人，之前就觉得有点怪怪的，果然是“与众不同”呢——！嘻嘻嘻嘻！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ho sempre pensato che fossi un po' strana, Ushiromiya-san, ma ti manca davvero qualche rotella! *giggle*giggle*giggle*!"

Steam (ST): Even following their directions didn't change the jeers much, and now it felt like they were mocking me even more...
Umineko Project (UP): Even following their guidance didn't change the jeers much; in fact, now it felt like they were mocking me more as well...
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らの指導に従っても、あまり罵声は変わらず、むしろ嘲りも増えた感じだった…。
Russian (RU): Даже следование их наставлениям не убавило их насмешек, а им захотелось и дальше помучить меня...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo seguindo as instruções delas, os deboches não mudaram; na verdade, agora parece que elas estão debochando ainda mais de mim...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 即便我聽從了她們的指導，罵聲也沒什麼改變，反而感覺還增添了嘲笑…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 即便我听从了她们的指导，骂声也没什么改变，反而感觉还增添了嘲笑…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Persino seguire le loro indicazioni non cambiava molto gli scherni, e ora sembrava che mi stessero anche prendendo in giro...

Steam (ST): So for several more hours, without rest, without even being allowed to go to the bathroom, much less dinner, I was continuously abused...
Umineko Project (UP): In this way, over the following several hours, without rest, without being allowed to go to the bathroom, of course without being permitted to have dinner, and while being continuously insulted...
PC Japanese (JP): 私はそうして数時間もの間、休むことも、お手洗いに行くことも許されず、当然、夕食さえも許されずに、延々と罵倒されながら。
Russian (RU): И в течение нескольких часов, без отдыха и даже без возможности сходить в туалет, не говоря уже о возможности перекусить, я вынужденно терпела унижение...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dessa forma, mesmo continuando por horas, sem descanso, sem permissão para ir ao banheiro, é claro, sem permissão para jantar, eu continuei a ser insultada constantemente...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就這樣，在數小時間，我沒有休息，沒法上廁所，當然，連晚飯也沒得吃，沒完沒了地遭受辱罵。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就这样，在数小时间，我没有休息，没法上厕所，当然，连晚饭也没得吃，没完没了地遭受辱骂。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi per molte altre ore, senza riposo, senza nemmeno poter andare in bagno, e ovviamente senza poter cenare, maltrattandomi continuamente...

Steam (ST): ...I was coerced into writing a paragraph that humiliated myself...
Umineko Project (UP): ......I was coerced into writing a document which humiliated myself......
PC Japanese (JP): ……自らを辱める文章を書き上げることを強要され続けた……。
Russian (RU): Меня вынудили написать текст унижающего меня содержания...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Fui coagida a escrever um documento humilhando a mim mesma......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……被強迫著寫侮辱自己的文章……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……被强迫着写侮辱自己的文章……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Mi avevano costretto a scrivere un paragrafo nel quale mi umiliavo da sola...

Steam (ST): At about 9:00 that night, ...I was told to stand up and read it aloud.
Umineko Project (UP): And as it passed nine at night, ......I was told to stand up and read it aloud.
PC Japanese (JP): そして夜も９時を回り、……私はそれを起立して読み上げるように言われた。
Russian (RU): А в девять часов вечера мне сказали встать и зачитать его вслух.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tendo passado das nove da noite, ......foi dito para eu me levantar e ler em voz alta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，到了晚上九點，……她們叫我起立，宣讀這篇反省書。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，到了晚上九点，……她们叫我起立，宣读这篇反省书。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E verso le nove, quella sera... mi fu detto di alzarmi e di leggere ad alta voce.

Steam (ST): The contents... were smeared black with tears and eraser marks.
Umineko Project (UP): The contents......were smeared black with tears and eraser marks.
PC Japanese (JP): その文面は、……涙の跡と消しゴムの跡で真っ黒にくすんでいた。
Russian (RU): Сам текст... был увлажнён слезами и истёрт ластиком.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O conteúdo da carta......estava manchado de preto por causa das lágrimas e as marcas de apagado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紙上的文面，……已被淚跡與橡皮留下的痕跡搞得黑乎乎地模糊不清了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纸上的文面，……已被泪迹与橡皮留下的痕迹搞得黑乎乎地模糊不清了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I contenuti... erano imbrattati di nero con lacrime e segni di cancellature.

Steam (ST): It certainly was my handwriting, ...but it was like a list of soulless letters, whose contents I couldn't even remember.
Umineko Project (UP): It certainly was my handwriting, ......but it was like a list of soulless letters, whose contents I couldn't even remember.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに私の筆跡だけれど、……まるで内容に覚えのない、魂の篭らぬ文字が列挙されている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 確かに私の筆跡だけれど、……まるで内容に覚えのない、魂の篭らぬ文字が列挙されている。
Russian (RU): Почерк определённо принадлежал мне. Но сами буквы были бездушны, и я не помнила, что они излагали.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Certamente era minha caligrafia, ......mas era como uma lista de cartas sem alma, nas quais os conteúdos eu sequer recordava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然的的確確是我的筆跡，……但羅列著的卻是，幾乎全無印象，沒有靈魂的文字。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然的的确确是我的笔迹，……但罗列着的却是，几乎全无印象，没有灵魂的文字。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Certamente era la mia scrittura... ma era come una lista di lettere senz'anima, i cui contenuti non potrei nemmeno ricordare.

Steam (ST): Everything had been copied down according to their orders.
Umineko Project (UP): Everything had been copied down according to their guidance.
PC Japanese (JP): それらは全て彼女らが指導したものを書き写したものだ。
Russian (RU): Всё было написано по их наставлениям.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tudo foi copiado de acordo com as instruções delas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這些全是照她們的指導所寫的文字。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这些全是照她们的指导所写的文字。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tutto era stato copiato secondo i loro ordini.

Steam (ST): So while I had been the one to write the letters, they weren't my words.
Umineko Project (UP): So while I had been the one to write the letters, they weren't my words.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、たとえ私の文字で書かれたとしても、私の言葉ではない。
Russian (RU): И потому, хоть писала и моя рука, те слова мне не принадлежали.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, mesmo sendo eu quem escrevia as cartas, aquelas não eram minhas palavras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，儘管是我寫的字，但那並不是我的話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，尽管是我写的字，但那并不是我的话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi anche se ero io a scrivere le lettere, non erano le mie parole.

Steam (ST): I'd been coerced into writing them down...and even coerced into reading them aloud.
Umineko Project (UP): I was being coerced into writing it down, and even coerced into reading it aloud.
PC Japanese (JP): それを書き取ることを強要され、さらに発表することを強要される。
Russian (RU): Но меня заставили написать их, а затем зачитать вслух.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estava sendo coagida a escrevê‐las, bem como coagida a lê‐las em voz alta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我被強逼著寫下了這個，還被強逼著當眾宣讀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我被强逼着写下了这个，还被强逼着当众宣读。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fui costretta a scriverlo, e persino costretta e leggerlo ad alta voce.

Steam (ST): ......Even after all this time, I was surprised to learn that, beyond just ignoring people and hiding their things, there are other ways to bully people...
Umineko Project (UP): .........I was surprised to find that even after all this time, in addition to ignoring someone and hiding their things, there were still other ways, like this, to bully people......
PC Japanese (JP): ………私は、人の虐め方には、無視や、物を隠すだけでなく、こういうものもあるのかと今さらながら驚かされる……。
Russian (RU): .........И даже спустя столько времени я поразилась, узнав, что, кроме игнорирования и кражи вещей, существуют другие способы обижать людей...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Eu fiquei surpresa ao descobrir depois de todo esse tempo, que além de ignorar alguém ou esconder as coisas de uma pessoa, haviam muitas outras formas, assim como essa, de fazer bullying com as pessoas......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………雖說是馬後炮，但我是被欺負人的方法並不僅僅是無視與藏東西，還存在著這樣的做法，給嚇到了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………虽说是马后炮，但我是被欺负人的方法并不仅仅是无视与藏东西，还存在着这样的做法，给吓到了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche dopotutto questo tempo, ero sorpresa di scoprire che oltre ad ignorarle e nascondere le loro cose, ci sono altri modi, come questo, per maltrattare le persone...

Steam (ST): "Heey! Read it aloud quickly!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Come onnn! Hurry up and read it out!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほらあ！　早く読み上げなさいよー！！」
Russian (RU): "Э‐эй! Скорее зачитай это вслух!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vamos! Se apresse e leia isso de uma vez!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂喂！快點念呀——！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂喂！快点念呀——！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Eehi! Leggilo velocemente ad alta voce!!"

Steam (ST): "Look how many people are staying this late just for you, Ushiromiya-san. Why not thank us a little?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Look how many people are staying this late just for you, Ushiromiya‐san. How about a little gratitude?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「右代宮さんのために、これだけの人間がこんなに遅くまで付き合ってるのよ？　少しは感謝したら？」
Russian (RU): "Смотри, сколько людей задержалось тут только из‐за тебя, Уширомия‐сан. Почему бы тебе хоть немного не отблагодарить нас?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Veja quantas pessoas ficaram aqui até tarde só por sua causa, Ushiromiya‐san. Que tal mostrar um pouco de gratidão?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「為了右代宮同學，有這麼多人陪到了這麼晚的時間喲？稍微感謝下我們如何？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「为了右代宫同学，有这么多人陪到了这么晚的时间哟？稍微感谢下我们如何？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Guarda quante persone rimangono qui a quest'ora per te, Ushiromiya-san. Perché non ci ringrazi un pochino?"

Steam (ST): "Isn't the fact that she doesn't feel gratitude a sign that she doesn't have a scrap of a cooperative attitude?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Isn't the fact that she doesn't feel gratitude for that indicative of her not having a scrap of cooperative attitude?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「そこで感謝の気持ちがわかないという時点で、もう協調性が欠片ほどもないのよね？」
Russian (RU): "Не потому ли она не чувствует благодарности, что в ней нет ни крупицы духа содружества?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não seria o fato dela não sentir gratidão um indício de que não possui o mínimo de cooperativismo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「對此涌現不起感激之情，就代表著你連一丁點的協作性都沒有哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对此涌现不起感激之情，就代表着你连一丁点的协作性都没有哦？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Il fatto che non si senta grata non è il segno che non ha un minino di attitudine cooperativa?"

Steam (ST): "It's okay, Ushiromiya-san. We'll always be with you from now on. Why not study with us and remake yourself? Okay?"
Umineko Project (UP): "It's alright, Ushiromiya‐san. We'll always be with you from now on. Why not study with us and remake yourself? Okay?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「大丈夫よ、右代宮さん。これからは私たちがいつも一緒にいてあげるから。一緒にお勉強して、生まれ変わりましょう？　ね？」
Russian (RU): "Не волнуйся, Уширомия‐сан. Отныне мы всегда будем вместе. Почему бы не учиться с нами и не изменить себя? Хорошо?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Está tudo bem, Ushiromiya‐san. Nós sempre estaremos com você a partir de agora. Por que não estuda conosco e mude a si mesma? Que tal?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不要緊，右代宮同學。以後，我們會一直陪著你的。來與我們一起學習，洗心革面重新做人吧？好嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不要紧，右代宫同学。以后，我们会一直陪着你的。来与我们一起学习，洗心革面重新做人吧？好吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Va bene, Ushiromiya-san. D'ora in poi saremo sempre con te. Perché non studi con noi e non ti rifai? Ok?"

Steam (ST): "*giggle*giggle* "Ahahahahaha "Kyahhhyahyahyahya!!"""
Umineko Project (UP): "*giggle*giggle* “Ahahahahaha “Kyahhhya{0}hya{0}hya{0}hya!!””"
PC Japanese (JP): 「くすくすくす「あははははは「きゃっひゃひゃひゃひゃひゃ！！」」」
Russian (RU): "*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*"{n}{t}"Аха‐ха‐ха‐ха!!!"{n}{t}"Кья‐хья‐хья‐хья‐хья!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "*risos*risos* “Ahahahahaha “Kyahhhya{0}hya{0}hya{0}hya!!””"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嘻嘻嘻「啊哈哈哈哈哈「呀、嚇嚇嚇嚇嚇！！」」」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嘻嘻嘻「啊哈哈哈哈哈「呀、吓吓吓吓吓！！」」」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "*giggle*giggle* "Ahahahahaha "Kyahhhyahyahyahya!!"""

Steam (ST): As I stood by my seat, surrounded by them, ...I dropped my gaze towards the blackened page.
Umineko Project (UP): Still surrounded by them, I stood from my seat......and dropped my gaze towards the blackened page.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は彼女らに囲まれたまま、席を起立し、……その黒ずんだページに目を落とす。
Russian (RU): Я стояла, окруженная ими, опустив взгляд на почерневший листок.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda cercada por elas, eu levantei de meu assento......e olhei na direção das páginas enegrecidas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我從依舊被她們圍著的座位上，站了起來，……把目光落到了黑乎乎的紙上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我从依旧被她们围着的座位上，站了起来，……把目光落到了黑乎乎的纸上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Alzandomi in piedi, circondata da loro... feci cadere il mio sguardo verso la pagina scura.

Steam (ST): And then...I spoke those humiliating words, but right away, jeers flew at me saying that they couldn't hear and to speak up.
Umineko Project (UP): And then......I began to speak those humiliating words, but right away, jeers flew at me saying that they couldn't hear and to speak up.
PC Japanese (JP): そして……その辱めの言葉を口にするが、すぐに、よく聞こえない、もっと大きな声でと罵声が飛んだ。
Russian (RU): А затем... я заговорила те унизительные слова, но на меня тут же посыпались насмешки, что, дескать, они меня не слышат и мне следует говорить громче.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então......comecei a falar aquelas palavras humilhantes, mas da mesma forma, escárnios voaram na minha direção, dizendo que não conseguiam ouvir o que eu estava falando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後……雖然我念起了屈辱的文字，但“聽不清”、“再大聲點”等等的罵聲馬上就迎面飛來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后……虽然我念起了屈辱的文字，但“听不清”、“再大声点”等等的骂声马上就迎面飞来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E poi... dissi quelle parole umilianti, ma immediatamente, scherni volarono verso di me, dicendo che non si sentiva nulla e di alzare la voce.

Steam (ST): ......I can't read it.
Umineko Project (UP): ...............I can't read this.
PC Japanese (JP): ……………読めない。
Russian (RU): .......Я не могу прочитать это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...............Eu não posso ler isto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……………念不下去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non posso leggerlo.

Steam (ST): I had no idea... that being forced to read a paragraph humiliating me would be so painful.
Umineko Project (UP): I had no idea...that being forced to read a paragraph humiliating me would be so painful.
PC Japanese (JP): 自らの口で、自らを辱める文章を読まされることが、こんなにも辛いことだなんて、知らなかった。
Russian (RU): Я и представить себе не могла, что оказаться принуждённо прочитать унижающий меня текст будет так больно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não fazia ideia...de que ser forçada a ler um parágrafo de humilhação poderia ser tão doloroso para mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 沒想到，以自己的嘴，去念侮辱自己的文章，竟是此等的，難受。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 没想到，以自己的嘴，去念侮辱自己的文章，竟是此等的，难受。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non avevo idea... che essere costretta a leggere un paragrafo che mi umiliava sarebbe stato così doloroso.

Steam (ST): My throat shook. My fingertips shook. ...The paragraph of humiliation written in my own handwriting made my eyes burn with a hot liquid.
Umineko Project (UP): My throat shook. My fingertips shook. ......The paragraph of humiliation written in my own handwriting made my eyes burn with a hot liquid.
PC Japanese (JP): 喉が震える。指先も震える。……自らの筆跡で書かれた屈辱的な文章が、瞳の奥を熱い液体が焼く。
Russian (RU): В горле у меня пересохло. Пальцы задрожали. .....Унизительный текст, написанный моим почерком, ожег мне глаза горячей жидкостью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha garganta tremeu. Meus dedos tremeram. ......O parágrafo de humilhação, escrito com minha própria letra, fez meus olhos queimarem com um líquido quente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 咽喉在顫抖。指尖也在顫抖。……自己親筆寫下的屈辱文章，令我瞳孔深處沸騰起了火熱的液體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 咽喉在颤抖。指尖也在颤抖。……自己亲笔写下的屈辱文章，令我瞳孔深处沸腾起了火热的液体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La mia gola tremò. Le punte delle mie dita tremarono. ... Il paragrafo dell'umiliazione scritto con la mia scrittura fece bruciare i miei occhi con un caldo liquido.

Steam (ST): So my world blurred and twisted.
Umineko Project (UP): So my world blurred and twisted.
PC Japanese (JP): だから世界が潤んで歪んだ。
Russian (RU): Мир у меня перед глазами расплылся и искривился.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto meu mundo se tornava enevoado e distorcido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，世界蒙上了一層水簾，扭曲了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，世界蒙上了一层水帘，扭曲了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi il mio mondo si inumidì e si contorse.

Steam (ST): I saw the girls surrounding me twist and bend.
Umineko Project (UP): The girls surrounding me all appeared warped.
PC Japanese (JP): 私を取り囲む彼女らがみんな歪んで見えた。
Russian (RU): Я увидела, как окружающие меня девчонки искривляются и гнутся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As garotas que me cercavam pareciam todas se deformarem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在我的眼中，環繞著我的她們全都扭曲了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在我的眼中，环绕着我的她们全都扭曲了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Vidi le ragazze che mi circondavano contorcersi e piegarsi.

Steam (ST): ...I saw them twist and bend into the impression I had of them.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I saw them warped into exactly the impression I had of them.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私が彼女たちに持っていた印象そのままの姿に歪んで見えた。
Russian (RU): .....Увидела, как они, искривясь и погнувшись, стали выглядеть так, какими я их себе представляла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu as vi se deformarem até a exata impressão que tenho delas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……扭曲成了，與我印象中的她們完全一樣的外形。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……扭曲成了，与我印象中的她们完全一样的外形。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Le vidi contorcersi e piegarsi nell'impressione che io avevo di loro.

Steam (ST): In other words, ...that was my true field of vision.
Umineko Project (UP): In other words, ......this was the correct view.
PC Japanese (JP): だからそれはつまり、……正しい視界だった。
Russian (RU): Другими словами, таково было моё истинное зрение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, ......essa era a forma correta de vê‐las.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，換言之，……這才是正確的視野。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，换言之，……这才是正确的视野。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In altre parole... quello era il mio vero campo di visione.

Steam (ST): Beyond that twisted crowd of people, ...I could see my friends.
Umineko Project (UP): Beyond that twisted crowd of people, ......I could see my friends.
PC Japanese (JP): その歪んだ人垣の向こうに、……私の友人たちの姿が見える。
Russian (RU): За этой толпой виднелись мои друзья.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além daquela distorcida multidão de pessoas, ......eu pude ver minhas amigas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這扭曲的人牆的另一邊，……我看到了我的朋友。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这扭曲的人墙的另一边，……我看到了我的朋友。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Oltre quella folla contorta di persone... potevo vedere i miei amici.

Steam (ST): Compassion could be seen in all of their eyes.
Umineko Project (UP): Compassion could be seen in all of their eyes.
PC Japanese (JP): 皆、瞳には同情を浮かべていた。
Russian (RU): В их глазах плескалось сострадание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Compaixão podia ser vista nos olhos de todas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 大家的瞳孔中全都浮現著同情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 大家的瞳孔中全都浮现着同情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Potevo vedere compassione in tutti i loro occhi.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "......Ange, ......stay strong..."
Russian (RU): ".......Энджи... мужайся..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Ange, .........aguente firme..."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ange... resisti..."

Speaker: Sakutarou
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅー………。』
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]

Steam (ST): Maria onee-chan and Sakutaro were looking at me with sad eyes. Probably because they realized that even cheap words of compassion would hurt me.
Umineko Project (UP): Maria onee‐chan and Sakutaro were looking at me with sad eyes.{n}Perhaps because they realized that even cheap words of compassion would hurt me.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞お姉ちゃんとさくたろが、悲しい目で私を見ている。安っぽい同情の言葉すらも、私を傷つけると知っているからだろうか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 真里亞お姉ちゃんとさくたろが、悲しい目で私を見ている。{n}安っぽい同情の言葉すらも、私を傷つけると知っているからだろうか。
Russian (RU): Мария онее‐чан и Сакутаро смотрели на меня печальными глазами.{n}Они, похоже, понимали, что даже дешёвые слова сострадания ранят меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Maria onee‐chan e o Sakutaro estavam olhando para mim com a tristeza refletida em seus olhos.{n}Possivelmente porque eles perceberam que até mesmo palavras baratas de compaixão iriam me ferir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞姐姐與櫻太郎以悲傷的目光看著我。{n}他們是清楚，就連不值錢的同情之言，都會刺傷我麼？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚姐姐与樱太郎以悲伤的目光看着我。{n}他们是清楚，就连不值钱的同情之言，都会刺伤我么？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Maria Onee-chan e Sakutarou mi stavano guardando con occhi tristi. Forse perché si accorsero che persino scadenti parole di compassione mi avrebbero ferito.

Steam (ST): ...They kept alternating between trying to say something...and hanging their heads.
Umineko Project (UP): ......They kept alternating between trying to say something, and hanging their heads.
PC Japanese (JP): ……何かを口にしようとしては俯くことを、繰り返す。
Russian (RU): .......Они то порывались сказать что‐то, то опускали головы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eles continuaram a alternar entre tentar dizer algo e inclinarem suas cabeças.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……反反覆覆地做出剛抬頭要說些什麼，就又重新低下了頭的動作。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……反反复复地做出刚抬头要说些什么，就又重新低下了头的动作。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Continuarono ad alternarsi tra provare a dire qualcosa e guardare in basso.

Speaker: Asmodeus
Steam (ST): "What the hell's wrong with these people...?!!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ange‐sama! Neste tipo de situação, ficar enfurecida pelo bem da sua própria honra é perfeitamente aceitável!! A raiva é uma emoção apropriada em situações apropriadas! Se não ficar brava agora, quando {i:vai} ficar?!"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ange-sama! In questo tipo di situazioni, è giusto infuriarsi per il bene del proprio onore!! La rabbia è un'emozione e una reazione appropriata! Se non ci si infuria ora, quando lo si farà?!!"

Speaker: Lucifer
Steam (ST): "Stop it, don't stir Ange-sama up with cheap anger!! If Ange-sama could do that, she would've done it already!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Stop it, don't stir Ange‐sama up with cheap anger!! If Ange‐sama could do that, she would have done it already!!"

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "......You should only get angry if doing so will improve the situation. However, from a objective standpoint, doing that now would probably only aggravate the situation further. It may be humiliating, but the wisest thing to do now is to withstand it."
Umineko Project (UP): "...............If the situation could improve by you getting angry, then that is what you should do. However, objectively speaking, that would only serve to aggravate the situation further. ......It may be humiliating, but the wisest thing to do now is to withstand it."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………怒って状況が改善できるならそうすべきだ。だが、客観的に判断して、それはますますに状況を悪化させるだけだろう。……屈辱的だが、今は耐えるのが賢明だ。」

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "A burden?! What are you talking about? Is this the time or place to be calm?! We furniture are not so cruel as to coolly watch when our master is humiliated!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "A burden?! What are you talking about? Is this the time or place to be calm?! We furniture are not so cruel as to be able to coolly watch our master being humiliated!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「負担？！　なに言ってんのよ、ここは騒ぐところでしょ？！　私たち家具は、主が侮辱されているのを見て冷静で居られるほど残酷じゃないッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Перегрузим?! Что ты несёшь? Разве сейчас место и время сохранять спокойствие? Мы, мебель, не настолько жестоки, чтобы хладнокровно наблюдать, как унижают нашу госпожу!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Um peso?! Do que você está falando? Esse não é um lugar muito menos um momento de se manter calma?! Nós, mobílias, não somos tão cruéis a ponto de ficarmos friamente assistindo nossa mestra ser humilhada!!"

Speaker: Satan
Steam (ST): "Ange-sama!! You have no obligation to read such a humiliating letter! If you can't let out a cry of rage, then at least throw it onto the floor!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Ange‐sama!! You have no obligation to read such a humiliating essay! If you can't let out a cry of rage, then at least throw that insulting message onto the floor!!"

Russian (RU): "Энджи‐сама! Вы не обязаны зачитывать это унизительное письмо! Если вы не можете испустить гневный возглас, то хотя бы бросьте его на пол!"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ange-sama!! Non è obbligata a leggere una lettera così umiliante! Se non può piangere di rabbia, almeno la butti a terra!!"

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "You don't need to trash talk them, you don't need to yell so loud that they bend over backwards! Just throw the notebook on the floor with all your might...!! By doing just that, you'll be able to show your strong will!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "You don't need to trash‐talk them, you don't need to yell so loud that they bend over backwards! Just throw that notebook on the floor with all your might...!! That's all you need to do to show how strong‐willed you are!!"

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「口汚く罵らなくていい、仰け反らせるほどの大声をあげなくていい！　ただ渾身の力でそのノートを床に叩きつけて…！！　それだけのことで、縁寿さまは強い意思を示すことが出来る！！」
Russian (RU): "Вам нет нужды пререкаться с ними, вам не нужно кричать так, чтобы отогнулись! Просто что есть сил бросьте тетрадь на пол! Поступив так, вы сможете продемонстрировать вашу сильную волю!"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non c'è bisogno di insultarle, non c'è bisogno di gridare così tanto da farle piegare all'indietro! Tira il quaderno a terra con tutta la tua forza e basta...!! Facendo solo quello, riuscirai a mostrare il tuo forte volere!!"

Russian (RU): "Не городи огород, Мамона! Я тебе уже сказала, так?! Если бы Энджи‐сама могла, то давно бы так поступила!"

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "Nothing will be resolved by the eruption of momentary emotions. Can't you see that doing that will only make their treatment of Ange-sama even more severe?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Nothing will be resolved by the eruption of momentary emotions. Why don't you understand that doing that will only worsen the criticism Ange‐sama is receiving?!"

Steam (ST): "Waaaaaaaaaaaaahh!! Why is this happening to Ange‐sama when she didn't do anything wrong?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Waaaaaaaaaaaaahh!! Why is this happening to Ange‐sama when she didn't do anything wrong?!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E não é só esta noite, vai ser amanhã e no dia seguinte também!! Me poupem! Eu não consigo mais suportar essa humilhação!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不仅是今晚，今天、明天、后天！！别太过分了，我忍不了这种屈辱！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E non è solo stanotte, ma anche domani, e anche il giorno successivo!! {n}È abbastanza, non può stare seduta qui sopportando queste umiliazioni!!"

Steam (ST): "Hey!! Are you really listening to us?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Excuse me!! Are you actually listening to us?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ねえ！！　私たちの話、本当に聞こえてるッ？！」
Russian (RU): "Эй! Ты нас слушаешь?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ei!! Você está mesmo nos ouvindo?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂！！你真的有在聽我們說話？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂！！你真的有在听我们说话？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ehi!! Ci stai ascoltando?!"

Steam (ST): Someone tugged at my hair. ...I was torn back into my tragic reality.
Umineko Project (UP): Someone tugged at my hair.{n}......I was pulled back into miserable reality.
PC Japanese (JP): 私の髪が、ぐいっと引っ張られる。……私は無惨な現実に引き戻された。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私の髪が、ぐいっと引っ張られる。{n}……私は無惨な現実に引き戻された。
Russian (RU): Кто‐то дёрнул меня за волосы.{n}Меня вырвало обратно в жестокую реальность.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Alguém puxou meu cabelo.{n}......Eu fui puxada de volta para aquela miserável realidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我的頭髮被一把揪起。{n}……我被拉回了殘酷的現實。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的头发被一把揪起。{n}……我被拉回了残酷的现实。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Qualcuno mi tirò capelli. ... Fui strappata dal mio mondo, e riportata nella tragica realtà.

Steam (ST): ...I was no longer even permitted to listen to the Seven Sisters speaking on my behalf in my heart.
Umineko Project (UP): ...I was no longer even permitted to listen to the Seven Sisters expressing my inner thoughts on my behalf.
PC Japanese (JP): …七姉妹たちが私の胸中を代弁してくれるその言葉に耳を傾けることさえ、もはや許されなかった。
Russian (RU): Мне даже больше не дозволялось слушать семь сестёр, говорящих от моего сердца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Não tinha mais permissão para sequer ouvir as Sete Irmãs expressarem meus pensamentos interiores no meu lugar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …就連去傾聽七姐妹們代我吐露的心聲，都已經不被允許。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …就连去倾听七姐妹们代我吐露的心声，都已经不被允许。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non mi fu nemmeno permesso ascoltare le Sette Sorelle che parlavano al mio posto, dentro il mio cuore.

Steam (ST): My hair was lifted upwards, one of my hair ornaments came off, and I could hear the sound of it rolling on the ground.
Umineko Project (UP): My hair was lifted upwards, one of my hair ornaments came off, and I heard it bounce and then roll on the ground.
PC Japanese (JP): 掴み上げられ、片方の髪飾りが取れ、床にコツンコツンと落ちて転がる音が聞こえた。
Russian (RU): Мои волосы подняли вверх, одно из моих украшений для волос открепилось и упало, и я услышала, как оно покатилось по земле.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Meu cabelo estava puxado para cima, um dos meus enfeites de cabelo caiu, eu o ouvi pular e então rolar pelo chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我聽到了，隨著頭髮被揪起，半邊的髮飾掉了下去的，“嗵、嗵”地砸到地上的聲音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我听到了，随着头发被揪起，半边的发饰掉了下去的，“嗵、嗵”地砸到地上的声音。

Steam (ST): ...No one picked it up.
Umineko Project (UP): ......No one picked it up.
PC Japanese (JP): ……誰も拾わない。
Russian (RU): Никто не подобрал его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ninguém o pegou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……誰都不幫我撿。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……谁都不帮我捡。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Nessuno lo raccolse.

Steam (ST): To the contrary, they casually avoided it as though something filthy was rolling towards them.
Umineko Project (UP): To the contrary, they casually avoided it as though something filthy had come rolling towards them.
PC Japanese (JP): むしろ、何か汚いものでも転がってきたかのように、さりげなく避けた。
Russian (RU): Наоборот, они ненавязчиво избегали его, словно к ним катилось что‐то грязное.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pelo contrário, elas casualmente o evitaram como se fosse algo imundo que rolava na direção delas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不如說，就像是滾來了某種髒東西似的，若無其事地側身回避。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不如说，就像是滚来了某种脏东西似的，若无其事地侧身回避。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Al contrario, lo schivarono facendo finta di niente, come se qualcosa di sporco stesse rotolando verso di loro.

Steam (ST): I tried to follow it with my eyes, but my hair was tugged upwards again.
Umineko Project (UP): I tried to follow it with my eyes, but my hair was tugged upwards again.
PC Japanese (JP): 私がそれを目で追おうとすると、再び髪が掴み上げられた。
Russian (RU): Я попыталась отследить своё украшение взглядом, но меня опять дёрнули за волосы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu tentei acompanhá‐lo com meus olhos, mas meu cabelo foi puxado para cima mais uma vez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我剛要用眼睛緊追它的去向，就被又一次地揪起了頭髮。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我刚要用眼睛紧追它的去向，就被又一次地揪起了头发。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Provai a seguirlo con gli occhi, ma i miei capelli furono nuovamente tirati verso l'alto.

Steam (ST): "Why do you neeever listen to us, even though we're talking about something so serious?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Why is it that you're {i:never} listening, even though we're trying to have a real serious talk with you?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「何で私たちがこんなに真剣に話してるのに、いっつも聞いてないわけ？！」
Russian (RU): "Почему ты {i:никогда} не слушаешь нас, хоть мы и говорим на очень серьёзную тему?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Por que você {i:nunca} está ouvindo, mesmo com a gente tentando ter uma conversa séria com você?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「為什麼我們在如此認真地跟你講話，而你卻總是不聽？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「为什么我们在如此认真地跟你讲话，而你却总是不听？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Perché non ci ascolti maaai, anche se ti stiamo parlando di una cosa così seria?!"

Steam (ST): "In one ear and out the other, is it? Does anything get into that thick skull of yours?! Get a grip, okay?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "In one ear and out the other, is it? Or maybe we're talking to a brick wall?! Get a grip, alright?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「右の耳から左の耳ってヤツぅ？　それとも馬の耳に念仏かしらぁ？！　あんた、いい加減にしてよね？！」
Russian (RU): "В одно ухо влетело, из другого вылетело, да? В этой твоей дубовой башке хоть что‐нибудь задерживается?! Возьми себя в руки, а?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Entra por um ouvido e sai pelo outro, é isso? Ou talvez nós estejamos falando com uma parede?! Pare com isso, ouviu?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「左耳進右耳出？還是對牛彈琴？！你給我適可而止啊！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「左耳进右耳出？还是对牛弹琴？！你给我适可而止啊！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ti entra da un orecchio e ti esce dall'altro, è così? Ci entra qualcosa in quello spesso cranio?! Riprenditi, ok?!"

Steam (ST): "Are you really conscious of the trouble you're causing us? You aren't going to start saying that you just wrote it grudgingly because we told you to, right?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Are you really conscious of the trouble you're causing all of us? You better not be about to say you just wrote that grudgingly because we told you to!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「私たち全員に迷惑掛けてるって自覚、本気であるの？　私たちに言われてるから嫌々、書いたとか言い出すんじゃないでしょうね？！」
Russian (RU): "Ты соображаешь, какие неприятности нам причиняешь? Ты же не собираешься заявить, что написала всё это с неохотой, поскольку мы заставили тебя, а?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você está mesmo consciente dos problemas que está causando para nós?{n}É melhor você não dizer que escreveu de má vontade só porque mandamos!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你到底有沒有給我們所有人都添了麻煩的自覺？總不會是要說，因為我們在這麼說，你才迫不得已寫的吧？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你到底有没有给我们所有人都添了麻烦的自觉？总不会是要说，因为我们在这么说，你才迫不得已写的吧？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sei davvero conscia dei fastidi che ci stai causando? Non inizierai a dire che l'hai scritto con rancore perché te l'abbiamo detto noi, vero?!"

Steam (ST): "Until you really show regret of your own will, this seriously isn't gonna end, okay?! It's not just for today. It'll seriously keep on going tomorrow and the day after, you see? Don't you play us for fools, okay?!?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Until you can really feel remorse by yourself, this seriously isn't gonna end, get it?! It's not just gonna be today. This is seriously gonna keep on going tomorrow and the day after, you got that?! I'm warning you, don't push your luck with us!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あんたが本当に自分の意思で反省できるまで、マジで終わんないからね？　今日だけじゃないよ。明日も明後日もマジで続くからね？　あんまり舐めてんじゃないわよッ？！？！」
Russian (RU): "Пока ты не проявишь искреннее и добровольное раскаяние, это не закончится, поняла?! Это не только на сегодня. Это продолжится и завтра и после завтра, поняла?! Не выпендривайся перед нами, ясно тебе?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Até que você se sinta realmente arrependida, isso não vai acabar, entendeu?! Não vai ser só hoje. Isso vai continuar amanhã e no dia seguinte, está ouvindo?! Estou avisando você, não nos subestime!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「在你真正以你自己的意志作出反省前，可真的沒完哦？不僅僅是今天。真的會明天後天地繼續下去哦？你可別不當回事哦？！？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「在你真正以你自己的意志作出反省前，可真的没完哦？不仅仅是今天。真的会明天后天地继续下去哦？你可别不当回事哦？！？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Finché non mostrerai rimorso di tua spontanea volontà, questo non finirà mai, no?! Non è solo per oggi. Continuerà seriamente domani e il giorno successivo, capisci? Non cercare di fotterci, capito?!?!"

Steam (ST): "I mean, why are you still even alive? Is it normal to go on living like this? If it were me, I'd just die!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Like, more to the point, what are you even still alive for? Could you guys go on like this? If it were me, I'd just die!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「つーかさぁ、何でまだ生きてんの？　生きてられる普通？　私なら死んじゃうね！」
Russian (RU): "Я не понимаю, почему ты ещё жива? Это вообще нормально, вот так жить? Я бы на твоём месте уже давно померла!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ou melhor, por que você ainda está vivendo? É normal ficar vivendo assim? No seu lugar, eu simplesmente morreria!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「說來啊，你幹嘛還活著呀？一般能有臉活下去嗎？換做我就去死了！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说来啊，你干嘛还活着呀？一般能有脸活下去吗？换做我就去死了！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Voglio dire, perché sei ancora viva? È normale continuare a vivere in questo modo? Se fossi nei tuoi panni, preferirei morire!"

Steam (ST): "You can't live like this, can you?! 'Cause you being alive just means getting in other people's way all the time, right? If it were me, I definitely couldn't live on!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah, I could never live this way! Think about it, just by being alive, you'd be getting in other people's way all the time, right? If it were me, I definitely couldn't live on!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「生きてられないよねー？！　だってさ、生きてるだけで迷惑掛けてるだけでしょ？　私だったら絶対に生きてられない！」
Russian (RU): "Ты не можешь так жить, не находишь?! Поскольку твоя жизнь будет только мешать другим людям, верно? Я бы на твоём месте такого не пережила!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, eu nunca poderia viver assim! Só de pensar sobre isso, só de estar viva, você vai estar atrapalhando outras pessoas o tempo inteiro, né? No seu lugar, eu definitivamente não continuaria vivendo!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「活不下去吧——？！畢竟，光是活著就只是在給人添麻煩吧？換做我，絕對活不下去！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「活不下去吧——？！毕竟，光是活着就只是在给人添麻烦吧？换做我，绝对活不下去！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non puoi vivere in questo modo, non è vero?! Perché il fatto che tu viva significa semplicemente invadere sempre la strada delle altre persone, giuso? {n}Se fossi in te, non riuscirei a vivere!"

Steam (ST): "Yeah, yeah, I'd die too. If doing that's better for the world, then I'd die right away! Riiiiiiiiight?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah, yeah, I'd die too. If that's better for the world, I'd die on the spot! Wouldn't yooooou?!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うんうん、私だったら死ぬね。その方が世の中のためになるなら、すぐにでも死んじゃうよー！　ねええー！！」
Russian (RU): "Да, да, я бы тоже умерла. Если бы мир от этого только выиграл, я бы умерла на месте! Ве‐ерно?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, sim, eu também morreria. Se fosse o melhor a se fazer pelo mundo, eu morreria agora! Não é?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯嗯，換做我就去死了。死了才是給社會做貢獻的話，那我馬上就去死了——！是吧——！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯嗯，换做我就去死了。死了才是给社会做贡献的话，那我马上就去死了——！是吧——！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Già, già, anch'io morirei. Se facendolo sarebbe meglio per il mondo, allora morirei subito! Giuuuuuuuusto?!!"

Umineko Project (UP): "You Seven Sisters of Purgatory are incredible furniture that can massacre mere {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s in a flash, right?! You're always boasting about it to me!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ...Why? What's wrong?! You're certain-kill furniture that can fly around faster than the eye can see and instantly pierce the hearts of a witch's enemies, right? And I'm giving you an order as your master!!
Umineko Project (UP): "......Why? What's wrong?! You're certain‐kill furniture that can fly around faster than the eye can see, and instantly strike through the hearts of the witch's enemies, aren't you? And I am giving you an order as your master!!"
PC Japanese (JP): ……何で？　どうしてよッ？！目にも留まらぬ速度で飛び回って、魔女の敵の心臓を即座に貫く、必殺の家具でしょう？そしてそれを主である私が命じてる！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……何で？　どうしてよッ？！　目にも留まらぬ速度で飛び回って、魔女の敵の心臓を即座に貫く、必殺の家具でしょう？　そしてそれを主である私が命じてる！！
Russian (RU): ".....В чём дело? Что случилось?! Вы же смертоносно точная мебель, летающая быстрее, чем успевает заметить взгляд, и моментально пробивающая сердца врагов ведьм, верно? И я приказываю вам, как ваш господин!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Por quê? Qual o problema?! Você é uma mobília de morte certeira que pode voar mais rápido do que os olhos podem acompanhar e acertar instantaneamente através dos corações de bruxas inimigas, não são? E como mestre, eu estou dando uma ordem para você matar!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……怎麼？怎麼了啊？！你們不是能以人眼捕捉不到的速度飛行，眨眼間貫穿魔女之敵的心臟的，必殺的家具嘛？身為主人的我已經下了這個命令！！

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché? Che succede?! Siete mobili che uccidono con certezza, e che possono volare più veloci di ciò che l'occhio umano può vedere e perforare istantaneamente i cuori dei nemici di una strega, giusto? E io vi sto dando un ordine come vostra padrona!!

Umineko Project (UP): If they had immediately followed my brutal order, and left corpses strewn all around me...
PC Japanese (JP): もしも彼女らが私の残酷な命令に直ちに従い、私を中心に屍を累々と並べて見せたなら。
Russian (RU): Если бы они моментально последовали моему жестокому приказу, завалив класс трупами, в центре которых стояла я...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se elas tivessem seguido minha ordem brutal imediatamente e deixado cadáveres espalhados ao meu redor...

Steam (ST): ...I was ready to reflect on my own reckless actions of stealing human lives so readily, ...ready to regret and repent, just as they had wanted me to.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I would have been ready to rue my own reckless actions of stealing human lives so readily—I was ready to regret and feel remorse, just as they had wanted me to.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私は人の命をあっさりと奪ってしまった自分の暴挙を、悔いて後悔し、彼女らが望んだように自ら反省するつもりでいた。
Russian (RU): Я была готова раскаяться в своих горячно‐поспешных действиях с готовностью отобрать человеческую жизнь... Была готова сожалеть и каяться, как они того и хотели от меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......eu estava pronta para refletir minhas próprias ações precipitadas tomando vidas humanas tão prontamente — eu estava pronta para me arrepender e sentir remorso, assim como elas queriam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……我會為輕易奪去人命的自己的暴舉懊悔後悔，照她們所願的那樣自我反省的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……我会为轻易夺去人命的自己的暴举懊悔后悔，照她们所愿的那样自我反省的。

Steam (ST): I was prepared to do that.
Umineko Project (UP): I was prepared to go through that.
PC Japanese (JP): その覚悟があった。
Russian (RU): Я была готова к такому.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我有這個覺悟。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我有这个觉悟。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ero preparata a farlo.

Steam (ST): And yet, Lucifer just let an unsure expression rise to her face...and didn't move to carry out my order.
Umineko Project (UP): And yet, Lucifer just let an unsure expression rise to her face, and didn't move to carry out my order.
PC Japanese (JP): なのに、ルシファーは戸惑いの表情を見せるだけで、私の命令を実行しようとはしなかった。
Russian (RU): И тем не менее Люцифер напустила себе на лицо выражение неуверенности и не выполнила мой приказ.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E ainda assim, Lucifer apenas exibiu uma expressão insegura em sua face, e não se moveu para executar minha ordem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，路西法只是顯露出了不知所措的表情，不去執行我的命令。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，路西法只是显露出了不知所措的表情，不去执行我的命令。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciononostante, Lucifer mostrò sul suo viso un'espressione insicura, e non si mosse per eseguire il mio ordine.

Steam (ST): .........I knew it.

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …するとその凝視は、どうやら痛みを伴ったらしい。{n}ルシファーは凄まじい頭痛に襲われたかのように、自らの頭を両腕で抱え込む。
Russian (RU): И похоже, что взгляд мой сопровождался болью.{n}Как будто на неё напала мучительная головная боль, Люцифер схватилась за голову обеими руками.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E pude ver a dor que acompanhava seu olhar.{n}Como se ela estivesse sofrendo de uma violenta dor de cabeça, Lucifer agarrou sua cabeça com ambas as mãos.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E sembrava che il dolore accompagnasse quello sguardo. Come se fosse assalita da un violento mal di testa, Lucifer si afferrò la testa con entrambe le mani.

Steam (ST): But it looked like she couldn't tear her eyes off my gaze. ...So she was assaulted with a pain that grew more and more violent.

Umineko Project (UP): You are useless, useless......!! I HATE you!! Disappear...!! {i:You're nothing but a delusion inside my head}...!!!

Steam (ST): Hopelessness and disappointment. Resignation and a dream's end. A cracking sound, like you'd hear from a frozen lake's surface during a fierce winter, rang out just once.
Umineko Project (UP): Hopelessness and disappointment. Resignation and a dream's end. A cracking sound, like you'd hear from a frozen lake's surface during a fierce winter, rang out just once.
PC Japanese (JP): 絶望と失望。諦めと夢の終わり。厳冬の湖で、氷結した湖面が立てるような亀裂音が一度だけ響く。
Russian (RU): Счастье и разочарование. Опускание рук и конец мечты. Один раз прозвучал треск, какой можно услышать от замёрзшей поверхности пруда лютой зимой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sem esperanças e desapontante. Resignação e fim do sonho. O som de um estalo, como aquele que você escuta vindo da superfície de um lago congelado durante o impiedoso inverso, ecoando apenas uma vez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 絕望與失望。心死與夢終。響起了一聲，猶如嚴冬結冰的湖面所發出的龜裂之聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绝望与失望。心死与梦终。响起了一声，犹如严冬结冰的湖面所发出的龟裂之声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Disperazione e delusione. Rassegnazione e la fine di un sogno. Uno scricchiolio, come quello proveniente dalla superficie di un lago gelato durante un inverno violento, risuonò forte per una sola volta.

Steam (ST): At the same time, Lucifer's form, which was being tormented by a violent pain, stiffened in place and grew cloudy.
Umineko Project (UP): Simultaneously, Lucifer's form, tormented by violent pain, stiffened in place and grew cloudy.
PC Japanese (JP): その音と同時に、激痛に苦しむルシファーの姿が、そのままの姿で硬直し、白濁した。
Russian (RU): Одновременно с этим фигура Люцифера, мучающейся от ужасной боли, застыла на месте и потянулась дымкой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Simultaneamente, a forma de Lucifer, atormentada pela violenta dor, enrijeceu e começou a embaçar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與此聲同時，痛不欲生的路西法保持著此時的姿勢，僵硬、發白。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与此声同时，痛不欲生的路西法保持着此时的姿势，僵硬、发白。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nello stesso momento, la sagoma di Lucifer, tormentata da un dolore violento, si irrigidì sul posto e divenne opaca.

Steam (ST): ...It was almost as though a beautifully polished glass window... had been heartlessly smashed and turned white from the countless fissures.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was almost as though a beautifully polished glass window...had been heartlessly smashed and turned white from the countless cracks.
PC Japanese (JP): ……まるで、美しく磨かれた窓ガラスが、無残に叩き割られ、無数のひびによって真っ白になってしまうのに、よく似ていた。
Russian (RU): .....Она напоминала красиво отполированное окно, которое оказалось бессердечно разбито и побелело от бесчисленных трещин.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Era quase como se uma bela janela de vidro polida...tivesse sido cruelmente esmagada, transformado‐se em incontáveis cacos brancos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這就好似，磨得漂漂亮亮的窗玻璃，被無情砸爛，因無數裂紋而變得白白的一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这就好似，磨得漂漂亮亮的窗玻璃，被无情砸烂，因无数裂纹而变得白白的一样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era quasi come se il vetro di una finestra meravigliosamente lucidata fosse stato incrinato senza alcuna pietà e fosse diventato bianco a causa delle innumerevoli crepe.

Steam (ST): And that was an accurate analogy. At some point, Lucifer's form had turned into a glass ornament of the same shape.
Umineko Project (UP): And that was an accurate analogy. At some point, Lucifer's form had turned into a glass ornament of the same shape.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれは、正しい表現だった。ルシファーの姿は、ルシファーの姿をしたガラス製の置物に、いつの間にか代わっている。
Russian (RU): И это была точная аналогия. В какой‐то момент фигура Люцифера превратилась в стеклянную статую той же формы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E esta era uma analogia precisa. Em determinado momento, a forma de Lucifer transformou‐se em um ornamento de vidro de sua mesma forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且，這話即是正確的描述。有著路西法外觀的玻璃制裝飾品在不知不覺間取代了路西法的位置。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并且，这话即是正确的描述。有着路西法外观的玻璃制装饰品在不知不觉间取代了路西法的位置。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E quella era un'analogia esatta. Ad un certo punto, la sagoma di Lucifer si era trasformata in un soprammobile di vetro dalla stessa forma.

Steam (ST): Countless fissures ran through it from the inside, and as the head and arms collapsed, it crumbled to the floor.
Umineko Project (UP): Countless fissures ran through it from the inside, and the head and arms fell to pieces as it crumbled to the floor.
PC Japanese (JP): それは内側より無数の亀裂を走らせて、頭や腕などを瓦解させながら崩れ落ちた。
Russian (RU): Изнутри по ней побежали бесчисленные трещины, отвалились руки и голова, и сама она повалилась на пол.

PC Japanese (JP): 縁寿さまがたった今、浴びせられている罵声を、私たちにも同じように浴びせ掛けて胸の内をスゥっとさせるがいいです。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿さまがたった今、浴びせられている罵声を、私たちにも同じように浴びせ掛けて胸の内をスゥっとさせるがいいです」

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): That's also furniture's duty!! Getting slammed against the floor when someone's pissed off is also a chair's important duty!!
Umineko Project (UP): "That too is the duty of furniture!! Getting slammed against the floor when someone's pissed off is also a chair's important duty!!"
PC Japanese (JP): それもまた家具の役目！！　ムカついて床に叩き付けられることもまた、椅子の大事なお役目ですからァ！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それもまた家具の役目！！　ムカついて床に叩き付けられることもまた、椅子の大事なお役目ですからァ！！」
Russian (RU): "Это тоже долг мебели! Быть ударенными об пол, когда кто‐то выводит вас из себя — так же важный долг мебели."
