Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): If that alone can absorb their master's bad mood even for an instant, there can be no greater honor for furniture. Kill me, deny me, your first and final friend...!!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "If by that trifling service we manage to absorb our master's bad mood even for an instant, there can be no greater honor for furniture. Kill me, deny me, your first and final friend...!!!!!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): その程度のことで主の不機嫌を一時でも受け止められたなら、家具としてこれほどの栄誉はありません。殺しなさいよッ、否定しなさいよ、あなたの最初で最後の友達をぉおおおッ…！！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「その程度のことで主の不機嫌を一時でも受け止められたなら、家具としてこれほどの栄誉はありません。殺しなさいよッ、否定しなさいよ、あなたの最初で最後の友達をぉおおおッ…！！！」
Russian (RU): "Если одно это способно хоть на мгновение прогнать дурное настроение господина, то для мебели нет чести более великой. Убейте меня, вашего первого и последнего друга!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se, com esse insignificante serviço, nós formos capazes de absorver o mal humor da nossa mestra por um instante, então não há honra maior para uma mobília. Me matem, me neguem, sua primeira e última amiga...!!!!!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「通過這種程度的事就能一時分擔主人的不快的話，那這就是家具至高無上的榮譽。殺吧，否定吧，殺死否定掉您第一個也是最後一個的朋友吧————…！！！」

Steam (ST): At the end, Mammon had a mocking expression on her face, ...but for some reason, it looked splashed with tears.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Ange, você violou o tratado da Mariage Sorcière. ......Fazendo coisas tão horríveis, ......mesmo bruxas da aliança devem respeitar e aceitar uma as outras...... Todas eram suas preciosas amigas......"

Steam (ST): "No witches' alliance has anything to do with this. Magic friends? Give me a break. ......I killed them, erased them. I smashed the Seven Sisters!"
Umineko Project (UP): "No witches' alliance has anything to do with this. Magic friends? Give me a break. .........I killed them, erased them. I smashed the Seven Sisters!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria

Umineko Project (UP): "Stop it. Denying my friend is the one thing I will not permit."

Umineko Project (UP): The same power that had smashed the Seven Sisters was probably eating into Sakutaro as well.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "Sakutaro is my furniture. You cannot erase him, Ange. ...However, trying to deny someone is the greatest form of scorn for a witch."
Umineko Project (UP): "Sakutaro is my furniture. You cannot erase him, Ange. ......That you would try to deny him regardless is the greatest contempt you could show a witch."
PC Japanese (JP): 「さくたろは私の家具。縁寿には消せないよ。……なのに、否定しようとするのは魔女にとって最大級の侮蔑も同じだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さくたろは私の家具。縁寿には消せないよ。……なのに、否定しようとするのは魔女にとって最大級の侮蔑も同じだよ」
Russian (RU): "Сакутаро — моя мебель. Ты не можешь стереть его, Энджи. .....Однако отрицание кого‐либо для ведьмы является величайшей формой презрения."

Steam (ST): "Sakutaro didn't exist from the very beginning. He's just a lion stuffed animal. A phantom you personified with the delusions inside your own mind!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Sakutaro never existed in the first place. He's just a lion stuffed animal. Just a phantom you personified in the delusions inside your own mind!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「さくたろなんて、最初から存在しないわ。ただのライオンのぬいぐるみ。それをお姉ちゃんが、あたかも存在するかのように脳内で妄想して、人格化した、ただの幻なのよ！」

Steam (ST): "Uu-!!! That's not true!! Sakutaro is my friend!! He was a stuffed animal once, but now he isn't!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu!!! That's not true!! Sakutaro is my friend!! He was a stuffed animal once, but now he isn't!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria

Steam (ST): ......And then.
Umineko Project (UP): .........And then.
PC Japanese (JP): ………それで。
Russian (RU): .......А затем.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E poi.

Steam (ST): ...What had been peaceful days to me became a daydream and ended.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Those tranquil days of mine, now merely a waking dream, came to an end.
PC Japanese (JP): …私の穏やかだった日々は、白昼夢ということになって、終わった。
Russian (RU): Дни, бывшие мирными для меня, стали грезами и развеялись.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Meus dias tranquilos, agora meramente um sonho acordado, chegaram ao fim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …我這段恬靜的日子化為白日夢結束了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …我这段恬静的日子化为白日梦结束了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quelli che erano stati per me giorni sereni divennero sogni ad occhi aperti e finirono.

Steam (ST): By now, it's impossible to prove.
Umineko Project (UP): At this point, it's unverifiable.
PC Japanese (JP): 今となっては検証不能だ。
Russian (RU): Возможности удостовериться больше нет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora uma verificação já não é mais possível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 事到如今，無法驗證。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 事到如今，无法验证。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ormai, non si può verificare.

Steam (ST): No one can verify whether that really was magic or whether those really were my friends, or else nothing more than a daydream.
Umineko Project (UP): No one can verify whether that really was magic, and those really were my friends, or else whether it was all nothing more than a daydream.
PC Japanese (JP): あれが本当に魔法で、そして私の友人たちだったのか、それとも白昼夢に過ぎなかったのかは、誰にも検証できない。
Russian (RU): Никто не может удостовериться, действительно ли это была магия, а те девушки и львёнок моими друзьями, либо же то была всего лишь иллюзия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ninguém podia verificar se era realmente magia, e aquelas eram realmente minhas amigas, ou se tudo não era mais do que um devaneio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那些真的是魔法，真的是我的朋友？還是只不過是場白日夢？誰都無法對此進行驗證。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那些真的是魔法，真的是我的朋友？还是只不过是场白日梦？谁都无法对此进行验证。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nessuno può verificare se quella fosse veramente magia o se quelli fossero miei amici, oppure niente più di un sogno.

Steam (ST): ...I, the sole observer, concluded that they were a daydream.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I, the sole observer, concluded that those girls were a figment of my imagination.
PC Japanese (JP): ……唯一の観測者である私が彼女らを、白昼夢だと断じたから。
Russian (RU): .......Я, будучи единственным наблюдателем, пришла к выводу, что это иллюзия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu, uma observadora solitária, conclui que aquelas garotas eram fruto da minha imaginação.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……由於身為唯一的觀測者的我將她們斷定為了白日夢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……由于身为唯一的观测者的我将她们断定为了白日梦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Io, l'unica osservatrice, avevo concluso che erano sogni ad occhi aperti.

Steam (ST): ...So that became the truth.
Umineko Project (UP): ......So that became the truth.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それが真実となった。
Russian (RU): .......И этот вывод стал правдой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Por isso se tornaram verdade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……所以，這便成為了真實。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……所以，这便成为了真实。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Così questa diventò la verità.

Steam (ST): Perhaps, in the farther future, I'll observe it again, and when that happens, maybe I'll acknowledge that it wasn't a dream, ...that the Seven Sisters really were my friends, and that along with Maria onee-chan and Sakutaro, they did everything they could for me in my isolation.
Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps, further in the future, I will observe it again, and when that happens, maybe I will acknowledge that it wasn't a dream, ......that the Seven Sisters really were my friends, and that along with Maria onee‐chan and Sakutaro, they did everything they could for me in my isolation.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は後の未来に再びこれを観測し、その時はこれを夢ではなく、……七姉妹たちは本当に友人で、真里亞お姉ちゃんもさくたろも、孤独な私のために尽力してくれていたと、認めるのだろうか。
Russian (RU): Наверное, в отдалённом будущем я вновь подниму это воспоминание и признаю, что случившееся не было сном... Что семеро сестёр чистилища были моими друзьями, и вместе с Марией онее‐чан и Сакутаро они делали всё, чтобы скрасить моё одиночество.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez, no futuro, eu observe novamente e, quando isto acontecer, talvez eu reconheça que não era um sonho, ......que as Sete Irmãs eram realmente minhas amigas, e junto com a Maria onee‐chan e o Sakutaro, elas fizerem tudo o que podiam por mim em meu isolamento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我在將來再次觀測時，是否會把這段日子認可為，……並非做夢，七姐妹是我真正的朋友，真里亞姐姐與櫻太郎也在為孤獨的我盡力呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我在将来再次观测时，是否会把这段日子认可为，……并非做梦，七姐妹是我真正的朋友，真里亚姐姐与樱太郎也在为孤独的我尽力呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse, in un futuro più lontano, lo osserverò ancora, e quando accadrà, forse riconoscerò che non è stato un sogno... che le Sette Sorelle erano veramente mie amiche, e questo insieme a Maria Onee-chan e Sakutarou, hanno fatto il possibile per me, nel mio isolamento.

Steam (ST): ......Something so vague is neither the truth nor an illusion.
Umineko Project (UP): ..................Something so vague is neither the truth nor even an illusion.
PC Japanese (JP): ………………そんなあやふやなの、真実でも幻でも、何でもない。
Russian (RU): Нечто столь неясное не является ни правдой, ни иллюзией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ..................Algo tão vago que não chega a ser verdade e nem mesmo uma ilusão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………………這種含含糊糊的玩意兒，不是真實不是幻想，什麼都不是。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………………这种含含糊糊的玩意儿，不是真实不是幻想，什么都不是。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Qualcosa di così vago non è né la verità né un'illusione.

Steam (ST): Maybe the reality here and now is the only world with the real me.
Umineko Project (UP): Maybe the reality that's here and now is the only real world, with the real me.
PC Japanese (JP): 今、ここにある現実だけが、本当の私の世界なんじゃないか。
Russian (RU): Наверное, реальность здесь и сейчас — единственный мир с настоящей мною.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez a realidade que está aqui e agora seja o único mundo real, com minha eu real.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此刻存在於此的現實，才是真正的我的世界吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此刻存在于此的现实，才是真正的我的世界吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse la realtà qui e adesso è l'unico mondo con la vera me.

Steam (ST): Where is the real me?
Umineko Project (UP): Where is the real me?
PC Japanese (JP): 本当の私はどこにいるの？
Russian (RU): Где же настоящая я?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Onde está minha eu real?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真正的我身在何方？
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dov'è la vera me?

Steam (ST): The person standing amidst the girls' exposed wreckage that resembles broken glass sculptures, that girl who's breathing harshly, her shoulders heaving, ...isn't me.
Umineko Project (UP): The person standing among the girls' shameful remains resembling broken glass sculptures, breathing harshly and shoulders heaving, ...that is not me.
PC Japanese (JP): 壊れたガラスの彫像のような残骸を晒している彼女らの中央に立ち、荒い息で肩を上下させているのは私ではない。
Russian (RU): Человек, стоящий среди осколков стеклянных скульптур девушек, ещё недавно бывших живыми существами, тяжело дышащий, со вздымающимися плечами... не я.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A pessoa que permaneceu de pé em meio aos vergonhosos resquícios que se assemelhavam a esculturas de vidro quebradas, respirando bruscamente com os ombros pesados, ...essa pessoa não sou eu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 站在如殘破的玻璃雕像般留下一地殘骸的她們的正中央，隨劇烈呼吸，肩膀上下抖動之人，並不是我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 站在如残破的玻璃雕像般留下一地残骸的她们的正中央，随剧烈呼吸，肩膀上下抖动之人，并不是我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La persona in piedi in mezzo ai resti esposti delle ragazze simili a sculture di vetro rotte, che sta respirando con durezza, le sue spalle ansimanti... non è me.

Steam (ST): I'm...over there.
Umineko Project (UP): The place {i:I} am......is over there.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O lugar onde {i:eu} estou......é aqui.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我是在，……那兒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我是在，……那儿。

Steam (ST): The me that's surrounded by a crowd and being showered by jeers...and who's hanging her head, her eyes red......
Umineko Project (UP): The one boxed in by a crowd, the one being subjected to constant verbal abuse, ...the one hanging her head, with clearly red eyes.........
PC Japanese (JP): 人垣に囲まれ、罵倒を浴びせられ続け、…目を真っ赤にしながら俯く、私………。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquela cercada por uma multidão, sendo objeto de constantes abusos verbais, ...aquela que está segurando sua cabeça, com seus olhos vermelhos.........
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被人牆圍著，沒完沒了地遭受痛罵，…眼睛紅紅地垂著頭的，我………。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被人墙围着，没完没了地遭受痛骂，…眼睛红红地垂着头的，我………。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La me che è circondata da un folla e che sta venendo sommersa da derisioni... e che sta chinando la testa, i suoi occhi rossi...

Steam (ST): ...Isn't the me over there... ...the real me...?
Umineko Project (UP): ......The me over there, .........isn't {i:that} the real me......?
PC Japanese (JP): ……あそこにいる私こそが、………本当の私じゃないか……。
Russian (RU): Разве та я, стоящая там, не являюсь настоящей мною?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A eu que está bem ali, .........não é {i:aquela} a minha eu real......?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……站在那兒的我，………才是真正的我吧……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……站在那儿的我，………才是真正的我吧……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non è la me stessa che sta laggiù... la vera me...?

Steam (ST): I won't dream anymore. Because there's nowhere left to run.
Umineko Project (UP): I won't...dream...anymore.{n}Because there's nowhere...for me to run.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 再也不做夢了。{n}因為，無處可逃。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 再也不做梦了。{n}因为，无处可逃。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non sognerò mai più. Perché non è rimasto nessun posto in cui scappare.

Steam (ST): I'm...going back. ...I'll return myself to the cage made of flesh...
Umineko Project (UP): I'll...go back. ......I'll return myself...to the cage made of flesh......
PC Japanese (JP): 私は、帰る。……肉で出来た檻に、自ら戻る……。
Russian (RU): Я... возвращаюсь. Я верну себя в клетку из плоти...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu vou...voltar. ......Eu vou retornar para mim mesma...para a gaiola feita de carne......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我要，回去。……自行回到，以血肉制成的牢籠……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我要，回去。……自行回到，以血肉制成的牢笼……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Io... torno indietro. ... Ritornerò nella gabbia fatta di carne...

Steam (ST): "Hey!! Are you listening to us?! It's not like anything'll be resolved if you just stand there hanging your head, right?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Hey!! Are you listening to us?! Standing there hanging your head forever won't solve anything, you know?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ねぇ！！　話、聞こえてますかしらぁ？！　いつまでも俯いていても、何の解決にもなりませんわよー？！」
Russian (RU): "Эй! Ты нас слушаешь?! Проблемы на решатся сами собой, если ты будешь просто стоять тут, повесив голову, а?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ei!! Você está nos ouvindo?! Ficar parada com as mãos na cabeça para sempre não vai resolver nada, sabia?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂！！有沒有在聽我們說話呀？！一直低著頭是解決不了任何問題的喲——？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂！！有没有在听我们说话呀？！一直低着头是解决不了任何问题的哟——？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ehi!! Ci stai ascoltando?! Non è che si risolverà qualcosa se te ne stai lì con la testa bassa e basta, vero?!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Vi sento."

Steam (ST): "Ah, you finally answered. You aren't thinking that this'll end if you stay silent, or that we'll forgive you if you cry, right?! We're asking if you're aware! We're asking if you're aware of the trouble you're causing those around you...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Ah, you finally answered. Are you thinking that this'll end eventually if you just stay silent, or that we'll forgive you if you cry, or something like that?! We're asking if you are aware! We're asking if you are aware of the trouble you're causing those around you...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あ、やっと返事した。このまま黙ってれば終わるとか、泣けば許してもらえるとか、そういうこと考えてるんじゃないのー？！　あんた、自覚あるかって聞いてるのよ！　自分が周りに迷惑掛けてるって自覚があるのかって聞いてんのよ…！！」
Russian (RU): "Ах, наконец‐то соизволила ответить. Ты ведь не думаешь, что это закончится, если ты будешь молчать, или что мы простим тебя, если ты заплачешь, верно?! Мы спрашиваем, соображаешь ли ты! Соображаешь ли ты, сколько проблем причиняешь окружающим тебя людям!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Oh, finalmente respondeu? Você está achando que isso vai acabar uma hora se continuar só em silêncio, ou que vamos perdoar você se começar a chorar ou algo parecido?! Estamos perguntando se está ciente disso! Estamos perguntando se você está ciente dos problemas que está nos causando...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊，總算是回答了。你是不是在想，保持沉默就會結束，哭出來就會得到原諒呀——？！我們是在問你，你有沒有自覺！在問你，有沒有自我認識到，自己在給周圍的人添麻煩…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊，总算是回答了。你是不是在想，保持沉默就会结束，哭出来就会得到原谅呀——？！我们是在问你，你有没有自觉！在问你，有没有自我认识到，自己在给周围的人添麻烦…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ah, alla fine hai risposto. Non stai pensando che questo finirà se starai zitta, o che ti perdoneremo se piangerai, vero?! Ti stiamo chiedendo se ne sei consapevole! Ti stiamo chiedendo se sei consapevole dei problemi che stai causando a quelli intorno a te...!!"

Steam (ST): ......I...slowly nodded. ...I acknowledged it.
Umineko Project (UP): .........I...slowly nodded. ...I admitted it.
PC Japanese (JP): ………私は、…ゆっくりと頷く。…それを認めた。
Russian (RU): Я медленно кивнула. Своим кивком я выразила признание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Eu...lentamente assenti. ...Eu admiti.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………我，…慢慢地點了點頭。…認同了這句話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………我，…慢慢地点了点头。…认同了这句话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Io... annuì lentamente. ... Lo riconoscevo.

Steam (ST): I acknowledged that I had slipped into the world of my daydream, trying to remain separate from the others in my class.
Umineko Project (UP): I admitted that I had been spending my time in a waking dreamland, trying to remain separate from the others in my class.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は白昼夢の世界に入り浸り、クラスから疎遠であろうとしたことを認める。
Russian (RU): Я признала, что ускользнула в мир грёз, пытаясь отделиться от других в моём классе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu admiti que eu passei meu tempo em um sonho acordado, tentando permanecer separada das outras garotas da minha classe.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 承認了，自己沉浸在白日夢的世界裡，對班上同學避而遠之。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 承认了，自己沉浸在白日梦的世界里，对班上同学避而远之。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Riconoscevo di essere scivolata nel mondo dei miei sogni, cercando di rimanere separata dagli altri nella classe.

Steam (ST): ...To separate myself from and disgrace those Sisters who spoke to me with reliable and kind words, despite being totally unable to help when I really wanted them to, ...I acknowledged that.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Those "friends" who had spoken to me with such kind and hopeful words, yet who couldn't offer me any help at all now in the moment I truly wanted it—to move on from them and to sully them, ......I admitted it.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それを認めることによって、あれだけ頼もしい言葉や優しい言葉を掛けてくれたのに、この、本当に助けて欲しい今になって、何も助けてくれなかった彼女らを穢すために、決別するために、……それを、認める。
Russian (RU): Чтобы опозорить их и отстраниться от них, этих девушек, ободряюще и по‐доброму разговаривающих со мной, но не преуспела... Я признала это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Essas "amigas" que falaram comigo de forma tão gentil e com palavras de entusiasmo, ainda assim não puderam me oferecer nenhuma ajuda no momento em que eu realmente precisei — para me separar delas e para contaminá‐las, ......eu admiti.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……在承認她們時，明明給予了那麼多鼓舞人心的溫馨言語，而到了我真正尋求幫助的此刻，卻一點忙都不幫，為了玷污這樣的她們，為了與這樣的她們訣別，……我認同了，那句話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……在承认她们时，明明给予了那么多鼓舞人心的温馨言语，而到了我真正寻求帮助的此刻，却一点忙都不帮，为了玷污这样的她们，为了与这样的她们诀别，……我认同了，那句话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Per disonorarle e separarmi da loro, quelle ragazze che mi parlavano con parole affidabili e gentili, ma non serve a nulla, ora che voglio veramente che lo facciano... lo riconoscevo.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...I, Ushiromiya Ange, do not have a cooperative attitude and caused trouble for my classmates. There is nothing to blame for that except my excessive inferiority complex towards all of my classmates because of my inability to study. And, ............"
Umineko Project (UP): "...I, Ushiromiya Ange, caused trouble for my classmates by not having a cooperative attitude. The reason for it is nothing more or less than my excessive inferiority complex towards all of my classmates because of my inability to study. And.............................."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……私、右代宮縁寿は、協調性がなくて、クラスメートに迷惑を掛けました。それは、勉強が出来ないため、クラスメート全体に対し、過度の劣等感を持っていたからに他なりません。私は、…………………………。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……私、右代宮縁寿は、協調性がなくて、クラスメートに迷惑を掛けました。それは、勉強が出来ないため、クラスメート全体に対し、過度の劣等感を持っていたからに他なりません。私は、…………………………」
Russian (RU): "...Я, Уширомия Энджи, не наделена духом товарищества и причинила проблемы своим одноклассницам. Причиной этому является не что иное, как мой безмерный комплекс неполноценности по отношению ко всем моим одноклассницам из‐за моей неспособности трудиться. И..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Eu, Ushiromiya Ange, causei problemas para minhas colegas de classe por não ter uma atitude cooperativa. O motivo pelo qual isso não é nem mais nem menos do que meu excessivo complexo de inferioridade perante minhas colegas por causa da minha incapacidade de estudar. E.............................."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我，右代宮緣壽，沒有協作性，給班上的同學添了麻煩。這完全是因為，我學習不行，而對全班同學抱有了過度的自卑感。我，…………………………」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我，右代宫缘寿，没有协作性，给班上的同学添了麻烦。这完全是因为，我学习不行，而对全班同学抱有了过度的自卑感。我，…………………………」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Io, Ushiromiya Ange, non ho un atteggiamento cooperativo e ho causato problemi ai miei compagni di classe. Non c'è niente da incolpare se non il mio eccessivo complesso di inferiorità verso tutti i miei compagni perché non sono in grado di studiare. E...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......It's a shame that I'm alive."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........there's no point in me being alive."
PC Japanese (JP): …………生きてても仕方ありません。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………生きてても仕方ありません」
Russian (RU): "Постыдно, что я вообще живу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........não há motivos para eu continuar viva."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………活著也沒意思。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………活着也没意思。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... è una vergogna che io sia viva."

Steam (ST): Starting there, I was no longer reading the paragraph they'd made me write.
Umineko Project (UP): Starting there, I was no longer reading the paragraph they had made me write.
PC Japanese (JP): そこからは、彼女らが書けと言った文章にはない。
Russian (RU): Начиная с этих слов, я больше не читала текст, который они заставили меня написать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Começando agora, eu não irei mais ler o parágrafo que elas me fizeram escrever.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從這話開始，就不是她們叫我寫的文章了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从这话开始，就不是她们叫我写的文章了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Da quel momento, non stavo più leggendo il paragrafo che mi avevano fatto scrivere.

Steam (ST): ...It was me...improvising. And...it was what was in my heart.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was my...improvisation. And...what was in my heart.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私の、即興。そして、胸の内。
Russian (RU): Это была моя импровизация, идущая от сердца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Isso foi meu...improviso. E...o que estava em meu coração.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……那是我的，即興。是我的真心話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……那是我的，即兴。是我的真心话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era una mia... improvvisazione. E... quello che c'era nel mio cuore.

Steam (ST): They noticed that it wasn't what they'd anticipated, but while they did frown, no one spoke.
Umineko Project (UP): They also noticed that it wasn't what they had anticipated, but while they did frown, no one spoke.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らも、それが予定されていないものであることに気付くが、眉をひそめながらも、口出しはしなかった。
Russian (RU): Они тоже заметили, что я не произношу ожидаемые ими слова, но хоть они хмурились, ни одна не сказала ни слова.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas também perceberem que aquilo não era o que elas haviam decidido, mas embora tenham feito uma cara feia, nenhuma delas falou nada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然她們注意到了預定中沒有這一部分，但也只是皺了皺眉，並未過問。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然她们注意到了预定中没有这一部分，但也只是皱了皱眉，并未过问。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche loro avevano notato che non era ciò che si erano aspettate, ma pur aggrottando le sopracciglia, nessuno disse niente.

Steam (ST): So I continued.
Umineko Project (UP): So I continued.
PC Japanese (JP): だから私は続ける。
Russian (RU): И я продолжила.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então eu continuei.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，我繼續講了下去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，我继续讲了下去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi continuai.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...That's right. It's a shame that I lived. ...I should've had them take me with them on that day in 1986. ...And yet, I was the only one who wasn't taken."
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's right. There was no point in my life continuing. ......I was meant to have been taken with them on that day in 1986. ......And yet, I was the only one who didn't get to be taken."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうです。私は生きてても仕方がなかった。……１９８６年のあの日に、私も連れて行ってもらうはずだったんです。……なのに、私だけが連れて行ってもらえなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうです。私は生きてても仕方がなかった。……１９８６年のあの日に、私も連れて行ってもらうはずだったんです。……なのに、私だけが連れて行ってもらえなかった」
Russian (RU): "Правильно. Постыдно, что я всё ещё жива. Мне следовало уговорить их взять меня с ними в 1986 году. .....Однако же меня не взяли."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Isso mesmo. Não há motivos em minha vida para continuar. ......Era para eu ter sido levada com eles naquele dia de 1986. ......E ainda, eu fui a única que não foi levada."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是的。我活著也沒意思。……在 1986 年的那一天，我也該被一起帶走。……可是，只有我沒被帶走。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是的。我活着也没意思。……在 1986 年的那一天，我也该被一起带走。……可是，只有我没被带走。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Giusto. È una vergogna che io sia viva. ... Avrei dovuto convincerli a portami con loro in quel giorno del 1986. ... Eppure, io fui l'unica a non andare.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...Why am I here? ...This isn't the world I'm supposed to be in. ......No one will save me.
Umineko Project (UP): "......Why am I here, I wonder? ...This isn't the world I'm meant to be in. ............No one will save me here."
PC Japanese (JP): ……どうして、私はここにいるのでしょう。…ここは、…私のいる世界じゃない。…………誰も助けてくれません。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……どうして、私はここにいるのでしょう。…ここは、…私のいる世界じゃない。…………誰も助けてくれません」
Russian (RU): ".....Что я вообще здесь делаю? Это не мир, в котором мне следует быть. ............Никто не спасет меня."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Por que eu estou aqui, eu me pergunto? ...Este não é o mundo na qual eu queria estar. ............Ninguém vai me salvar aqui."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……為什麼我會待在這裡？…這裡，…不是我該在的世界。…………誰都不會幫我。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……为什么我会待在这里？…这里，…不是我该在的世界。…………谁都不会帮我。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché sono qui, mi chiedo? ... Questo non è il mondo in cui dovrei essere. ... Nessuno mi salverà.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ...For a time, ...I felt as though only the fictional friends I created inside myself could save me. But those friends were nothing more than a delusion, ...and they didn't save me at all. After all, this isn't a world of imagination, but a world of reality."
Umineko Project (UP): "...For a time, ......I felt as though the fictional friends I created inside myself would save me. But those friends were nothing more than a delusion, ......and they did no such thing. After all, this isn't a fantasy world—it's the real world."
PC Japanese (JP): …一時、……私の中に生まれた架空の友人たちだけが、私を助けてくれるような気がしていました。でも、友人たちは所詮は妄想で、……助けてなどくれなかった。だってここは妄想の世界じゃなくて、現実の世界だから。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…一時、……私の中に生まれた架空の友人たちだけが、私を助けてくれるような気がしていました。でも、友人たちは所詮は妄想で、……助けてなどくれなかった。だってここは妄想の世界じゃなくて、現実の世界だから」
Russian (RU): "Какое‐то время... я полагала, будто воображаемые друзья, сотворённые мною, способны спасти меня. Но эти друзья оказались не более чем иллюзией... и не спасли меня. Ведь всё‐таки это не мир иллюзий, а суровая реальность."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Por um momento, ......eu senti como se as amigas imaginárias que criei dentro da minha cabeça fossem me salvar. Mas aquelas amigas não eram nada mais do que uma delusão, ......e elas não fizeram tal coisa. No fim, este não é um mundo de fantasia — é o mundo real."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…我曾一時，……感到從我內心中創造出來的虛構的朋友們，能夠幫助我。但是，朋友只不過是妄想，……不會伸出援手。畢竟，這裡不是妄想的世界，而是現實的世界。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…我曾一时，……感到从我内心中创造出来的虚构的朋友们，能够帮助我。但是，朋友只不过是妄想，……不会伸出援手。毕竟，这里不是妄想的世界，而是现实的世界。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Per qualche tempo... mi sentivo come se solo i miei amici immaginari, che avevo creato dentro di me, mi potessero salvare. Ma quegli amici non erano niente più di un'illusione... e non mi hanno salvato. Dopotutto, questo non è un mondo di illusioni, ma un mondo di realtà.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......So, in short, ...up until today, ...I've been having the same daydream. ...I hated my real classmates and only lived by interacting with the friends in my mind. ......Just now, I split up with those friends. So I am here."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........So, in short, ......up until today, ......I've been living in a daydream. ...Averse to my real classmates, I lived only by interacting with the friends in my delusion. .........Just now, I split up with those friends. And here I am."
PC Japanese (JP): ………だからつまり、……私は今日までずっと、……白昼夢を見続けてきたわけです。…現実のクラスメートを嫌い、妄想の友人たちとの交流の中だけに生きた。………その友人たちとは、さっき決別しました。だから私がここにいます。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………だからつまり、……私は今日までずっと、……白昼夢を見続けてきたわけです。…現実のクラスメートを嫌い、妄想の友人たちとの交流の中だけに生きた。………その友人たちとは、さっき決別しました。だから私がここにいます」
Russian (RU): "........Короче говоря... до сегодняшнего дня... я плавала в одних и тех же грёзах. Я ненавидела своих настоящих одноклассниц и жила, общаясь с иллюзорными друзьями. И вот прямо сейчас я с ними порвала. И вот я здесь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Por isso, resumindo, ......até então, ......eu vinha vivendo em um devaneio. ...Relutante às minhas verdadeiras colegas de classe, eu vivi apenas interagindo com minhas amigas em minhas delusões. .........Agora, eu me separei dessas amigas. E aqui estou eu."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………所以換言之，……我在今天前，……一直做著白日夢。…討厭現實中的同學，只生活在與妄想朋友的交往之中。………剛才，我與這些朋友進行了訣別。所以，我在這裡。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………所以换言之，……我在今天前，……一直做着白日梦。…讨厌现实中的同学，只生活在与妄想朋友的交往之中。………刚才，我与这些朋友进行了诀别。所以，我在这里。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi, in breve... fino ad oggi... ho avuto lo stesso sogno ad occhi aperti. ... Odiavo i miei veri compagni di classe e vivevo solo grazie all'interazione con gli amici nella mia illusione. ... Proprio adesso, ho appena lasciato quegli amici. {n}E così sono qui.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......I have no family. I've thrown my friends away too. ...There's no longer anything left for me.
Umineko Project (UP): "............I have no family. I've discarded my friends. ......There is no longer anything left for me."
PC Japanese (JP): …………家族もいません。友人も捨てました。……もう私には、何も残っていません。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………家族もいません。友人も捨てました。……もう私には、何も残っていません」
Russian (RU): "............У меня нет семьи. Вдобавок, я отбросила своих друзей. ......У меня больше ничего не осталось."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Eu não tenho família. Eu descartei minhas amigas. ......Não restou mais nada para mim."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………沒有了家人。捨棄了朋友。……我已經，什麼都不剩了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………没有了家人。舍弃了朋友。……我已经，什么都不剩了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non ho famiglia. Ho buttato via anche i miei amici. ... Non c'è più niente che rimane per me.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ...Why haven't I died? Someone asked that a short while ago. ...I think they're right. Why......am I alive? ......I should've died......in the year 1986. ...No, I must really have died."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Why haven't I died? One of you asked me that just now. ...I think you're absolutely right. Why.........am I alive, I wonder? ..................I should have been dead............in 1986. ...No, I did die then, I'm sure of it."
PC Japanese (JP): ……どうして死なないの？　さっきそう聞いた人がいました。…その通りだと思います。どうして私は、………生きてるんでしょう。………………１９８６年に私は、…………死んでいるはずだったんです。…いえ、きっと死んだんです。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……どうして死なないの？　さっきそう聞いた人がいました。…その通りだと思います。どうして私は、………生きてるんでしょう。………………１９８６年に私は、…………死んでいるはずだったんです。…いえ、きっと死んだんです」
Russian (RU): "......Почему я не умерла? Кое‐кто недавно задал мне этот вопрос. ...Полагаю, они правы. Почему... я жива, хотела бы я знать? ............Мне следовало погибнуть... в 1986 году. Нет, наверное, я действительно погибла."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Por que eu não morri? Uma de vocês acabou de me perguntar isso.{n}...Eu acho que você está absolutamente certa. Por que.........eu estou viva, eu me pergunto? ..................Eu deveria ter morrido............em 1986. ...Não, eu morri lá, eu tenho certeza."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……為什麼不去死呢？剛才有人提過這個問題。…我覺得，說得對。為什麼，………我活著呢？………………我應該在 1986 年，…………死掉。…不，一定已經死了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……为什么不去死呢？刚才有人提过这个问题。…我觉得，说得对。为什么，………我活着呢？………………我应该在 1986 年，…………死掉。…不，一定已经死了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché non sono morta? Qualcuno me l'ha chiesto poco tempo fa. {n}Penso che abbiano ragione. Perché... sono viva, mi chiedo? ... sarei dovuta morire... nell'anno 1986. ... No, avrei veramente dovuto morire.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "And yet, ......my dead soul is still locked up inside this cage of flesh. So I'll ask someone. If no one answers, ...I'll do it myself."
Umineko Project (UP): "But even so, ............my soul that was killed is still locked up inside this cage of flesh. So I'll ask this of one of you. If no one responds, ......I'll do it myself."
PC Japanese (JP): なのに、…………私の殺された魂は、未だにこの肉の檻に閉じ込められている。だから、誰かに求めよう。それに誰も応えてくれないなら、……自分でしよう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「なのに、…………私の殺された魂は、未だにこの肉の檻に閉じ込められている。だから、誰かに求めよう。それに誰も応えてくれないなら、……自分でしよう」
Russian (RU): "И однако же... моя убитая душа всё ещё заперта в этой клетке из плоти. Поэтому я спрошу кого‐нибудь. Если никто не ответит... я отвечу сама."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mesmo assim, ............minha alma foi morta e permaneceu presa dentro desta gaiola de carne. Por isso eu pedirei isto a vocês. Se ninguém responder, ......eu mesma farei isto."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「可是，…………我那已被殺的靈魂，至今仍被囚禁在這個血肉的牢籠中。所以，去請求下他人吧。如果沒人答應，……那就自己動手吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「可是，…………我那已被杀的灵魂，至今仍被囚禁在这个血肉的牢笼中。所以，去请求下他人吧。如果没人答应，……那就自己动手吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma anche così... il mio spirito ucciso è ancora chiuso dentro questa gabbia di carne. Quindi lo chiederò a qualcuno. Se nessuno risponderà... lo farò da sola.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Someone, please, .........let me die."
Umineko Project (UP): "Someone, .....................please let me die."
PC Japanese (JP): 「誰か私を、…………………死なせて下さい。」
Russian (RU): "Кто‐нибудь... умоляю, дайте мне умереть."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Alguém, .....................por favor, me deixe morrer."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哪位請，…………………賜我一死吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哪位请，…………………赐我一死吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Qualcuno... per favore mi faccia morire."

Steam (ST): I spoke that sentence...and looked around.
Umineko Project (UP): I spoke that sentence, and looked around.
PC Japanese (JP): その一言を口にし、周りを見渡す。
Russian (RU): Закончив говорить, я огляделась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu falei esta frase e olhei em volta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 說出這句話後，我環視四周。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 说出这句话后，我环视四周。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dissi questa frase, e mi guardai intorno.

Steam (ST): Dumbfounded girls. Shocked girls. Girls whose faces seemed to be saying "What the heck is this kid talking about?"
Umineko Project (UP): Dumbfounded girls.{n}Shocked girls.{n}Girls who looked like they didn't know what this kid was saying.
PC Japanese (JP): 唖然とした子。呆然とした子。何を言ってるのこの子、という顔の子。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 唖然とした子。{n}呆然とした子。{n}何を言ってるのこの子、という顔の子。
Russian (RU): Опешившие девушки.{n}Шокированные девушки.{n}Девушки, чей вид говорил, что они понятия не имеют, что несёт эта девчонка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As garotas estavam estupefatas.{n}Sem nenhuma reação.{n}Olhando umas para as outras como se não soubesse o que essa criança estava dizendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 有人啞然。{n}有人呆然。{n}有人露出了副“這人說啥呢？”的表情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 有人哑然。{n}有人呆然。{n}有人露出了副“这人说啥呢？”的表情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ragazze sbalordite. Ragazze shockate. Ragazze che sembravano non sapere cosa stesse dicendo quella ragazza.

Steam (ST): And, a bit late, more and more girls with faces that said "Is this girl all right?"
Umineko Project (UP): And, after a small delay, more and more girls with faces that said "Is this kid alright?"
PC Japanese (JP): そして、やや遅れてから、この子大丈夫〜？　という顔の子が増えていく。
Russian (RU): И, с некоторым запозданием, лица девушек, говорящие "У неё с головой всё в порядке?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E, após um pequeno atraso, mais e mais garotas exibiam uma expressão em seus rostos que diz "Essa garota está bem?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 略微過了一會兒後，露出“這人沒問題吧～？”的表情的人越來越多了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 略微过了一会儿后，露出“这人没问题吧～？”的表情的人越来越多了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E, poco dopo, sempre più ragazze con facce che dicevano ‘Sta bene questa ragazza?’

Steam (ST): *whisper*. *chatter*. And then, *giggle*.
Umineko Project (UP): Whisper whisper. Mutter mutter. And then, giggle giggle.
PC Japanese (JP): ひそひそ。ざわざわ。そして、くすくす。
Russian (RU): *шёпот*. *бормотанье*. А затем *хихиканье*.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sussurros e sussurros. Murmúrios e murmúrios. E então, risos e risos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 交頭接耳。吵吵鬧鬧。低聲竊笑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 交头接耳。吵吵闹闹。低声窃笑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): *whisper*. *chatter*. E poi, *giggle*.

Steam (ST): ......When I ordered the friends in my daydream to kill, they couldn't do it.
Umineko Project (UP): .........When I ordered my friends in my daydream to kill, they couldn't do it.
PC Japanese (JP): …………殺せと命じて、白昼夢の友人たちには出来なかった。
Russian (RU): Когда я приказала друзьям из моих грёз убить их, они не смогли выполнить мой приказ.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Quando ordenei que minhas amigas em meu devaneio matassem, elas não puderam fazer isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………命令白日夢的朋友殺人，她們做不到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …………命令白日梦的朋友杀人，她们做不到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quando ho ordinato agli amici nel mio sogno di uccidere, non hanno potuto farlo.

Steam (ST): And so. I asked real Humans to kill me, ...but of course, these girls can't do it either.
Umineko Project (UP): And so, I asked real {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s to kill, ......but of course, these girls can't do it either.
PC Japanese (JP): ならばと。現実のニンゲンたちに殺せと頼んだが、……やはり彼女たちにも出来ない。
Russian (RU): Поэтому я попросила настоящих {y:0:Люд}{n:0:люд}ей убить меня. Но разумеется, эти девчонки тоже не способны на такое.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então, eu pedia a {y:0:Humanos}{n:0:humanos} de verdade para me matar, ......mas é claro, aquelas garotas não podiam fazer isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那麼。拜託現實的人類殺人呢？……果然，她們也做不到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那么。拜托现实的人类杀人呢？……果然，她们也做不到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E allora. Ho chiesto a vere persone di uccidermi... ma naturalmente, neanche queste ragazze possono farlo.

Steam (ST): ...In other words, both daydreams and reality are the same.
Umineko Project (UP): ......In other words, both daydreams and reality are the same.
PC Japanese (JP): ……ということはつまり、白昼夢も現実も、どちらも同じ。
Russian (RU): Другими словами, что грёзы, что реальность — всё едино.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Em outras palavras, tanto devaneios quanto realidades são iguais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……如此說來，白日夢與現實，兩個都一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……如此说来，白日梦与现实，两个都一样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In altre parole, sia i sogni che la realtà sono uguali.

Steam (ST): Doesn't this mean that, including this world... ......Absolutely everything is a daydream?
Umineko Project (UP): Doesn't that mean that everything, absolutely everything, this world included...{n}............is all a daydream?
PC Japanese (JP): この世界も含めて、全てが全てが。…………白昼夢だということじゃないのか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この世界も含めて、全てが全てが。{n}…………白昼夢だということじゃないのか。
Russian (RU): Не означает ли это, что, включая этот мир,{n}абсолютно всё является грёзами?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não significaria que tudo, absolutamente tudo, incluindo este mundo...{n}............não passa de um devaneio?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 包括這個世界在內，一切的一切。{n}…………不全都是場白日夢嘛？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 包括这个世界在内，一切的一切。{n}…………不全都是场白日梦嘛？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo non significa che, incluso questo mondo... proprio tutto sia un sogno?

Steam (ST): Then, ...there's no problem, right?
Umineko Project (UP): Then......what's the problem.
PC Japanese (JP): なら、……それでいいじゃないか。
Russian (RU): Тогда ведь нет никаких проблем, верно?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então......qual o problema?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那麼，……就這麼算了吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那么，……就这么算了吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Allora... non c'è problema, vero?

Steam (ST): After all, ...on that day when I lost my family, I was already dead.
Umineko Project (UP): After all, ......on that day when I lost my entire family, ...I already died.
PC Japanese (JP): だって私は、……家族を全て失ったあの日に、もう死んでるのだから。
Russian (RU): В конце концов, в тот день, когда я лишилась своей семьи, я уже умерла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, ......no dia em que eu perdi toda a minha família, ...eu já estava morta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟，……我已在失去所有家人的那一天死去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟，……我已在失去所有家人的那一天死去了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopotutto... nel giorno in cui persi la mia famiglia, io ero già morta.

Steam (ST): ...Everything that happened afterwards is going on in my head, my life flashing before my eyes after I failed to die.
Umineko Project (UP): ......All the days since have been the delusions of a wrongful survivor—delusions of a life flashing before my eyes.
PC Japanese (JP): ……その後に続く全ての日々が、……死に損なった私の、走馬灯のような妄想だったのだ。
Russian (RU): А всё, что случилось после, является не более чем моим бредом, жизнью, мелькающей перед глазами после того, как мне не удалось умереть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Todos esses dias desde então foram delusões de uma errônea sobrevivente — delusões de uma vida passando diante dos meus olhos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……之後的所有歲月，……只是還沒死透的我的，如走馬燈般的妄想。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……之后的所有岁月，……只是还没死透的我的，如走马灯般的妄想。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tutto quello che è accaduto dopo era una mia illusione, la mia vita che scorre davanti ai miei occhi dopo che ho fallito nel morire.

Steam (ST): Once I understood that, ......it felt like the scenery surrounding me began to twist and bend slightly.
Umineko Project (UP): Once I understood that, ...............it felt like all the scenery surrounding me began to twist and bend slightly.
PC Japanese (JP): それを理解したら、……………周りの全ての景色が、わずかに歪み始めた気がした。
Russian (RU): Как только я осознала это, я ощутила, как обозреваемый мною мир начал слегка изгибаться и извиваться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma vez tendo entendido isso, ...............foi como se o cenário que me cercava tivesse começado a se distorcer e se misturar levemente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一理解了這一點，……………我就感到周圍的景色全都開始略微扭曲了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一理解了这一点，……………我就感到周围的景色全都开始略微扭曲了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Una volta che capii questo... sembrò come se lo scenario intorno a me cominciasse vagamente a girare e a curvarsi.

Steam (ST): ......Yeah. ...I'll finally......wake up. ...I'll be released from this daydream world.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Ah.{n}...I'm finally going to.........wake up.{n}...I'm going to be released...from this world of waking dreams.
PC Japanese (JP): ………あぁ。…やっと私は、………覚めるんだな。…この白昼夢の世界から、解放されるんだな。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………あぁ。{n}…やっと私は、………覚めるんだな。{n}…この白昼夢の世界から、解放されるんだな。
Russian (RU): ........Да.{n}Я наконец‐то проснусь.{n}Покину мир грёз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Ah.{n}...Eu finalmente vou.........acordar.{n}...Eu serei libertada...deste mundo de sonhos acordados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………啊。{n}…我總算是，………要醒了啊。{n}…總算能從這白日夢的世界中得到解放了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………啊。{n}…我总算是，………要醒了啊。{n}…总算能从这白日梦的世界中得到解放了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sì. ... Finalmente mi... sveglierò. ... Sarò rilasciata da questo mondo di sogni.

Steam (ST): I feel my consciousness sliding away.
Umineko Project (UP): I felt my consciousness sliding away.
PC Japanese (JP): ふぅっと、気が遠のいていく気がする。
Russian (RU): Я чувствую, как теряю сознание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu sinto minha consciência se distanciando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我感到，自己的意識“嗖”地遠去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我感到，自己的意识“嗖”地远去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sento la mia coscienza scivolare via.

Steam (ST): ...That's all right. Fade farther and farther away......and take me to my family...
Umineko Project (UP): ......That's alright. Fade further and further away, ............and take me to my family......
PC Japanese (JP): ……それでいい。どこまでもどこまでも遠のいて、…………私を家族のところまで連れて行って……。
Russian (RU): ....И хорошо. Ускользай далеко‐далеко, унеси меня ко моей семье...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Isso mesmo. Se tornando cada vez mais distante, ............me levando até minha família......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這就好。飛得越遠越好，…………把我帶到家人的身邊……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这就好。飞得越远越好，…………把我带到家人的身边……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Va bene così. Svanisce sempre più... e mi porta alla mia famiglia...

Steam (ST): Then, no matter what happens in this twisted, stale world, I won't mind it at all.
Umineko Project (UP): Therefore, no matter what unfolded in this twisted, faded world, I paid it no mind at all.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、歪んで色褪せた世界で何が起こっても、まったく気にならなかった。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, что бы ни произошло в этом искажённом, стылом мире, меня это совершенно не касается.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Portanto, não importa o que aconteça nesse mundo distorcido e opaco, eu não me importo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，在這扭曲褪色了的世界中，不論發生什麼，我都不會在意。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，在这扭曲褪色了的世界中，不论发生什么，我都不会在意。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, non importa cosa succede in questo contorto, insipido mondo, non ci baderò affatto.

Steam (ST): I saw the crowd get pushed aside as a teacher stepped in.
Umineko Project (UP): I saw the crowd get pushed aside as a teacher stepped in.
PC Japanese (JP): 人垣が押しのけられて、教師が割り込んでくるのが見える。
Russian (RU): Я увидела, как толпу растолкал подбежавший учитель.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu vi a multidão sendo empurrada para os lados enquanto a professora entrava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 人牆被推開，一位老師擠了進來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 人墙被推开，一位老师挤了进来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Vidi la folla mettersi da parte appena entrò un insegnante.

Steam (ST): Perhaps a teacher doing the rounds happened to notice a strange disturbance.
Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps a teacher doing the rounds happened to notice a strange disturbance.
PC Japanese (JP): おかしな騒ぎになっているのを、たまたま見回りの教師が見つけた、ということかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Видать, делающий обход учитель заметил странное сборище людей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez uma professora fazendo a ronda tenha percebido que algo estranho estava acontecendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 也許是偶然經過的巡夜老師，聽到了這些反常的嘈雜聲吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 也许是偶然经过的巡夜老师，听到了这些反常的嘈杂声吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse ad un insegnante che faceva i turni è capitato di notare una strana confusione.

Steam (ST): The teacher was vigorously shouting something, moving to protect me.
Umineko Project (UP): The teacher was vigorously shouting something, moving to protect me.
PC Japanese (JP): 教師は盛んに何かを怒鳴りながら、私を庇うような仕草をしていた。
Russian (RU): Он что‐то громко кричал, подходя ко мне с намерением защитить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A professora vigorosamente gritou algo, se movendo para me proteger.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 老師邊氣勢洶洶地怒吼著些什麼，邊做出了保護我的動作。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 老师边气势汹汹地怒吼着些什么，边做出了保护我的动作。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'insegnante stava urlando qualcosa, spostandosi per proteggermi.

Steam (ST): ...Watching that, I knew that an ally had appeared for me, even if there was only one, and I felt my awareness return very slightly.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Upon seeing that, and learning that an ally had appeared for me, even if only one, I felt my awareness return very slightly.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それを見て、私はたった１人とはいえ、味方が現れてくれたことを知り、少しだけ意識が戻るのを感じる。
